description.hltext_display: 2 soldiers hurt in altercation on post
description.content:
TENNESSEETwo Fort Campbell soldiers were airlifted to a Nashville hospital following an early Tuesday morning incident on the Army post. One of the soldiers was an on-duty military police officer, according to a news release from Fort Campbell.
The soldier was on routine patrol when he stopped to question a soldier and a fight ensued.
The MP was stabbed, and the soldier was shot, according to the release.
The incident is under investigation by Special Agents from the U.S. Army Criminal Investigation Command.
GANNETT TENNESSEE

description.hltext_display: CAI presenta hoy el grupo Caja3, su fusión fría con Badajoz y Círculo
description.content:
El grupo Caja3, la fusión fría (SIP) entre Caja Inmaculada (CAI), Caja Círculo de Burgos y Caja Badajoz, será presentado hoy --en rueda de prensa-- en Zaragoza. En el acto participarán el director general de CAI, Luis Miguel Carrasco, que es a su vez consejero delegado de Caja3 y José Ignacio Mijangos, presidente de Círculo, que ocupa la presidencia del grupo. También estarán Francisco García, presidente de Caja Badajoz y vicepresidente primero de Caja3; y Juan María Pemán, presidente de CAI, que se sitúa como vicepresidente segundo del holding.
Con la puesta de largo del grupo, las tres entidades culminan más de medio año de negociaciones para constituir la alianza, que estará operativa antes de final de año tal y como lo marcaban los plazos dados por el Banco de España.

description.hltext_display: 惠誉或将调降希腊主权信用评级至“垃圾级”
description.content:
惠誉将希腊纳入负面评级观察名单，这意味着希腊主权信用评级将遭到调降
国际评级机构惠誉(Fitch Ratings)12月21日表示，可能会在6个星期内将希腊的主权信用评级下调至非投资级评级，在此期间该机构将对希腊的“财务可维持性”进行审查。
据《华尔街日报》报道称，由于目前惠誉对希腊的评级已经是投资级别的最低一档BBB-，若再遭下调，则希腊的主权信用评级将被下调至“垃圾级”。惠誉成为本月以来将希腊评级列入负面观察名单的第三家主要评级机构。
评级机构穆迪(Moody's)已经将希腊的主权信用评级下调至“Ba1”，标准普尔(Standard Poor's Rating)则已将其评级下调至“BB+”。

description.hltext_display: UConn Women Make History With 89th Consecutive Win
description.author: LEANNE GENDREAU
description.content:
The UConn women now stand alone at the top. With a 93 - 62 win over Florida State, the Huskies now have 89 consecutive wins, which is now the longest winning streak in college basketball history.
Maya Moore led the way with a career-high 41 points and 10 rebounds. Bria Hartley chipped in another 21 points for the team, who hasn't lost since April 6, 2008.
The XL Center in Hartford was sold out, with more than 16,000 fans, to witness the historic event. Some of those who attended included Governor M. Jodi Rell, Bill Walton, even John Wooden's grandson, Greg.
On Sunday, UConn matched the 88-run streak UCLA set between 1971 and 1974 under the direction of legendary coach Wooden.
Greg Wooden said his grandfather would have wanted to be there with him. "I kind of thought that somebody should come here from the family and show support," the 47-year-old Wooden said. "Certain players have said they're not really supportive of the streak, and I know my grandfather would have loved to have been here to see this." During a news conference after the game, President Obama called to congratulate Auriemma on their tremendous win.
UConn went into the game ranked number one on the Associated Press poll for the 50th week in a row. "The tradition of excellence continues as our UConn women continue to rewrite the record books. What they have accomplished is phenomenal and one more win will clearly set them in a class by themselves," Rell said. "I urge all UConn fans to show their pride and support by wearing blue and white to the office or in classrooms." While no men's team has approached UCLA's record set from 1971-74, Auriemma and UConn once came close. The Huskies won 70 straight in the early 2000s before tripping up against Villanova. That was a record that many thought would never be achieved again.
But here we are. UConn hasn't lost since the 2008 NCAA tournament. "I like to remind my players all the time, you don't stumble and bumble into the history book," Auriemma said. "You'll have to do it the right way if you want to get in there. It may not come again."

description.hltext_display: Family tribute to stab victim
description.author: no@spam.com (Orbit News Ltd
description.content:
THE family of a man who died after being stabbed at his home in Warrington have issued a statement paying tribute to him.
Robert David O'Raw, aged 50, of Bruche Heath Gardens, Padgate died after being stabbed in the chest on Sunday, December 19.
He leaves behind three children, two sons and a daughter, as well as three brothers and two sisters.
In their statement, the family said: "Robert was a loving and caring father who will be sadly missed by the whole family."
Police were called to the house late on Sunday evening. They discovered Mr O'Raw with stab wounds.
He is believed to have died instantly.
A 36-year-old woman was arrested at the scene on suspicion of murder and is still in custody being questioned by detectives.
A post mortem has since concluded Robert died as a result of a single stab wound to the chest.

description.hltext_display: Kalakalan ng Guangxi at ASEAN, umuunlad nitong nagdaang 18 buwan
description.content:
Napag-alaman kahapon mula sa adwana ng Nanning, Guangxi, mula noong isang taon, maalwan ang pag-unlad ng bilateral na kalakalan ng Rehiyong Aotonomo ng Guangxi at ASEAN, nitong nagdaang 18 buwan, tuluy-tuloy na lumaki ang halaga ng kalakalan bawat buwan.
Ang Rehiyong Guanxi ay unang prente ng Tsina sa kalakalan nila ng ASEAN, mula noong Enero hanggang Nobyembre, ang ASEAN ay nananatiling bilang pinakamalaking trade partner ng Guangxi, ang halaga ng bilateral na kalakalan ay umabot sa 5.4 bilyong dolyares at lumaki nang 29.4% kumpara sa gayon ding panahon ng nagdaang taon.

description.hltext_display: Pusch Ridge spikers win city crown
description.content:
The A team at Pusch Ridge Christian Academy has won the city championship in its middle school volleyball league.
Pusch Ridge, the Oracle Road school with 455 students in grades 6-12, had 45 players on its team, which plays in the Tucson Independent Athletic League.
Coach Nikki Simpson led her team to a 13-2 record, beating Casas Christian in the championship game.
Members of the team were Olivia Christian, Abby Clark, Shelby Dirkschneider, Leah Edmond, Kaylin Frisby, Haley Haynes, Grace Johnson, Kelly Lienhard, Lindsay Olson, Jamie Ricksecker, Kailey Rohne, Moriah Roters and Clare Wallum.
Dirkschneider was named a most valuable player for her solid serving, great blocking ability and powerful hits, a release said. Rohne was the other MVP with her serving, consistent setting and positive attitude.
“It was a great feeling to fight through losing the first game of the season and go on to win the championship,” Simpson said. “We talked about resilience, communicating and working as a team throughout the season during our devotional time.”

description.hltext_display: ? 모조 함포부품 제조업체 대표 영장청구
description.content:
창원지검 특수부는 정품 대신 모조 부품을
해군에 납품한 혐의로 김해의 제조사 대표
여모씨와 부산의 납품업체 대표 장모씨에 대해
구속영장을 청구했습니다.
검찰에 따르면 이들은 해군 함정에 배치된
76mm 함포의 주퇴,복좌 장치를 납품하는
과정에서 국내에서 만든 모조품을
미국에 보내 정품 인증서를 붙인 뒤
다시 해군에 납품한 혐의를 받고 있습니다.
검찰은 또 정품 인증서 진위여부와 함께
검수과정에서 군 관계자가
연루됐는지를 조사하고 있습니다.

description.hltext_display: 英国政府开支大增 11月预算赤字创纪录
description.content:
据台湾“中央社”报道，英国11月预算赤字膨胀，创下历史新高纪录，突显出首相卡梅伦面临的挑战，同时英国政府准备施行二次大战以来最大规模的预算削减措施。
英国国家统计局表示，11月净借贷为228亿英镑，相较于去年同期的167亿英镑。彭博调查的12位分析师预测为168亿英镑。11月政府开支增幅为2月以来最大。不含金援银行的预算缺口达233亿英镑。
英国商务大臣温斯 凯博(Vince Cable)表示，自由民主党和保守党之间针对如何缩小预算缺口“私底下不断传出火药味”。在英国民众准备好接受砍预算和加税措施的同时，温斯 凯博对《每日电讯报》的发言攻占各大报，他指出卡梅伦为了让联合政府团结起来而付出许多努力。
伦敦天达证券(Investec Securities)首席经济师在报告发布前接受电访时说：“这项数据强化了财政更应该整顿的证据。如果英国经济可以抵挡住削减措施的力量，而我们认为英国办的到，2011年的公共财政应会有更多让人值得注意进步的地方。”

description.hltext_display: 80’ｓのヒット曲!! - 私も80's洋楽大好き！
description.content:
四捨五入すると30歳のラママバナと申します。
私は好きで洋楽を色々聞くのですが、中でも80年代の曲がとても好きです。
最近ＰＶを紹介する番組もあって嬉しい限りです。
かっこいいアーティスト達やそれぞれのセンスと個性が見ていて面白いＰＶを見るのが楽しみです。
そして何と言っても思わず体が動いてしまうテンポの良い曲が80’ｓの魅力だと思います。
先に書いたようにどちらかと言うとテンポの良い曲がすきで、2歳の子供とよくネットやテレビのＰＶを見て一緒にヘナチョコダンスをして遊んでいます。
でも最近ネタが尽きて来てしまい、何か良いＰＶは無いかと探しています。
こちらで皆さんにお勧めを伺いたいと思って投稿しました。
因みに私と息子が好きなのは
・ワムのWake me up
・デッドオアアライブ/You spin Me Round
・バナナラマのVenus
・ボーイズタウンギャングの君の瞳に恋してる
・デュランデュランのリフレックス
・グロリア・エステファンの1.2.3
・シンディー・ローパーのGirls Just Want to Have Fun
などなどです。よろしくお願いします。

description.hltext_display: [포토엔]미친존재감 송새벽 ‘디렉터스 컷 신인상 수상’
description.content: [뉴스엔 임세영 기자]현직 영화 감독들이 주최하는 � �13회 '디� �터스 컷 어워즈(Director's CUT Awards)'가 12월 22일 오후 5시 서울 강남구 � 사동 압구� �CGV에서 열� �다.'디� �터스 컷 어워즈'는 한국영화감독네트워크 소속 300여명의 감독들이 올해 개봉한 한국 영화 106편 중 투표로 올해의 감독상과 연기상, � 인 감독상, � 인 연기자상, � �작자상, 독립영화 감독상 등 6개 부문의 시상자를 가리는 시상식이다.'디� �터스 컷 어워즈'는 1998년 이현승 감독의 � �안으로 시작해 올해 13회를 맞았다. 영화 감독들의 송년 모임을 겸해 매년 12월 중순 열린다. 이현승 감독은 현재 송강호 주연 '푸른소금'을 찰영중이다.◇ � �13회 디� �터스컷 어워즈 수상자 명단▲올해의 감독상= 류승완(부당거래)▲올해의 연기자상= 최민식(악마를 보았다) 최민식 / 서영희(김복남 살인사건의 � �말)▲올해의 � 인감독상=장� 수(김복남 살인사건의 � �말)▲올해의 � 인연기자상=송새벽(방자� �) / 이민� �(시라노; 연� 조작단)▲올해의 � �작자상=이태헌(아� �씨)(오퍼스 픽쳐스)▲올해의 독립영화감독상=홍형숙(경계도시 2)임세영 seiyu@newsen.com기사� �보 및 보도자료 newsen@newsen.comcopyrightⓒ 뉴스엔. 무단� �재 & 재배포 금지

description.hltext_display: ? 통영 폭력조직 37명 검거
description.content:
살인 미수와 불법 게임기 제조공장 운영,
금품갈취 등의 혐의로 통영지역 폭력조직
2개 파 37명을 붙잡아
32살 서모씨를 포함해 9명을 구속했습니다.
경찰에 따르면 서씨는
모 유선방송사 김모 사장이 자신들의 말을
듣지 않는다는 이유로
둔기로 때려 숨지게 하려한 혐의입니다.
이들 폭력조직은 또 무등록 게임기
제조공장을 차려놓고 통영과 거제에
70여 대를 공급하는가하면 유흥업소로부터
업소보호비 명목으로
4억6천만원을 갈취한 혐의도 받고 있습니다.

description.hltext_display: 美国风险投资行业2011年前景看好
description.content:
风险投资家和企业CEO对明年的预期分布图
新浪科技讯 北京时间12月22日午间消息，美国风险投资协会(以下简称“NVCA”)和道琼斯风险资本周二发布的报告显示，风险投资家明年有望展开更大规模的投资，而由风险投资资助的企业CEO也计划部署更多工作，并展开更多招聘。
在这份名为《2011风投展望》(2011 Venture View)的报告中，有超过半数(51%)的风险投资家认为明年会增加投资，只有24%希望保持现有水平，另外24%认为会下降。由风险投资资助的企业CEO也比较乐观，有58%认为明年的风险投资会增加，另有64%计划通过风险投资募集更多资金。
在谈到自己企业的运营时，有82%的CEO计划增加员工，50%有可能会提升薪酬标准，还有60%计划增加海外销售额。
具体到各个领域，风险投资家认为，IT行业明年的投资额有望超过生命科学和清洁技术领域，这与前几年的趋势恰好相反。IT行业的三大热门领域是消费互联网/数字媒体、云计算和移动/通讯。不过，风险投资家认为，消费互联网/数字媒体和云计算有可能会产生过度投资泡沫。
在被问及2011年的融资前景时，认为融资额将增加、减少和持平的风险投资家比例基本相同，但是他们中的很多人认为，更多的投资将来自有限合伙人。
最后，有63%的风险投资家和64%的CEO预计全美经济明年将提升，促使企业投入更多的技术开支、增加员工并提升薪酬标准。
NVCA主席马克·西森(Mark Heesen)表示：“2009年的市场遭遇困境，当时的想法是2010年将会好转。事实证明我们的预测是正确的。过去一年，我们度过了金融危机，并且重新开始我们最擅长的事情——创建伟大的企业……尽管风险投资行业仍在进化，并有可能萎缩，但我们资助的企业仍将继续增长和创新，并推动美国经济发展。”
该报告共对330名美国风险投资家和180名位于美国并由风险投资资助的企业CEO进行了调查，调查日期为11月29日至12月10日。(鼎宏)

description.hltext_display: Children who ride without lights
description.author: no@spam.com (Orbit News Ltd
description.content:
PARENTS in Warrington are being urged to check that their children are safe when cycling in the dark.
Cllr Russ Bowden, of Birchwood, has sounded the warning after seeing an increase in the number of youngsters riding without lights or even reflectors.
He said: "I have noticed a worrying trend amongst teenage cyclists who are cycling around in the dark without lights or reflectors. At recent meetings, other councillors have commented on the same experience.
"Parents should make sure bicycle lights and reflectors work and are kept clean. The law states you must have white front and red rear lights lit when you are cycling in the dark. A set of road legal lights can be purchased for less than £10 and it's a small price to pay for the safety of your children."
He said the Highway Code recommends cyclists wear light-coloured or fluorescent clothing, which helps people to see them in daylight and poor light. When it is dark they should wear reflective clothing and/or accessories - belt, arm or ankle bands.
Pictured: Cllr Bowden in cycling gear

event_or_fact.property: I have noticed a worrying trend amongst teenage cyclists who are cycling around in the dark without lights or reflectors.
the Highway Code recommends cyclists wear light-coloured or fluorescent clothing, which helps people to see them in daylight and poor light

description.hltext_display: SaleRacks.com Celebrates Timely Launch with a Heavy Flow of Discount Holiday Deals
description.content:
SaleRacks.com has recently launched a deal site that handpicks the latest and greatest sales while trying to build a smarter and thriftier community of consumers. With Christmas right around the corner, SaleRacks has significantly upped its amount of deals, bargains, and coupon codes.
Great Neck, NY (PRWEB) December 22, 2010
SaleRacks (http://www.saleracks.com ) recently announced the launch of a new bargain hunter site that provides its visitors with constant flow of the best deals, instant savings, and coupon codes.
The concept for SaleRacks developed when Cofounder Ian Aronovich realized the amount of time people spend fruitlessly bargain hunting. He would see friends literally take hours to try to find the best prices on a given product while typically coming up unsuccessful in finding the best deal.
“I was just tired of seeing them sifting through dozens of retailers and websites to only end up saving a couple of dollars,” Aronovich said. “Our main goal is, and always will be, to provide the everyday consumer with the best deals available for the latest products and services,” he added.
Thanksgiving typically marks the beginning of holiday sales, and that's when the SaleRacks idea crept into action. Now that Christmas is several days away, people undoubtedly feel the pressure of last minute shopping, and tend to settle on prices that could have been considerably lower if they looked elsewhere. Whether you have the time or energy to venture out into the cold weather to do your shopping or you plan to buy everything online, checking SaleRacks.com first is the most efficient way to find deals.
“This is an incredibly demanding time for us as well for as the average consumer,” said Aronovich. With discount holiday deals sprouting up left and right during this hectic time of year, SaleRacks.com filters out all the generic and lackluster deals that are thrown at the public. “Black Friday and Cyber Monday were great sources for deals, but now people are struggling to find the best last minute discounts. To that end, the SaleRacks team researches, and hand-picks the best vetted deals, whether for the Christmas season or beyond.”
Last month, Walmart reported its sixth consecutive quarterly U.S. same-store sales decline, an indication of poor ordinary retail health in the country. At the same time, however, this indicates an excellent time for a deal site like SaleRacks, which feeds the public a constant flow of the best discount deals, sales, coupons and bargains through the web.
SaleRacks also quickly updates the site to show when a deal has expired or sold out. “Our website doesn't waste your time—the savings are listed for a simple ‘read, click, and purchase' method,” explains a member of the SaleRacks team. SaleRacks even links you to competitive pricing every time so you could see how good of a deal you're getting.
Besides viewing deals on the SaleRacks site through a computer, deals can be accessed via Facebook (http://www.facebook.com/SaleRacks) ; Twitter (http://twitter.com/SaleRacks), or through any smart phone with a streamlined mobile view. Saleracks is now also gearing up for crowdsourcing the best deals via a community of smart and educated shoppers it plans to grow.
About SaleRacks
SaleRacks is free site providing up-to-the-minute deals, bargains, discounts, and sales from around the web. Their team of researchers diligently scours the Internet and selects the greatest discounts to help you save the most money.
Interview Contact: I. Aronovich Tel: (516) 467-4518 Fax: (516) 706-1072 Company: SaleRacks Business Address: 70 Middle Neck Road, Suite 5, Great Neck, NY 11021
# # #
For the original version on PRWeb visit: http://www.prweb.com/releases/prweb2010/12/prweb4918164.htm

description.hltext_display: ? 경남 11월 어음부도율 큰 폭 상승
description.content:
지난달 경남의 어음부도율이
크게 상승한 것으로 나타났습니다.
한국은행 경남본부가 발표한
'11월 중 경남의 어음부도 동향'에 따르면
지난달 도내 어음부도율은 0.5%로
전달의 0.38%보다 0.12% 포인트 상승했으며
이는 이미 부도난 업체를 중심으로
부도 금액이 크게 증가했기 때문입니다.
지역별로는 양산 0.63% 포인트,창원 0.3%포인트
김해 0.22%포인트 각각 상승했고,
산업별로는 제조업이 67억원으로
부도 금액의 절반가량을 차지했습니다.

description.hltext_display: 한국증권금융, 연말 맞아 노사공동으로 따뜻한 나눔행사 가져
description.content: 한국증권금융은 22일 임직원의 급여반납분과 회사와 직원의 동반기부제(매칭그란트)로 모금한 2억 5천여만원 중 2억원을 노사가 공동으로 은평구 응암동에 위치한 자선의료기관인 도티기념병원에 기부했다고 밝혔다.도티기념병원은 사회소외계층과 외국인 노동자 등 빈민층을 무료로 진료해주는 곳이다.후원금은 도티기념병원의 노후된 엑스레이 의료장비를 교체하는데 사용되어 질 ...

description.hltext_display: 송새벽-이민정, 감독들이 주는 신인 남녀연기자상 수상
description.content: [뉴스엔 홍� �원 기자]영화 '방자� �' 송새벽과 ‘시라노; 연� 조작단’ 이민� �이 2010년 디� �터스 컷 어워즈 올해의 � 인 남녀연기자상을 받았다.송새벽과 이민� �은 22일 서울 압구� � CGV에서 열린 2010 디� �터스 컷 어워즈에서 각각 올해의 � 인 남자연기자상과 � 인 여자연기자상을 수상했다. 디� �터스 컷 어워즈 상은 한국영화감독네트워크 300여 명의 감독들이 주는 상이다.특히 송새벽은 올해 남자� 인상을 독차지했다. 송새벽은 지난 10월 � �19회 부일영화상 � 인남자연기상, 11월 � �30회 영평상 � 인남우상, � �47회 대종상 남우조연상, � �8회 대한민국영화대상 � 인남우상에 이어 디� �터스 컷 어워즈 � 인 남자연기상까지 수상해 올해만 5개 상을 가� �갔다.디� �터스 컷 어워즈는 한국영화감독네트워크 300여 명의 감독들이 2010년 개봉작 106편을 대상으로 투표를 통해 � � �한 올해의 감독상, 연기상, � 인감독상, � 인연기자상, � �작자상, 독립영화감독상 등 총 6개 부문의 시상을 한다.디� �터스 컷 어워즈는 1998년 이현승 감독의 � �안으로 시작돼 13회를 맞았으며 한국영화감독 300여 명이 참여하� 있는 한국영화감독네트워크 송년모임을 겸해 매년 12월 중순 열린다.◇� �13회 디� �터스컷 어워즈 수상자 명단▲올해의 감독상=류승완(부당거래)▲올해의 연기자상=최민식(악마를 보았다), 서영희(김복남 살인사건의 � �말)▲올해의 � 인감독상=장� 수(김복남 살인사건의 � �말)▲올해의 � 인연기자상=송새벽(방자� �), 이민� �(시라노; 연� 조작단)▲올해의 � �작자상=오퍼스 픽쳐스 이태헌(아� �씨)▲올해의 독립영화감독상=홍형숙(경계도시2)홍� �원 man@newsen.com기사� �보 및 보도자료 newsen@newsen.comcopyrightⓒ 뉴스엔. 무단� �재 & 재배포 금지

description.hltext_display: 德意志银行：预计明年全球经济增速放缓
description.content:
德意志银行昨天发布《2011年全球经济展望报告》，预计明年全球经济增速将会从今年的4.7%，放缓至3.9%。与此同时，报告预计新兴经济体明年将面临6%甚至以上的平均通胀率，从而可能被迫采取更加有力的货币紧缩政策。

description.hltext_display: Azerbaijani pavilion to be launched during the International Green Week in Berlin
description.content:
Azerbaijani pavilion will be opened in the 76th International Green Week in Berlin, from January 21-30.
Aim of the pavilion is to introduce the visitors to industry, cuisine and culture of Azerbaijan.
The International Green Week (IGW) is a one-of-a-kind international exhibition for the food, agricultural, and horticultural industries. Established in 1926 it will take place for the 76th time in 2011. Producers from all over the world use the IGW to test-market food and luxury items and establish a brand image. Exhibitors often organize around national, regional, or product themes.
Presentations feature fresh produce, fish, meats, and dairy products.
The IGW also features commercial and non-commercial agricultural, forestry, and landscaping exhibits. Changing annual themes typically include such topics as renewable resources or scientific livestock breeding and production. These trade show elements are of particular interest to those involved in the developing markets of central and eastern Europe.

description.hltext_display: Lion boys ready to measure up
description.content:
Pusch Ridge sees holiday tournament as an indicator
Published:
December-22-2010 12:11am
Pusch Ridge boys basketball coach Dennis O’Reilly believes the annual Northwest Desert Classic, to be held Dec. 27-30 at both Pusch Ridge and Mountain View high schools, should be a great indicator of where the Lions basketball program stands.
Pusch Ridge currently sits at 8-1. If a 66-48 win at Empire last Friday is any indication, all systems are go.
Senior shooting guard Jeremy Courtney led all scorers with 20 points. He was 9-10 at the foul line, and drained three three-pointers.
“We played really well as a team,” Courtney said. “We’re coming together more as a team.”
Last year’s Lions squad went 21-8, and won its first playoff game over Camp Verde.
In their second year under O’Reilly, the Lions are much further along. In 2009, O’Reilly had to wait for the football playoffs to end in order to indoctrinate football players. This year, the gridders were eliminated earlier. The veteran squad, with seven seniors, has been able to get its program, system and cohesiveness into place.
“You can see it,” Courtney said. “It’s an experienced team.”
Senior point guard Daniel McLeod is a major key for the Lions. He scored nine points at Empire. More important was his decision-making, enabling the Lions to shoot 43 percent from the floor, and score 66 points.
“McLeod is a good leader,” O’Reilly said. “He understands the game well. He has a high basketball IQ. He’s a great decision-maker.”
“Daniel McLeod’s a great point guard,” teammate Courtney said.
At one point in the first half, McLeod shot an air ball on a free-throw attempt, then smiled. It was if he were acknowledging the moment was an aberration, a mere blip on the radar. He wasn’t going to sweat it.
The Lions opened the game with an 8-2 run, six by Courtney, who finished with nine in the first quarter, as the Lions built an 11-7 lead.
Two quick baskets by post Colin Chafin led to a 7-0 run by Pusch Ridge for an 18-7 lead.
Then, the Ravens embarked on an 8-0 run. But a basket by McLeod, and later a trey by Courtney with about a minute left, gave the Lions a 29-22 lead at half.
While the guards provided offense, O’Reilly pointed out, they play good on-the-ball defense, and are quick on their feet. Not to be forgotten, big men John Jackson and Chafin scored 10 and 8 points, respectively. Forward Caleb Spegman had another 10, including the final six points for Pusch Ridge in the third, for a commanding 44-29 lead. Jake Gifford also had seven points from his forward position.
“We were getting the ball inside,” O’Reilly said. “John Jackson’s strong inside and takes up a lot of space.
“Our big men give us long arms and length. They get in the passing lanes.”
O’Reilly is hoping his team can make the playoffs again.
“They want to learn. They’re picking up on the system. I’m looking forward to the challenging games

description.hltext_display: Teruel cuestiona que la eliminación del canon sea "constitucional"
description.content: El presidente de la Cámara de Zaragoza, Manuel Teruel, criticó con contundencia "las formas" con que el Gobierno decidió suprimir la obligatoriedad del pago de las cuotas. "Ni nos preguntó ni permitió que hubiera negociación", dijo Teruel, que subrayó que "hasta puede cuestionarse la constitucionalidad de la decisión". Los presidentes de las instituciones aragonesas aún confían en llegar a un "consenso". "Dentro de poco habrá una nueva ley de Cámaras y esperamos que haya cambios", dijo Teruel.

description.hltext_display: ? 엔씨소프트, 구단 창단 의향서 KBO 제출
description.content:
창원 연고의 9번째 프로야구단 창단이
주목받고 있는 가운데 온라인 게임 전문기업인 엔씨소프트가 구단 창단 의향서를
한국야구위원회에 제출했습니다.
엔씨소프트는 "창원시의 뜨거운 유치열정과
야구팬들의 강한 열망, 엔씨소프트의 창의성, 세상 사람들을 더 즐겁게 만든다는
기업 목표가 어우러져 창원 지역과
국내 프로야구 발전에 획기적인 계기가
마련될 것으로 기대한다"고 밝혔습니다.
KBO측은 "창단의사를 보인 기업이 2곳 더 있어 내년 1월 11일 이사회에서 적합성 여부를
심사해 결론을 내릴 것"이라고 밝혔습니다.

description.hltext_display: 韩23日开展最大规模军演 美高官称是中美合作的机遇
description.content:

韩国从22日起在东海岸举行为期3天海军射击演习
资料图片 11月28日，在韩国首都首尔西南约170公里的一处海滩，韩国士兵在参加登陆演习前进行训练。新华社/路透
中新网12月22日电 据韩联社报道，韩国方面表示，计划从本周三(12月22日)至周五(12月24日)举行海军射击演习，出动海军舰艇及反潜直升机。
报道称，韩国国防部表示，目前仍在西海岸维持高度警戒态势，以应对未来可能的“朝鲜出其不意的挑衅”。
韩国军方同时表示，计划从12月22日开始在东海岸举行为期3天的海军射击演习。据称，此次演习将出动6艘海军舰艇，进行发炮演习，并出动山猫式(Lynx)反潜直升机。

description.hltext_display: 박수홍 긴급 기자회견 개최 ‘혹시 결혼발표?’
description.content: [뉴스엔 � �원 기자]마흔을 넘긴 노총각 MC 박수홍이 갑작스� � 기자회견을 열었다.박수홍은 최근 진행된 KBSN ‘스타메이킹 서바이벌-황금마이크’녹화에서 기자회견을 개최했다. 이에 ‘결혼 기자회견이 아니냐’는 의심을 낳았다.방송 뿐 아니라 웨딩업체 CEO로도 � 명한 박수홍은 박경림, 이수영, 윤종� 등 수많은 동료 커플들의 결혼식을 맡아왔다. KBS 대학개그 콘테스트 동기인 김용만, 남희석, � 재석까지 모두 품� �남 대열에 합류한지 오래지만 그 중 � 독 박수홍만 혼자 오랜 솔로 생활을 해왔던 터라 주변에서는 결혼 발표를 하는 것이 아니냐는 추측이 난무했다.그러나 모두의 예상을 뒤엎� 그는 새로운 도� �의 시작을 알� �다. 오는 22일 첫 방송되는 KBSN의 � 규 프로그램 ‘스타메이킹 서바이벌-황금마이크’의 MC로 발탁돼 강호동, � 재석 등 국민 MC의 뒤를 이을 차세대 MC를 직� � 찾아 나서� 다� 발표한 것.‘스타메이킹 서바이벌-황금마이크’는 이달 초 홈페이지를 통해 지원자를 모집했� 1500여명의 지원자가 몰린 가운데 서류� �형에 합격한 150명을 대상으로 오디션을 실시했다. 최종 우승자에게는 상금 500만원과 내년 상반기 � 칭되는 KBSN � 규 프로그램의 MC로 데뷔� 기회가 주어진다.12월 22일 오후 9시 30분 첫 방송.� �원 wonwon@newsen.com기사� �보 및 보도자료 newsen@newsen.comcopyrightⓒ 뉴스엔. 무단� �재 & 재배포 금지

description.hltext_display: Hatcher lands her own TV comedy?
description.content:
Christmas has come early for Desperate Housewives star Teri Hatcher - she has reportedly landed her own US TV comedy. Hatcher was recently given the green light for a new pilot series scheduled to broadcast in America next autumn.
The show, said to be developed as the Untitled Teri Hatcher Pilot, will be produced by Housewives creator Marc Cherry.
A source tells the National Enquirer, "Teri's absolutely thrilled. She got the good news on the final day of shooting Housewives before the holiday hiatus. "It's going to be a dark comedy in the Housewives tradition."

description.hltext_display: ・美设想将航天器射入太空 科幻小说幻想或成现实
description.content:
飞行器搭载着宇宙飞船，被电磁轨道炮射向太空（示意图） 。
东方网12月19日消息：据美国《大众科学》杂志12月18日报道，未来人类发射卫星的方式将彻底告别传统的火箭运输，宇宙飞船将搭载在超音速飞行器上，如同出膛的子弹一般被射入遥远的太空。美国国家航空航天局(NASA)正在进行的这项革命性研究意味着，科幻文学巨匠儒勒・凡尔纳笔下向月球发射载人炮弹的大胆构想有望成为现实。
替代方案
美国总统奥巴马今年4月下令NASA寻找比传统火箭更经济的将航天器送入太空的办法，科学家们经过数月研究提出了一项雄心勃勃的替代方案，他们需要的是一条3.2公里长的电磁轨道炮、能达到10倍音速的飞行器和足够强大的电力支持。
具体说来，一架搭载着宇宙飞船的超音速燃烧冲压飞行器将像炮弹一样从3.2公里长的电磁轨道炮中向太空射出，飞行器在6万米高空达到10倍音速最大速度时跟宇宙飞船分离，飞行器利用自身涡轮发动装置回到地面，宇宙飞船则点燃尾部火箭继续上升，在到达预定轨道将卫星释放后返回地面。
优势明显
整个过程跟传统火箭运输相比在技术上要复杂得多，但其优点也相当明显。首先，它不需要携带大量燃料推进剂从而节省了数百万资金，其次还能够提高宇航员的安全。
更关键的是，由于飞行器和宇宙飞船回到地面24小时后即可执行新任务，人类今后可以更频繁地送卫星上天。这项方案也为未来向月球发射载人飞行器奠定了基础。
技术成熟
NASA的专家们表示，将航天器射入太空的方法听起来似乎很不真实，但其间涉及的各种技术其实已经发展得相当成熟，相关的试飞实验在10年内就可以展开。
肯尼迪宇航中心的物理学家斯坦・斯塔尔透露，NASA研发的超音速燃烧冲压飞行器已经能以10倍音速飞行12秒，波音公司的X-51超音速燃烧冲压飞行器今年春天以5倍音速飞行了破纪录的200秒，新方案需要的超高速飞行器已经有了基本雏形。此外，美国军方正在测试一种新型的电磁发射装置，设计专用于发射航天器的电磁轨道炮也并非难事。
“我们已经有了所有原料，现在要考虑的只是怎样把蛋糕烤出来。” NASA航天专家保罗・巴尔托洛塔对这个项目的前景信心十足。

description.hltext_display: Che sfortuna il compleanno a Natale
description.author: Nino Materi
description.content: Davanti alla torta con le candeline il terribile motivetto Tanti auguri a teee...tanti auguri a teee... crea un certo imbarazzo; ma se poi, nella stessa stanza, c pure il presepe e il coro che intona Tu scendi dalle stelleee, o mio Signoooreee..., allora vuol dire che il destino ti perseguita. Come sanno bene quelli nati il 25 dicembre, al pari del Bambino Ges: uomini e donne che, forti di questa sacra congiunzione astrale, provano da una vita a fare miracoli. Senza riuscirci, ovviamente. Ma se avessero dal Padreterno almeno un bonus per un prodigio gratis, come lo impiegherebbero? Soldi, Ferrari, villa con piscina, un tt tt con le tet di Pamela Anderson (per i maschietti), un randevouz con Rocco Siffredi (per le femminucce)? Macch. Il nato del 25 dicembre (che da questo momento chiameremo confidenzialmente 25dicembrese) chiederebbe solo una grazia: lo spostamento del compleanno al giorno 25 di qualsiasi altro mese dellanno. Trasformando cos il proprio status anagrafico in 25gennaiese, 25febbraiese, 25marzese e via scalando di mese in mese, fermandosi per al 25novembrese. Perch il 25 dicembre festeggiare il Natale pi che sufficiente; per le feste di compleanno ci sono invece gli altri 364 giorni lanno. Lo diciamo a vantaggio degli stessi 25dicembresi che sanno bene - sulla loro pelle - cosa significhi la beffa del regalo cumulativo. Spieghiamo. Un povero cristo nato il 25 dicembre non becca mai due regali (uno per Natale e uno per il compleanno) ma un solo pacco onnicomprensivo che, di solito, proprio un pacco, nel senso che un dono riciclato. Avete presente? Portafotografie con cornice inox; palle di vetro con Babbo Natale e neve galleggiante; terrificanti parfum de toilette natural spray acquistato in stock al discount; sciarpe 100% acrilico; guanti da neve risalenti allepoca di Gustav Thoeni; putti in ceramica e via paccottigliando. Un campionario di carabattole che poi finisce puntualmente nei siti web dei regali mostruosi, pronto per finire sulle bancarelle dei dono sgraditi dove vige lantica legge del baratto. Gli effetti?. Tragicomici. Un esempio: offri lorribile cravatta (gentile omaggio della suocera) e rimedi il set di tovaglioli di Padre Pio; oppure: cerchi di rifilare il portabiscotti del Mulino Bianco e ti cucchi in cambio linsalatiera a forma di melanzana. Ma a proposito di sfiga natalizia, cosa dicono gli astri a proposito dei 25dicembrini? Lo zodiaco, alla voce Capricorno, affila ben bene le corna: I nati nel giorno di Natale amano sperimentare in prima persona gli aspetti pi insoliti della vita (tra cui quello di ricevere le statuine dei Re Magi come regalo di compleanno). E poi: In realt proprio ci che aiuta a elevarsi al di sopra delle attivit terrene che risveglia maggiormente il loro interesse, e spesso la ricerca di stati sublimi o eccezionali (tutto merito delloro incenso e mirra portati da Gaspare, Melchiorre e Baldassarre?). Altre importanti caratteristiche: Essi possono arrivare a tali situazioni attraverso le varie forme darte, come la musica o la danza, piuttosto che con delle esperienze religiose, o magari solamente usando limmaginazione (la stessa immaginazione che usano nellimmaginare, appunto, un regalo decente).

description.hltext_display: Christmas in Afghanistan
description.author: no@spam.com (Orbit News Ltd
description.content:
TWO Warrington soldiers will be spending Christmas on the front-line in Afghanistan.
They are Lieutenant Shaun Clarke, aged 26 and Corporal Kate Lawless, aged 23.
Shaun, a Para with 2nd Battalion Parachute Regiment, and Kate who serves with the Royal Military Police (RMP), are usually based in Colchester but are currently on operational duty in the Nahr-e-Saraj district of Helmand Province. These are some of the furthest forward British troops in counter insurgency operations.
Shaun is a Platoon Commander in one of the rifle platoons and as such is one of the soldiers out on the ground on patrol. Kate, however is in the RMP unit that is attached to the Paras.
Both Shaun and Kate have been receiving a steady supply of parcels and letters of support from friends and family back in Warrington.
Kate said: "I've been sent lots of goodies to eat, sweets, biscuits and magazines. It all helps to make life a bit more comfortable."
Both have also been sent Warrington Wolves rugby shirts from members of their families as they are supporters of the club.
In wishing everyone back in Warrington a Merry Christmas Shaun and Kate said: "Thanks to everyone back in Warrington for all the parcels and letters. We wish Warrington Wolves every success in the New Year. Have a great Christmas and we look forward to coming home in May".
The two soldiers didn't know each other prior to their deployment to Afghanistan but both said they expect that they will remain friends once their tour has finished. However, Kate joked: "Yes, we'll remain friends unless Lieutenant Clarke gets himself into trouble and I have to arrest him!"

・油彩で、
・人体のような形がいくつも画面に散らばって、ジャクソン・ポロックの「オール・オーヴァー」ように混沌とした印象
・全体的に白い。しかし型紙のようにみえる人体はわずかに認識できる

このような漠然とした記憶なので、せめてヒントをいただけたらと思い、投稿いたしました。
もし心あたりありましたら、それを基に自分で調べたく。。。よろしくお願いします。

description.hltext_display: ? '청목회 로비의혹' 권경석 의원 소환조사
description.content:
청원경찰 입법로비 의혹을 수사 중인
서울북부지검 형사6부는 어제(21)
한나라당 권경석 의원을 소환해 조사했습니다.
권 의원은 청목회로부터 2천만 원의
불법 후원금을 받은 혐의를 받고 있는데
어제 오전 10시30분쯤 지검 청사로 출석해
조사를 받은 뒤
저녁 7시20분쯤 집으로 돌아갔습니다.
검찰은 앞서 소환조사한 한나라당 조진형,
유정현 의원에 이어 연내에 민주당 최규식
의원 등 연루 의원들에 대한 조사를 마치고
후원금의 대가성 같은 혐의점이 드러난
의원들을 정치자금법 위반 등의 혐의로

description.hltext_display: LED Prober Supplier MPI Adopts Ares ArgoERP for Flexible Configuration
description.author: Ares International Corp
description.content: --(PR.com)-- Ares International Corp. recently introduced ArgoERP for MPI Corporation, a major LED prober supplier in Taiwan.In the past, Taiwan-based manufacturers used to adopt various information systems without a system that can integrate purchase, sales and inventory management while having duplicated data inputs. As such, cost estimation is time-consuming and laborious. With the expansion of operational scale, the enterprise will be in urgent need of integrating internal information. MPI is no exception. The company requires a new ERP system that can integrate its information and self-configured MES (manufacturing execution system) while solving the above-mentioned problems.After much estimation and comparison, MPI has decided to adopt ArgoERP because Ares has years of consulting experiences and various best practices in different industries. Additionally, MPI was impressed by the friendly interface and flexible settings of ArgoERP.During system introduction, Ares consultants offer a series of educational trainings for MPI to quickly understand and be familiar with the multi-module functions and various flexible settings. The trainings include basic settings and management of finance, production, general ledger/asset, expense, sales/inventory, procurement and costs. Consequently, MPI users can fully understand the complete functions and benefits of ArgoERP. During the process of system introduction, Ares fully cooperated with MPI to discuss and solve problems MPI had while continually tracking system status and making improvements afterwards.After the system went live, MPI can accurately calculate its costs by integrating existing MES with ArgoERP, thereby improving competitiveness amid a more cost-efficient operation. ArgoERPhas complete features for heterogeneous system integration, said MPI, adding that the service quality of Ares consultants and engineers are also outstanding.Established in 1995, MPI focuses on microelectronics probing technology. A major LED prober provider in Asia, MPI is currently the only Taiwan-based supplier of semiconductor wafer probe cards and LED wafer probers that is listed on the Taiwan stock market.Introduction of ArgoERPArgoERP provides global mainstream innovative technology, limitless information integration, complete and advanced system functions as well as a user-friendly interface. Therefore,ArgoERP can meet the needs of the multi-business and multi-product operational strategies of the enterprise. Major customers of ArgoERP include Advanced Optoelectronic Technology (AOT), Inc., Amkor Technology, Inc., AOpen Inc., CAREMED SUPPLY, INC., China Engine Corporation, China Ryoden Co., Ltd, DaimlerChrysler AG. Taiwan, Famtech Inc., HannStar Display and Hitachi Taiwan.For more information on ArgoERP: http://www.ares.com.tw/ArgoERP/enIntroduction of AresAres International Corp. is the first Taiwan-based software company to be listed on the Taiwan Stock Exchange (TSE). Established for 30 years, Ares is a professional management information system software provider, with expertise in product R&D and system integration. Ares provides products and total solutions for e-enterprise, with service areas covering financial, government and enterprise segments. Ares has received CMMI L3 certification, has outstanding project integration ability, quality guarantee ability, development and maintenance ability and the most complete professional consultancy team.###

description.hltext_display: Lion girls 9-1 entering holiday jam
description.content:
At Empire, a difficult first half of girls basketball by both the Ravens and the visiting Pusch Ridge Lions was followed by an ugly second-half accident.
The Lions won easily, 44-24. They’re 9-1 entering the Northwest Desert Classic, which will be played both at Pusch Ridge and Mountain View high schools Dec. 27-30.
Late in the fourth quarter last week, junior guard Caroline Roessler went crashing into the floor, face first, after being fouled by an awkward Raven. She suffered a major concussion, and may have other complications.
Pusch Ridge coach Lonnie Tvrdy did not think it was a dirty foul. “The defender was off balance and there was contact,” Tvrdy said.
The Lions led at halftime 11-10, the two clubs were a combined five of 27 from the floor in the first quarter, and neither team made a field goal the first four minutes of the second quarter.
“In the first half,” Tvrdy said, “there was way too much individual play. They were ad-libbing. We were making one pass and shooting.”
Pusch Ridge found some offense in the second half, making six out of nine field goals attempts in the third quarter. Haley Christensen and Gabrielle Courtney each tallied 13 for the Lions.
“In the first half, our defensive effort wasn’t where it needed to be,” Christensen said. “We decided to work as a team. We needed each other and used each other. We helped each other in the second half.
“This team struggles with being vocal,” Tvrdy said. “We were talking more in the second half. In the second half, they knew where the other players were on each play.
“Our identity is defense,” Tvrdy said. “It picked up in the second half and we were getting easy baskets because of it.”
Defensive pressure “starts with our starting guards, Abby Maas, Caroline Roessler and Gabrielle Courtney,” Tvrdy said. “They set the tone. Don’t let people beat you off the dribble.”
It helps when Christensen plays with “focused intensity,” Tvrdy said. “When the post players shore up their defense, we’ll be a tremendous team.”

description.hltext_display: Huawei presents Green ICT technology in Bahrain
description.content:
Huawei, a world-leading communication solutions provider, will present its wide range of Green ICT Technology at the 1st Annual ENERGYCON (IEEE International Energy Conference & Exhibition) which will be held from December 18th to 22rd at the Gulf Hotel, Manama, Bahrain. The inaugural event with the theme of 'Towards Sustainable Energy" is hosted by the premier IEEE forum for the exchange of technology and experience in the practical application of green technologies.
At the event Huawei will demonstrate their advanced Green ICT Technology and Smart Grid management offer solutions which help save energy, reduce operational cost and increase reliability and transparency for the Kingdom of Bahrain and the Middle East Region alike. Exhibition delegates will also have the opportunity to experience a broad portfolio of ICT network infrastructure and applications for the vertical market sectors including Government, Oil & Gas, Electrics, Smart meter, Smart surveillance, SCADA, Smart Home, and much more. Rapid urbanization creates vital resource utilization and complex city management. The digital city encompasses diverse ICT technologies to construct an efficient, transparent and service-oriented Government which is capable of maintaining long-term urban stability for a sustainable economy. Huawei's end-to-end solutions offer a varied range of Green ICT Technology & Solutions architecture to meet the diversified demands of the region's growing Oil & Gas, Electrics, Energy industry and to accommodate large quantities of data collection, transmission and processing requirements. By integrating Green ICT Technology with Smart Grid Management, Huawei is dedicated to revolutionize the Oil & Gas, Electrics & Energy sector with cost-effective and smart solutions to provide the best services. Mr Liuqi, Vice President for Enterprise in the Middle East, Huawei said, "Huawei is very pleased to be part of this esteemed event which reflects the investments of the Bahrain Government's continued vision and goals to create future growth of the Kingdom and its society. As sustainable energy is an important facet in energy efficiency and environment protection, we recognize that the implementation of Green ICT Technology and solutions architecture will continue to reduce emission of carbon dioxide. Driven by the rapid deployment of new Green technologies and environmental considerations, we are realizing the "Green Networked World" through ubiquitous connectivity and services." Being a significant player in the international market, Huawei entered the Middle East enterprise section in 2002 as a solutions provider to Aramco, the world's largest oil producer. This initial venture into the Middle East was for provision of the highest switching capacity of digital telephone switches to Aramco. Huawei has since cooperated with Aramco to provide a variety of Green ICT Technology based solutions which include MSAN, Datacom, IP PBX & IP Phones etc. Huawei is a key vendor to the Middle East's major operators including Saudi Telecom Company (STC), Ettihad Etisalat (Mobily) and Zain and is currently working with a number of enterprise and government entities in the provision of end to end Green ICT Technology solutions.
About Huawei:Huawei is a leading telecoms solutions provider serving 45 of the world's top 50 telecom operators. Huawei's products and solutions have been deployed in over 100 countries and support the communications needs of one third of the world's population. The company is committed to providing innovative and customized products, services and solutions to create long-term value and growth potential for its customers. For more information, visit Huawei online: www.huawei.com Media contact:Partha SrinivasanMarket BuzzTel: +971 4 3625400

description.hltext_display: 韩国在延坪岛海域进行实弹射击训练（组图）
description.content:
编者按：受朝鲜半岛紧张局势加剧影响，亚洲股市周一出现普遍下跌。中国A股周一上午大跳水。韩国政府20日表示，如果朝鲜半岛局势发展引发金融市场动荡，将会采取稳定措施，比如对生活必需品的供需计划、稳定股市和金融市场的对策，以及稳定出口的对策等。
12月21日，韩国，居民和士兵乘船抵达延坪岛港口。当日，仁川港前往延坪岛的航线重开。图为复航后首艘民用船只抵达延坪岛。

description.hltext_display: 福布斯最贵购物榜出炉 俄富翁买下岛屿最具勇气
description.content:
这处名为“新荷兰”的岛屿花去了阿布的4亿美元。他计划在岛上兴建艺术展览馆、专卖店、酒店以及宾馆。据《福布斯》统计，阿布身家约有112亿美元。
位居第二位的是对冲基金主席，他投资1.45亿美元在现代艺术品市场上。第三位由巴基斯坦人获得，他投资9500万美元购得伦敦知名俱乐部酒店，曼沙为该酒店的每个房间支付了约150万美元价格。
这样的消费的确令人咋舌，不过住在4亿的岛上是不是就一定比普通人住在自己温暖踏实的小窝里更快乐和舒服呢？大概只有富翁们自己才解个中滋味了。

description.hltext_display: Norfolk VA Jury Returns $2.3 Million Jury Verdict for Birth Injury...
description.content:
Jim Lewis of Shapiro, Cooper, Lewis, & Appleton attained a $2.3 million jury verdict for a child in Norfolk, Virginia (VA) who suffered nerve damage and permanent arm injuries after a midwife negligently pulled the child's head and arms to combat what is called shoulder dystocia during birth. The midwife was hired by the obstetrician/gynecologist of the mother.
A jury determined the midwife's negligent care was the cause of the child's permanent nerve damage and arm injury.
The jury deliberated for about five hours before returning the $2.3 million verdict. The jury also awarded $60,000 in special damages to the mother for reimbursement of medical expenses.
Jim Lewis fought hard to get as much compensation as possible since his client's life will be changed forever due to the injury. Just think, this child may never be able to play sports, ride a bike, or even get dressed normally without the assistance of another person or special training because of the negligent care provided at birth.
To learn more about this jury verdict (and similar verdicts) check out our personal injury law firm's website at http://www.HSInjurylaw.com or our medical malpractice blog at http://va-nc-medical-surgery-malpractice-attorneys.com/
Tags: medical malpractice, medical negligence, shoulder, dystocia, nerve damage, arm injury, injuries, child, birth, injury, verdict, damages, medical, expenses
Court Case Was Handled In: Norfolk Circuit Court

もう楽しみで楽しみで。

description.hltext_display: 강성 “무릎 앉아 세레나데 듣고파” 걸그룹 애정 공세에 화들짝
description.content: [뉴스엔 권수빈 기자]SBS 드라마 ‘괜찮아, 아� 딸’을 통해 연기자에 도� �한 가수 강성이 녹화장에 있던 한 걸그룹 멤버에게 당돌한 � � �공세를 받았다.강성은 최근 녹화한 MBC every1 예능 프로그램 ‘러브추격자’의 메인 게스트로 출연했다. 강성에게 한 걸그룹 멤버는 “머리부터 발끝까지 좋다”며 � �극� �으로 마음을 표현했다.이 걸그룹 멤버는 강성의 생일 파티를 준비하는 것은 물� , 강성의 어머니를 찾아가 뇌물 공세까지 펼치는 대범함까지 � 보였다. 가끔은 과한 행동으로 강성을 당혹스럽게 했지만 그래도 외롭� 쓸쓸했던 강성의 마음을 녹여주기엔 충분했다.그녀는 “강성의 무릎에 앉아 세� �나데를 듣� 싶다”는 소원을 내걸기도 했다. 측근들은 두 사람의 러브라인 가능성을 강하게 � �시해 강성의 얼굴을 붉게 만들었다. 12월 23일 방송.권수빈 ppbn@newsen.com기사� �보 및 보도자료 newsen@newsen.comcopyrightⓒ 뉴스엔. 무단� �재 & 재배포 금지

description.hltext_display: 5 محصول جديد رنو براي حضور در بازار ايران رونمايي شد
description.content:
خبرگزاري موج - همزمان با مراسم افتتاح رسمي هفتمين نمايشگاه خودرو اصفهان از پنح محصول جديد شرکت رنو براي حضور در بازار ايران رونمايي شد.
به گزارش خبرنگار موج، شرکت نگين خودرو نماينده رسمي شرکت رنو فرانسه در ايران مسئوليت عرضه اين خودروهاي جديد را بر عهده دارد.
براساس اين گزارش مراسم رونمايي از محصولات جديد رنو با حضور مديرعامل رنو در ايران و مديرعامل شرکت نگين خودرو در غرفه شرکت نگين خودرو واقع در هفتمين نمايشگاه بين المللي خودرو اصفهان برگزار شد.
در اين غرفه که هشت محصول رنو به نمايش درآمده است از پنج محصول اين شرکت شامل Koleos، Scala(مگان کوپه)، Fluence، Latitude و Megan RS براي اولين در ايران رونمايي شد.
يادآور مي شود که هفتمين نمايشگاه خودرو اصفهان از امروز به مدت پنج روز تا چهارم دي ماه امسال در محل دائمي نمايشگاه هاي اصفهان از ساعت 15 تا 22 پذيراي علاقمندان و يازديدکنندگان است.

description.hltext_display: Gaga fan questioned by cops over 'backstage break-in'
description.content:
Lady Gaga was left distressed after a fan used fake backstage passes to sneak through strict security in a bid to meet the superstar at London's 02 Arena last week, according to reports. The Poker Face hitmaker put on two sold-out shows at the huge venue in the capital, but was left shocked before Thursday's when she was informed a devotee had made her way backstage.
The woman had forged passes which helped her evade the star's security team - and she was only caught out by Gaga's management as she made her way to the singer's dressing room, according to the Daily Mirror.
Police were called and the woman was reportedly released after questioning.
A source tells the newspaper, "This was a serious breach of security and the woman was heading in the direction of the stage and, more worryingly, Gaga's dressing room. "This woman had gone to great lengths to produce all the fake documentation so she could move at ease in the holding area backstage. "Gaga was understandably shaken by the incident but was a consummate professional and continued as per normal, putting on a dazzling show."

description.hltext_display: ・科学家合成一种高密度脂蛋白可助检测动脉硬化
Preservativo, il Vaticano: una notizia travisata, mai contro la gravidanza
description.author: Andrea Tornielli
description.content: Roma - Le frasi del libro intervista Luce del mondo di Benedetto XVI dedicate alluso del preservativo sono state strumentalizzate, il Papa non aveva intenzione di modificare la dottrina morale della Chiesa. Lo afferma una lunga nota della Congregazione per la dottrina della fede, pubblicata su LOsservatore Romano. Come si ricorder, lo scorso 20 novembre, un passaggio del nuovo libro del Pontefice nel quale si definiva tra i casi giustificati delluso del profilattico quello di chi si prostituisce essendo infetto dallAids, aveva attirato lattenzione dei media di tutto il mondo. Quella frase, estrapolata dal suo contesto, e non perfettamente tradotta dalloriginale tedesco, aveva ingenerato lidea che Benedetto XVI avesse cambiato la posizione della Chiesa. La nuova edizione italiana ha tradotto pi letteralmente la frase dal tedesco e ora lex SantUffizio denuncia la strumentalizzazione del pensiero papale per scopi e interessi estranei al senso delle sue parole, che risulta evidente qualora si leggano interamente i capitoli dove si accenna alla sessualit umana. Linteresse di Ratzinger, ribadisce la nota appare chiaro: ritrovare la grandezza del progetto di Dio sulla sessualit, evitandone la banalizzazione oggi diffusa. Dunque nessuna svolta epocale. Per quanto riguarda la pagina in questione, la Congregazione vaticana fa notare come Benedetto XVI non parli della morale coniugale e nemmeno della norma morale sulla contraccezione: Lidea che dalle parole di Benedetto XVI si possa dedurre che in alcuni casi sia lecito ricorrere alluso del profilattico per evitare gravidanze indesiderate del tutto arbitraria e non risponde n alle sue parole n al suo pensiero. Il Papa, dunque, si riferiva soltanto al caso completamente diverso della prostituzione, comportamento che la morale cristiana da sempre ha considerato gravemente immorale. Chi sa di essere infetto dallHiv e quindi di poter trasmettere linfezione continua la nota dellex SantUffizio oltre al peccato grave contro il sesto comandamento ne commette anche uno contro il quinto, perch consapevolmente mette a serio rischio la vita di unaltra persona, con ripercussioni anche sulla salute pubblica. Perci chi ricorre al profilattico per diminuire il rischio per la vita di unaltra persona intende ridurre il male connesso al suo agire sbagliato. La Congregazione critica chi ha fatto ricorso, per spiegare la posizione papale, alla teoria del cosiddetto male minore, suscettibile di interpretazioni fuorvianti. Benedetto XVI non ha infatti detto che la prostituzione con il profilattico possa essere lecitamente scelta come male minore, perch la Chiesa insegna che la prostituzione immorale. Ma se, nonostante questo, la persona sieropositiva che si prostituisce, per diminuire il pericolo di contagio usa il profilattico, ci pu costituire un primo passo nel rispetto della vita degli altri, anche se la malizia della prostituzione rimane in tutta la sua gravit. La nota della Congregazione per la dottrina della fede non accenna al problema delluso del preservativo allinterno di una coppia nella quale uno dei due sposi sia sieropositivo, tema sul quale la discussione dei teologi moralisti rimane aperta. Ma intende mettere fine a certe interpretazioni delle parole papali, che hanno provocato sia gli entusiasmi degli aperturisti, sia le preoccupazioni dei conservatori.

description.hltext_display: Professional Standards Institute Announces New Reengineered Professional Certification Programs
description.content:
Professional Standards Institute today announced the December 20th release of reengineered professional certification programs.
ROCKLEDGE, FL (PRWEB) December 22, 2010
Professional Standards Institute (PSI), a professional certification and education association established in 1997, today announced the release of a completely reengineered certification program that provides a wide variety of options to include three levels of certification, area specializations, and certification endorsements. In addition, new re-certification guidelines and the web site have been completely redeveloped from the ground up.
“We have spent the last three years researching and redeveloping our program. We have taken a ‘real world' approach with our certification programs by providing credentials that reflect a level of knowledge and capability an individual has attained,” said G. Allen Harris, Executive Director. “Most credentials from other certification organizations simply describe the area in which an individual is certified. Our credentials go a step further and indicate the knowledge level of the certification holder.”
Professional Standards Institute now offers three levels of certification: Associate Level, Senior Level, and Master Level. The Associate Level is an “entry-level” certification for those individuals starting out in a specific field. The Senior Level certification is for those individuals who have attained an advanced level of expertise and knowledge in their field. It is recommended that an individual have at least five years of experience in their field prior to applying for the certification. The Master Level certification is for those seasoned professionals who have attained a broad expert knowledge and mastery in their chosen field. It is strongly recommended that an individual have at least ten years of experience in the field prior to applying for the certification. “The certifications offered by Professional Standards Institute are vendor-neutral, role-based, and are very appropriate to many functions within an organization,” said Clayton Lundy, President of JCL Enterprises, Inc. “There are several positions within most organizations that are directly related to their professional certifications.”
In addition to three levels of certification, area specializations and certification endorsements are available for some certifications at the Senior and Master levels. Specializations identify unique areas within a certification field that an applicant has attained specialized knowledge, such as information technology or information security. Endorsements identify additional skill sets that can be applied within a certification field, such as educator/trainer, project lead, or consultant. Specializations and endorsements increase the value of a certification by indicating that an applicant can apply their knowledge uniquely within a certification field.
An important aspect of any certification program is how re-certification is accomplished and evaluated. Professional Standards Institute has reengineered the guidelines for re-certification for all programs. Re-certification can be accomplished through a combination of education, full-time employment, and teaching experience, which can be submitted on-line. A simple Professional Development Credit (PDC) program has been established to evaluate a certification holder's accomplishments for re-certification purposes. Each level of certification has a specific amount of PDC's to accumulate during the three-year certification period. The new PDC requirements provide for valuable continued professional development in a field.
"We have found PSI's certifications to be valuable assets on the resumes of our contract candidates, primarily because they represent real-world experience and hands-on expertise," said Daniel James, CEO at Larkin Industries, Inc. "Anyone can memorize facts and parrot them on a certification exam. PSI's exams ensure that candidates actually know what they're talking about."
Professional Standards Institute started a new, free membership program. Individuals must become a member prior to applying for certifications. PSI is currently looking for Affinity Programs for its members.
The final piece of Professional Standards Institute's reengineering efforts is the redevelopment of the PSI web site, designed to be more intuitive, simple to use, and easy to find information. A certification transcript page has been added to display current and past certifications, testing history, and certification logos available for download and use on personal web sites, resumes, and business cards. In addition, certification verification has been added to the web site. Certificate holders can provide a verification password to employers and potential employers that can be easily entered on the new web site to verify a certification.
“We have plans for many additional offerings. First and foremost, we are working with new Subject Matter Experts for the development of new certifications in business, information technology, quality, and education,” said G. Allen Harris, Executive Director. “In addition, we will soon be offering self-paced continuing education courses and instructor-taught professional development courses. We are also developing new education and research fellowship programs. These will provide exciting new opportunities for our members.”
Obtaining professional certification is extremely beneficial to individuals because it proves to potential and current employers an advanced level of knowledge in a field. Professional Standards Institute's certifications go a step further by ensuring that this knowledge is obtained through experience and not merely bookwork. Professional Standards Institute is dedicated to the establishment, development, and preservation of high professional standards and ethics. For more information, please visit http://www.ProfessionalStandardsInstitute.com.
###
For the original version on PRWeb visit: http://www.prweb.com/releases/prwebprofessional/certification/prweb4919554.htm

description.hltext_display: 分析师预测100多美国城市明年或破产
description.content:
星岛环球网消息：据中国之声《全球华语广播网》报道，华尔街知名分析师梅勒迪丝·惠特尼日前大胆预测，多达100多个美国城市有可能在明年宣告破产。惠特尼对全球金融危机的发生曾经做出过准确的预测，惠特尼表示，曾经让银行纷纷倒闭并且威胁国家金融的债务危机，不久的将来可能会导致各地方政府崩盘。
按照惠特尼的说法，地方的巨额债务，是美国仅次于房地产市场的另一个最重大的问题，也确实是美国经济的最大威胁。
据报道，目前美国各州的开支已比税收超出近5000亿美元，退休基金将面临1万亿美元的资金缺口，许多地方政府被迫大幅削减预算。
以底特律为例，包括警力、照明、道路维护和清洁等服务的预算纷纷遭到削减，有多达20%的居民因此受到影响。
伊利诺伊州州政府的财政也同样捉襟见肘，该州目前的开支为实际税收的一倍，而且还款已经拖欠近六个月，仅伊利诺伊大学就负债4亿美元。伊利诺伊州违约不付债的可能性高达21%，比其他任何州都要高。
另外，佛罗里达州也可能陷入无力偿还债务的困境。目前，美国各州为了弥补财政缺口，除了削减预算外，也开始纷纷设法增加税收或采用别的方法，例如加利福尼亚州州立大学的学费上涨了32%，而亚利桑纳州则是采用把部分政府大楼先出售给投资人，然后再承租回来的办法，以节省开支。
金融危机爆发两年多来，美国经济复苏乏力，美国民众忧心忡忡。如今又有坏消息传来，不知道美国人在听到这些后会作何反应。就这一话题，今天在线参与讨论的是财经评论员马光远博士。
主持人：我们听说过，个人破产、公司破产、连国家都能破产，城市破产似乎也不新鲜。但首先还是想请您给做一下普及，城市破产究竟是什么概念？
马光远：在美国的破产法里面，关于市政破产是有一个明确的规定的，目前我们看到这么一个情况，所谓100多个城市要破产等等，这是一种不太严谨的说法，也就是说它的财政赤字比较大，可能会入不敷出，还不了钱，用一个比较艺术的说法就叫破产，但是真正还没有到这么一个程度，没有到美国破产法里面规定的关于市政破产的标准问题。
我们现在只是说，美国联邦政府现在的财政赤字，跟目前美国比较高的负债率一样，而且由于整个经济复苏不利，消费上不去，税收上不来，导致一方面财政收入有问题，另一方面在支出上仍然压缩不下来，导致它可能会入不敷出。但是我觉得这种入不敷出本身从真正破产角度来讲，应该说比所谓讲100多个城市肯定要少很多，但是如果说按照严格的标准，按照美国破产法市政破产的标准我觉得还不只100个。
主持人：不管怎么说，100多个城市预计会被债务拖垮，还是很夸张的一件事情。名目支出太多，疯狂借贷，信用过度扩张，这些都是问题的症结。给自己挖了坑，一时半会儿可能也爬不出去。美国经济前景是不是非常微妙？
马光远：我觉得这个对美国经济而言，当然它市政破产，比如说美国财政的赤字，市政的赤字本身并不意味着美国民众生活受到很大的影响。仅仅说政府很缺钱，政府在很多支出方面可能会捉襟见肘。
从经济本身的复苏来讲，当然前一段时间伯南克也讲过，影响美国经济的两个主要因素，一个是失业率，第二个就是财政赤字。
美国需要在这两大问题上做很大的努力才能看到一个复苏的曙光，因为我们知道对于美国经济而言，事实上是经济学上最重要的指标仍然是它失业率的问题，失业率到现在9.8%，没有一点下降趋势的话，说明美国经济本身的复苏是相当慢的，比我们的预期要低很多。
所以我预计，这一次如果圣诞的这种节日在这种旺季，如果说拉动不起来的话，这个复苏我们应该说有更多的耐心，再加上今年整个财政赤字差不多快11%了，如果放在欧盟国家去，也就是我们所讲的国家破产的一个概念了。所以整体来讲，它的财政赤字，它的失业率等等，导致这两个后腿拉着美国经济往前走，导致它的复苏可能前景，我觉得还是要慢很多，所以全球也好，美国民众也好，美国政府也好，都要保持一定的耐心。

description.hltext_display: Reporter in bunny suit has Ukraine parliament hopping mad
description.content:
Kiev - A Ukrainian journalist who dressed in a bunny suit in a stunt to highlight the hypocrisy of his country's parliamentarians was insulted and ignored when trying to interview elected officials, local reports said Wednesday.
Journalist Roman Vitoniev donned a head-to-toe furry white outfit with floppy pink ears attached to interview legislators about a massive brawl in parliament last week that left five members hospitalised and dozens with cuts and bruises.
But instead parliament spokeswoman Iryna Kameliuk said Vitoniev's was wearing "inappropriate attire" and instructed him to leave the premises.
A group of reporters then asked Kameliuk whether she considered fistfights between parliament members appropriate behaviour. She ignored the question.
Most parliament members refused to speak with Vitonov on camera. Aleksander Efremov, leader of the majority, declined an interview saying "sorry, I'm in a hurry."
Another parliament member told Vitoniev his rabbit costume displayed "insufficient respect for the national legislature."
"If the Verkhovna Rada is turning into a circus, then this needs to be officially acknowledged and people need to dress appropriately," Vintoniev said.
The fight in parliament last Friday pitted members for the Regions of Ukraine majority against the minority Motherland party. More than 70 deputies participated in the melee.
The pro-Russia Regions members employed superior weight and numbers to defeat their opponents.

description.hltext_display: Master of the bow
description.content:
Archery has come a long way in over 100 years.
English-style, five-foot-long longbows were first used in the United States for bowhunting and competitive archery. In the 1920s, professional engineers took an interest, eventually developing the shorter, more efficient recurve and compound bows.
“When I was in my young 20s, I got my first taste with the longbow hunting deer in western North Dakota,” says Minnesota native Maury Bergh, who has had a love affair with archery since the late 1940s.
Next year, the Oro Valley resident – who thrives on challenges and competition – has a new goal: refining the accuracy of his relatively new compound bow for National Senior Olympics in Houston, Texas.
Bergh, 82, will compete in the 80-to-84-year-old archery event because he won his state age bracket in Phoenix earlier this year.
He’s only had his three-foot-long, 43-pound compound bow for about a year.
“I wasn’t pleased with my performance in Phoenix,” adds Bergh, who still finished first in his age bracket, “but I know it can get better!” His old bow was a 50 pounds.
The crux of his challenge: an even release of his new bow to insure a more accurate shot.
Most competitive archers – likely three of every four, he estimates – use the relatively new trigger method for a precise release. Bergh, however, prefers the string held with three fingers before release.
“I tried it (the trigger approach) and really didn’t like it as well as the three-finger approach,” he said.
The mechanical trigger permits a single point of contact on the string. That creates less deformity in the string at full draw, plus a more consistent release.
Bergh intends to work on a steadier release at Precision Shooting Equipment’s indoor range near the Tucson Mall – his usual practice site here – with the archery equipment company’s employees.
“When 2011 rolls around, I’ll likely start three- or four-times-a-week practices – with at least 90 arrows each time – before the nationals (in June).”
His competition goal: “If I’m in the 700s each of two days, I believe I’ll be OK.” That’s a formidable task – an average eight score of the 180 arrows over two days from 40, 50 and 60 yards.
Compound bow designs use cams or elliptical wheels on the end of the limbs, reducing force required to hold string at full draw. First developed in 1966, the compound only recently became the most commonly used bow in competition.
In 1997, Bergh finished fourth in the 60-to-65-year-old bracket when the nationals were in Tucson. That’s been his only other nationals competition.
“I really like the Senior Olympics,” said Bergh, who became a competitive archer in the mid-1990s, “because we have both local and state competition each year.” The nationals are every two years.
Bergh also enjoys four other pastimes – swimming, carving ornate wall hangings and shelves out of oak, sorting through 2,500 football and baseball cards, and restoring antique carpentry tools.
Both Bergh and wife Edith worked 30 years for the North Dakota Telephone Co., then were consultants across the country providing engineering and construction for various communications projects for 22 years. They moved to Oro Valley in 1991.
Some of the younger archery competitors (persons just over 50) are unbelievably talented, offers Bergh. “We (his 80-plus competitors) just ‘loop’ the arrows at the target. The younger ones just zip them in!”

แล้วช่วง 1 เดือนหลังมานี่รู้สึกว่าเวลาเน็ตหลุดแล้วมันต่อใหม่ค่อนข้างยาก (ปกติหลุดแล้วมันต่อใหม่ทันทีแต่เดี๋ยวนี้ต้องรอมากสุด 20 นาทีถึงจะต่อติด) ก็เลยสงสัยว่า modem router ตัวนี้มันจะเสียอ่ะครับเพราะใช้งานมาค่อนข้างนานแล้ว (ตั้งแต่ก่อน True จะ แถม modem มาอ่ะครับผมเองก้จำไม่ได้ว่าเมื่อไหร่) เลยอยากจะรบให้ท่านอื่นๆแนะนำ modem ตัวใหม่ที่ดีๆหน่อยอ่ะครับ เรื่องงบไม่อั้นอ่ะแต่อยากได้ของที่มันเสถียรๆหน่อย

description.hltext_display: Las Cámaras aragonesas ajustarán su plantilla pero no cerrará ninguna
description.content:
La decisión del Gobierno de eliminar la obligatoriedad del pago de la cuota cameral no provocará el cierre de ninguna cámara de comercio aragonesa, pero obligará a reducir sus plantillas. Así lo aseguró ayer el presidente de la institución zaragozana, Manuel Teruel, que optó por la prudencia y prefirió no cifrar el recorte. Con todo, varias fuentes reconocen que el ajuste en la comunidad podría ser "relevante" y el presidente nacional de las Cámaras, Javier Gómez- Navarro, habló hace unos días de 3.250 empleos menos en España. Actualmente, en la institución cameral de Zaragoza trabajan 60 personas (sin contar algunos servicios externalizados), 32 en la de Huesca y 20 en la de Teruel.
Aparte de las afecciones laborales, lo que más preocupa a los presidentes de las Cámaras aragonesas --que ayer se reunieron en el pleno del Consejo para posicionarse en contra de la supresión del canon-- son los perjuicios a las pequeñas empresas. Según destacaron, ellas serán las "verdaderas perjudicadas" porque son las grandes compañías las que aportan dos tercios de las cuotas, mientras que el asesoramiento lo recibe en un 99% las pymes. En su opinión, la eliminación del canon "pondrá en peligro" los servicios de internacionalización, de innovación o de apoyo al emprendedor. "Son las palancas más importantes para salir de la crisis, así que los efectos serán muy negativos", subrayó Teruel. Por todo ello, los líderes de las Cámaras aragonesas dejaron muy claro que intentarán frenar esta "imprudencia temeraria".
Que estas instituciones dejarán de ofrecer el mismo tipo de servicio si se elimina el canon que pagan todos los años las empresas es algo obvio teniendo en cuenta que las cuotas suponen el 60% del presupuesto total de las Cámaras (también de las aragonesas). Así, la de Zaragoza ingresa por este concepto 3,9 millones de euros, la de Huesca 900.000 y la de Teruel 500.000 euros, mientras que el resto de la financiación la obtienen mediante convenios con otras administraciones.
En este sentido, Manuel Teruel advirtió de que todo este proceso puede generar "una gran contradicción". "Podríamos convertir en públicos servicios que ahora se mantienen con financiación privada, porque si las empresas dejan de pagar nuestras funciones podrían acabar siendo financiadas por los ciudadanos", afirmó.
HUESCA Y TERUEL RESPIRAN Aunque reconoció que algunas de las Cámaras de Comercio más pequeñas (sobre todo las locales y comarcales) deberán cerrar, el presidente de la institución oscense, Manuel Rodríguez Chesa, dejó bien claro que la de Huesca y Teruel "no van a desaparecer". En esta misma línea se manifestó Teruel, que recordó que el modelo de financiación de España es el mismo que rige en casi todos los países europeos. "Las que no tengan más remedio que cerrar deberán nutrirse de las Cámaras grandes", aclaró Teruel, que apuntó que el presupuesto de 2011 "ya están resueltos".
Teruel incidió en que "el grueso" de los fondos de las Cámaras son aportadas por las grandes empresas. Así, recordó que un 70% de las empresas zaragozanas no paga nada o menos de 20 euros al año y que dos tercios de los ingresos proceden del 1,31% de las firmas de la provincia. "Telefónica, con 700.000 euros, es la compañía que más paga en España y la que más aporta en Aragón abona 6.000 euros", dijo Teruel para demostrar que la supresión de la cuota solo beneficiaría a las grandes empresas.

description.hltext_display: 芬兰经济正迅速复苏 估计2010年GDP增幅为3.2%
description.content:
据经济之声《天下财经》报道，芬兰财政部在20日发布的最新经济形势评估报告中显示，芬兰经济目前正在迅速复苏，估计今年国内生产总值(GDP)增幅将达3.2%，远超今年9月份预计的2.1%。

description.hltext_display: 告别力量敏捷？《暗黑3》基础属性重新设计
description.content:
不久之前我们决定改变角色核心属性的工作机制。我们将把我们遇到的问题，如何修复的，以及新属性的机理与您分享。
属性问题非常重大。考虑到你对暗黑2以及暗黑3中透露的核心属性已经非常熟悉了，如果不是，那么你会得到一些新消息。记住这不是一个游戏综合指导，只是对那些一直跟进游戏信息的玩家们给出一些游戏设计上的重要解释。
伤害混乱：
意志增加施法者的伤害(法师，巫医)，力量增加物理角色的伤害(武僧，野蛮人，恶魔猎手)。这很容易混乱，因为很多武僧的技能以及部分野蛮人的技能看上去是法术，而恶魔猎手看上去应该主要被敏捷而不是力量所影响――至少更合乎逻辑。
角色配置多样化：
核心属性对所有职业都有价值，并以此促进多样的角色配置，这是我们一直以来的目标。我们所用的方法和选择的属性乍一看达到了目标(或多或少)，但是事实是属性更依赖于你的职业。最终，意志和力量之间的伤害分离意味着，尽管这些属性很有用，大多数人为了伤害不会根据他们的职业选择属性。这就意味着每个职业最多有三个属性值得关注，这种选择太狭隘了。
能量(怒气/魔法/精神/其他)协调与前进：
暗黑是一个不断让你变强的前进式的游戏。这使得我们希望设计随着游戏进度不断变化的能量系统。然而，我们没有任何能量值。所以作为玩家如果你对可用的能量值很不满意，并无明显的可行之办法帮你摆脱困境。除去暗黑2的平衡性问题不看(也就是能量并不跟属性关联很大，反而主要是决定于吸蓝)，如果你想要更多的魔法，你知道能量系统是问题所在。调和能量系统比什么都困难，尤其当我们的目标是让这个系统随着游戏进程完美前进的时候。
因此，为了解决这些问题我们打算将核心属性从力量、敏捷、活力和意志改变为：
攻击(Attack)：增加伤害
精准(Precision)：增加暴击几率
活力(Vitality)：增加生命值
防御(Defense)：降低受到的伤害
意志(Willpower)：影响不同角色的能量

description.hltext_display: PCで日記をつけたい。（ＰＣ詳しい方教えてください） - ありがとうございます。
description.author: koko
description.content:
20年以上前から日記をつけていました。手書きが苦手なので当初はワープロ、Windows95が出た頃からはワードを利用していました。今は結婚して家族と共通のPCを使用しているため、お休みしていましたが、また日記やちょっとしたメモ代わりにＰＣで書き込めたらと思ったいます。
理想はブログのような形式ですが、ブログは非公開にしても外部にもれる可能性はないのか不安です。
日記ソフトの利用も考えていますが、こちらも万が一、ウィルス感染によって流出してしまわないか不安です。
昔のようにネット接続なしのワープロを購入するべきか、いろいろ悩んでいます。
ＰＣに詳しい方、アドバイスお願いいたします。
ユーザーID：2077933259
お気に入り登録数：24
古いレス順
レス数：11本
タイトル
投稿者
詳しくはないですが
2010年12月21日 10:43
どれだけお金を使えるか判りませんが、日記だけというのであれば安いネットブックでも買って、
絶対にインターネットにつなげないようにしながら notepad にでも書くと良いのではないでしょうか。
それでも紛失したらアウトですが。
ユーザーID：7874649822
くじら
2010年12月21日 10:47
ワープロってまだ売ってますか？
ネットに繋がっていないものが良いのならポメラはどうでしょう？
キングジムのメモ機器です。
ユーザーID：0007212804
てるてる坊主
2010年12月21日 10:48
だったらネットに接続しないで、パソコンで日記をつけては？
ワードやメモ帳に書いていくだけは味気ない…と思うなら、はじめだけネットにつないで、日記ソフトをダウンロード、インストール後はネット切断で。
日記ソフトの中には、ネット上のブログみたいな体裁で、好きなデザインを選べて写真も入れられ体裁を可愛くしたりできるものもあります。
窓の杜にあった「Osciroi」など楽しそうですよ。検索してみてください。
まあそれでもパソコンが壊れたら内容も消えてしまいますから、外付けハードディスクやUSBメモリなどにも保存していくと安心ですね。
ユーザーID：8579266723
ワード
2010年12月21日 11:07
ワードはネットにつなげなくても使用できることはご存知ですよね。
で、ネットをつなげているときにＰＣ内に保存しているワードの情報が抜き取られるかとご心配なのですか？
それなら、ＰＣでワードを使用するときは絶対にネットにつなげない状態にして、ＵＳＢメモリなどにワードで書いた日記を保存すればＰＣ内にワードの情報が残らないようにはできます。ネットカフェで作業する人はそうしています。ＰＣ内に保存しなければいいのです。もっとも、１００％安全とは言い切れませんが。
ユーザーID：9042096258
daina
2010年12月21日 11:14
無料レンタルのブログでは、完全に自分だけはなかなか難しいと思います。
インターネット接続サービスを提供している、会員制【有料】プロバイダであれば、たいてい会員サービスでブログやwebサイトがあり、信頼できる大手であれば、たいてい「公開する」「しない」また「検索よけする」「しない」を選べる【はず】です。
はず、というのは私、現在は一社のみの利用なので、情報が古いかもしれないので。
私はサイトとブログ両方借りていて、非公開・検索避けを選択してます。
今のところ、URLを直接教えた人以外が閲覧した痕跡はありません。
ただ、誰にも公開しないのにwebというのも、意味がわかりませんので、ネット上に保存せず、USBメモリとかに保存すれば、ソレを自分が持っていれば誰も見られないはず。よっぽど誰かが悪意をもってハードディスクにナニかしない限りは。
あとは、家族と共用のPCはやめて、安いのでいいから自分専用パソコンにして、ネットには繋がない、ならウィルス系のリスクはかなり低くなります。
心配しだすとキリがないですが。
ユーザーID：2203496520
酔うぞ
2010年12月21日 11:19
＞日記ソフトの利用も考えていますが、
＞こちらも万が一、ウィルス感染によって流出してしまわないか不安です。
ネット上にアップしないのであれば、ほとんど流出の可能性は無いでしょうけど、アンチウイルスソフトを確実にするために年間５０００円程度を掛けて、アンチウイルスソフトのアップデートが必要だと考えて下さい。
ネット接続しないワープロは、すでに無いようです。
ＰＣは、新品の設定がネット接続が不可避なので、ネット接続をしない機器はほぼ無いと言って間違えないです。
ユーザーID：6503577862
TB
2010年12月21日 15:01
私の日記はSNSのmixiにあります。
お友達に知っていてほしい日記は友人までの公開。
どうでもいい日記は全体に公開。
内緒の日記は非公開
公開範囲を選べますので好き勝手なことを書いています。
ブログは誰が見ているかわからないのでとても書けませんね。
ユーザーID：6563240630
まぜそば
2010年12月21日 18:06
もう性能的にアップグレードできないパソコンをお持ちで、それがWindows98などであれば、もうセキュリティアップデートもできませんから、LANケーブルや無線LANなどでインターネットに繋がずに使用するのが良いかもしれません。
ネットにつながっていなければウィルスに感染する危険も無く(USBメモリやフロッピーなどのメディアを使わなければ)、漏洩もありません。
もしくは、ポメラなどを買ってはどうでしょう。
ユーザーID：0936825224
aoi
2010年12月21日 19:18
うきうき家計簿とか、無料の家計簿ソフトに大抵は日記機能があります。
日記ついでに家計簿つけちゃえば一石二鳥！
勿論オンラインじゃないのでネットにつながない限りは情報漏えいはありません。
いかがでしょうか？
ユーザーID：1783685214
Goro
2010年12月21日 19:36
PuppyLunuxを使う。（日本語最新版は4.3.1JP ）
起動はCDから行い、pupsaveファイル（個人情報ファイル）をUSBメモリに作る。
この際に、pupsaveファイルは暗号化しておく。
通常の使用は、USBメモリをPCに接続し、CDから起動する。
御自宅のPCの環境に全く影響を与えません。
あなた様がUSBメモリを紛失しない限り安全です。
古いパソコンでも快適に動作し、およそ必要なアプリケーションを標準搭載し、そして無償のオペレーティングシステムです。
このOSは多くの方々の無償の貢献により設計されたもので、元々は世界中の子供たちへのエールとなるよう願いが込められ各国言語に翻訳されたものです。
詳しく御説明したくとも字数制限がございますので御容赦願います。
具体的な使用方法はネット上にいくらでもあります。
ユーザーID：5725115962
koko(トピ主)
2010年12月22日 15:43
御礼が遅くなって申し訳ありません。たくさんのレスありがとうございます。ひとつひとつ何度も読ませていただきました。どれも私の知らないことや思いつかないことばかりで、とても参考になりました。
私の状況（家族にも日記を書いていることを秘密にしたい、お金はあまりかけられない）で、一番簡単にできそうなのは、ワードさんを始め何人かの方のアドバイスにあったように、ＵＳＢメモリに保存して使うことなのかなと思いました。ブログに似た日記ソフトもあるんですね。こちらをＵＳＢメモリにダウンロードして、ネット接続を一時的に止めて、書き込みしたいと思います。
他の方達のレスもとても参考になりました。ありがとうございます。

description.hltext_display: ・考古发现古玛雅神庙或具备巨型扬声器功能
description.content:
据美国《国家地理杂志》报道，墨西哥考古学家近日发表了一项研究成果称，在扬声器和低音炮问世的数百年前，美洲古玛雅人可能就在有意或者无意间将建筑设计成了巨型扩音器和畸变放大器。
墨西哥国立自治大学考古学家弗朗西斯卡・扎拉奎特领导的一支研究小组指出，位于墨西哥中部的玛雅古城帕伦克的神庙可能构成一个巨大的扩音系统，能够将声音传播到很远的地方。根据他们的发现，帕伦克的公共广场和神庙在传送人声音方面的性能就像乐器一样。当时，表演者和司祭可能站在神庙顶上或者来到专门的“放音室”，向整个广场“播放”歌曲和圣歌。扎拉奎特的发现显示，古玛雅人可能通过在建筑上刷灰泥的方式达到扩音效果。
测量结果显示刷有灰泥的建筑能够改变声音的吸收和反射。扎拉奎特说：“我们认为古代的建造者有意对建筑进行改造，使其拥有扩音功能。”借助于现代声音测量仪器和3D电脑模型，研究人员发现帕伦克神庙顶部发出的声音传播距离至少相当于一个足球场的长度。
而另一支研究小组发现，除古玛雅人外，其他美洲古人也利用建筑处理声音。在秘鲁的安第斯山脉，一座地下迷宫在设计上不仅能够扩音，同时也可以让人丧失方向感。在对这座位于查文德万塔尔地下的迷宫进行发掘时，研究人员发现走廊能够对人和乐器发出的声音进行声学处理，产生奇特的声学效果。参与研究的斯坦福大学考古学家约翰・里克表示：“如果你在这些走廊里说话，你会听到自己的声音发生改变。”
里克的研究小组发现，迷宫内的一些房间及其相互连接的空间能够对回声进行放大，同时让它们快速反弹回听者的耳朵。研究小组成员米里亚姆・科拉尔表示：“声音从所有不同岩石表面快速反弹。这些岩石的形状非常不规则。”经过处理的声音让人感到不安并丧失方向感。据研究小组推测，当初的迷宫建造者有意这么设计，为的就是迷惑进入迷宫的人。
古代美州人是否有意在设计上让建筑物产生奇妙的听觉效果现在仍是一个谜。不过考古学家认为，古玛雅人和其他古代文明当时可能是以传统方式进行设计和建造，而后在无意间产生了这些音响效果，由于神庙和广场经常需要举行大型仪式，所以如果能够创造出好像来自另一个世界的声音，便可赋予仪式神秘色彩。

description.hltext_display: Open air carol concert
description.author: no@spam.com (Orbit News Ltd
description.content:
Open air carol concert
Full News Index , Lymm Life
THE annual Carol Concert at Lymm Cross will take place as usual on Christmas Eve, between 6pm and 8.30pm.
Hundreds of people are expected to gather around The Cross for singing led by a brass band and local choirs.
While the concert is on, roads will be closed to traffic and diversions will be signposted.

description.hltext_display: Lohan 'assault' worker dismissed
description.content:
A woman who accused actress Lindsay Lohan of attacking her has been sacked by the Betty Ford rehab centre.
Rehab centre spokesman Russ Patrick said the employee was dismissed for breaking patient confidentiality at the Palm Desert, California, clinic by giving interviews and "disclosing a privileged document".
He said Dawn Holland's interview was a breach of trust and the rehabilitation process.
"When patients come to the centre for treatment, they come to a safe place where their identity is protected, where anonymity is safeguarded," he said.
Mean Girls star Lindsay, 24, is being investigated by Riverside County sheriff's detectives for misdemeanour battery following a confrontation on December 12.
A police spokeswoman said deputies were called to the Betty Ford centre shortly after 1am after an altercation between Lindsay and Ms Holland.
Lindsay's lawyer said the actress called the police emergency number.
Neither Betty Ford nor sheriff's officials identified Ms Holland, but she appeared in an interview on celebrity website TMZ, claiming Lindsay and two other girls had sneaked out of the centre.
Ms Holland said she was trying to get Lindsay to submit to a breathalyser test when the actress became belligerent, pushed her and snatched a phone from her hand, straining her arm.
Riverside County sheriff's deputy Herlinda Valenzuela said Lindsay's case would be presented to prosecutors, who would decide whether she should be charged.

description.hltext_display: فردا، پيش فروش تندر90 آغاز مي شود
description.content:
معاون فروش و بازاريابي ايران خودرو:
خبرگزاري موج - پيش فروش تعداد محدودي از خودروهاي تندر90 از فردا و پژو 207 آي از امروز در تمامي نمايندگي هاي مجاز ايران خودرو در سراسر کشور آغاز مي شود.
به گزارش موج، علي اصغر سرايي نيا معاون بازاريابي و فروش ايران خودرو، با بيان اين مطلب در حاشيه نهمين نمايشگاه خودرو اصفهان گفت: با توجه به اينکه تعهدات ايران خودرو نسبت به تحويل پيش فروش هاي قبلي تندر90 و 207 آي به اتمام رسيد، پيش فروش تعداد محدود ديگري از اين خودروها از امروز آغاز مي شود.
وي با بيان اينکه مشتريان مي توانند از طريق سايت فروش ايران خودرو به صورت اينترنتي خودروهاي مذکور را خريداري کنند، افزود: خودروهاي مذکور از اواخر بهمن ماه سال جاري به ترتيب اولويت ثبت نام، تحويل مشتريان مي شود.
سرايي نيا با اشاره به اينکه پيش فروش تندر90 در هر سه مدل اين خودرو انجام مي شود، در خصوص پيش فروش 207 آي نيز يادآور شد: پيش فروش 207 آي اتوماتيک و دنده اي نيز از امروز آغاز شده است.

description.hltext_display: 西班牙前11个月财政赤字同比下降45.8%
description.content:
新华社墨西哥城12月21日电 西班牙财政事务国务秘书卡洛斯・奥卡尼亚21日说，截至今年11月份，西班牙财政赤字达387.65亿欧元(约合503.95亿美元)，同比下降45.8%
今年前11个月，西班牙财政赤字占国内生产总值(GDP)的比例为3.68%，低于政府6.7%的规定 其中，财政支出为1621.25亿欧元，同比下降4%；财政收入为1233.6亿欧元，同比增长26.8%
奥卡尼亚解释说，当期西班牙财政赤字减少主要是因为增值税增加和政府采取了削减开支的措施

description.hltext_display: 《英雄传说》新作明年登陆PSP 超越任何前作
description.content:
日本Falcom近日公布，为纪念公司创立30周年的RPG《英雄传说：空之轨迹》《英雄传说：零之轨迹》的后续“轨迹”系列大型新作，将于2011年在PSP上发售。
“轨迹”是在壮大世界观与洋溢魅力的角色们，再加上深奥故事受到多数玩家支持的故事式RPG。而在2010年系列累积已发售100万套的作品，然而《英雄传说：零之轨迹》系列还获得Playstation奖2010的玩家所选奖之一，可见“轨迹”系列的人气之高。
英雄传说空轨和零轨
而公司公布“轨迹”系列的最新作将会作为超越“轨迹”系列过往的作品，成为压倒性世界观与史上最大内容的新作RPG。本次由于是为了粉饰日本Falcom 30周年的作品，所以是最高的杰作。

description.hltext_display: First Media Forum of Turkic-speaking countries starts in Turkey
description.content:
The first Media Forum of Turkic-speaking countries was launched on Tuesday in Ankara, Anadolu news agency reported.
The opening ceremony of the forum was attended by the Turkish Foreign Minister Ahmet Davutoglu and Deputy Prime Minister Bulent Arinc.
The two-day forum brought together leaders and representatives of major media outlets from Azerbaijan, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Uzbekistan, Turkmenistan, Turkey and Northern Cyprus, to discuss media's role promoting good relations among the Turkic-speaking countries, CA-News said.
The Forum was organized by the Main Department of Press and Information and the Center for Strategic Studies of the Turkish Foreign Ministry.

entity.property: Main Department of Press and Information

description.hltext_display: Food adulteration: Opposition walks out in Kerala assembly
description.content: Thiruvananthapuram, Dec 22 : The Congress-led opposition Wednesday walked out of the Kerala assembly after the government rejected a demand for a judicial probe into a report that said state-owned Supplyco was selling adulterated food items. Seeking to move an adjournment motion on the issue, veteran opposition legislator K.M. Mani said the state-owned Public Analyst Laboratory found that 18 food items like rice given to school children, chilly and coriander powder were adulterated."It is unfortunate that Food Minister C. Divakaran has mentioned that out of 91 samples only two were adulterated. It is not true as the Vigilance and Anti-Corruption Bureau submitted a report that a number of food items in three districts were adulterated," Mani said."They have recommended statewide raids on the godowns besides stopping payments to the erring suppliers. The department did neither of the two," he pointed out.A trader, P. Yahiya, first pointed out about the poor quality of food items being supplied to the Supplyco last year.After waiting for several months and no government action coming, Yahiya approached the high court this month which Tuesday said the issue was of a serious nature.Divakaran said four officials of Supplyco were suspended and one was dismissed from service."A government order came out yesterday (Tuesday), stopping all payments to the suppliers. A detailed inquiry and raids are going on across the state. We will not spare the guilty. None of the so-called adulterated items have reached the shops," he said.Leader of Opposition Oommen Chandy said the people of Kerala wish to know why the additional advocate general requested the court not to make any adverse remarks on Yahiya's complaint and to post the case after two weeks."We wish to know from the chief minister (V.S. Achuthanandan) that why the government is not taking the issue seriously. Yahiya had to wait a year after giving a complaint to the department. Justice appears to have come only after he went to the court," he said.Achuthanandan intervened and assured the members that the fraudulent suppliers would be brought before law and the guilty sent to jail."The food minister has assured the house of prompt action and what he said is the opinion of the government," he added.Dissatisfied by the rejection of their demand for a judicial probe into the issue, Chandy led the opposition out of the house.The vigilance report had said that inferior quality food items were being supplied to the state at a very high price, and for every truckload arriving in the state, officials were being bribed to see that these low quality products are allowed to be sold.

The department did neither of the two

description.hltext_display: รบกวช่วยบอกวิธีต่อโมเด็มเข้ากับเร้าเตอร์ทีครับ : FlameRose (7)
description.content:
ผมได้ตั้งกระทู้ถามไปทีนึงแล้วแต่ผมคงเขียนคำถามไม่เคลียร์จึงขอตั้งใหม่ครับ
คือ ผมพึ่งติดตั้งเน็ตเคเบิ้ล10M ของทรูไป แล้วทีนี้เขาได้ให้ เคเบิ้ลโมเด็มมา ซึ่งเคเบิ้ลโมเด็มตัวนี้ไม่มีไวร์เลส เป็นยี่ห้อ Cisco2100 Cable modem แล้วผมมีเร้าเตอร์อยู่แล้วคือ DSL2640T ซึ่งผมต้องการให้มันเชื่อมกันเพื่อผมจะได้ใช้ไวร์เลสได้ครับ
บอกอีกทีนะครับเพื่อเข้าใจผิด ตัวเคเบิ้ลโมเด็ม ไม่สามารถเข้าไปคอนฟิกอะไรได้เลย คือไม่สามารถเข้า GUI เพื่อไปคอนฟิกอะไรได้เลยครับเป็นโมเด็มจริงๆ
ขอบคุณมากครับ จากคุณ : FlameRose -[ 22 ธ.ค. 53 - 14:44:09 ] แจ้งลบ ทดสอบแล้วใช้ได้ผล Bookmark ส่งต่อกระทู้ พิมพ์ โหวตกระทู้ ขอทราบด้วยคน ยกเลิกการแจ้งเมล์ เก็บเข้าคลังกระทู้ กระทู้ก่อนหน้า กระทู้ถัดไป คือ ผมพึ่งติดตั้งเน็ตเคเบิ้ล10M ของทรูไป แล้วทีนี้เขาได้ให้ เคเบิ้ลโมเด็มมา ซึ่งเคเบิ้ลโมเด็มตัวนี้ไม่มีไวร์เลส เป็นยี่ห้อ Cisco2100 Cable modem แล้วผมมีเร้าเตอร์อยู่แล้วคือ DSL2640T ซึ่งผมต้องการให้มันเชื่อมกันเพื่อผมจะได้ใช้ไวร์เลสได้ครับ
