description.hltext_display: Chocolate-rapsberry cookies for Santa
description.content:
TULSA - "The Blitzen Express-oh" Cookies
2 stick butter (room temp)
1 cup light brown sugar
1 cup sugar
3 eggs
1 teaspoon baking soda
1 teaspoon real vanilla
Pinch of salt
1/2 cup cocoa
1/3 - 2/3 cup instant coffee
1/4 cup chocolate syrup
3 cups flour
2 1/2 cups white chocolate
1/2 cup cinnamon chips
Directions; cream butter and sugar (10 mins, scrape sides occasionally), add eggs, salt, baking soda, vanilla and mix in. Add cocoa and instant coffee, again scraping sides occasionally. Now slowly add flour 1 cup at a time on a slow speed until incorporated. Last add white chocolate and cinnamon chips. Scoop cookies straight from mixing bowl. Golf ball size cookies will yield 15 cookies approx.
Bake at 350 for 13-15 mins depending on your gooey or crunchy taste.

description.hltext_display: Where does hospital’s $1 million subsidy to county go? Use it to keep docs here?
description.content:
Yes, there is a hospital board with Mr. Bob Kayser as the spokesperson. He would not answer any of our questions (privacy, you know). He completely ignored our questions on the bullying that goes on among the doctors but had two policemen at the meeting. For what reason?
He told us that the hospital subsidies the county $1 million per year. Where does this money go and why is it not used to keep our good doctors here?

event_or_fact.property: the hospital subsidies the county $1 million per year.

description.hltext_display: Dead woman was stabbed weeks ago
description.content:
DAVIDSON COUNTYAn autopsy revealed that a woman found dead Monday in an apartment unit on Murfreesboro Pike was stabbed. Police believe Vickie Webb, 19, had likely been dead for weeks before she was discovered by maintenance staff for the apartment complex.
Because of decomposition, positive identification had to be made through dental records. The autopsy today showed the victim did suffer stab wounds.
Webb's family had not heard from her in several weeks, police said.
Her apartment rent was two months overdue, multiple rent notices from management were unanswered, and the electricity to the apartment was turned off.
Hermitage Precinct detectives are pursuing leads in the case. Anyone with information is asked to contact Detective Johnny Crumby or Detective Andrew Injaychock at 862-7727 or Crime Stoppers at 74-CRIME.
STAFF REPORTS

description.hltext_display: Biggest Storm yet Heads for Calif; Homes Evacuated
description.author: GILLIAN FLACCUS A
description.content:
After days of relentless rain, Southern California is awaiting the most intense storm system yet, with evacuations ordered, rescue crews on standby and residents anxiously eyeing already saturated mountainsides denuded by wildfires.
Forecasters expected more rain across the state Wednesday, but the focus clearly was on Southern California where a monster storm was expected to bring torrential rain, thunderstorms, flooding, hail and possible tornadoes and water spouts. Forecasters warned of possible rainfall rates of .75 inch to 1 inch an hour and thunderstorm rates of 2 inches an hour in the region.
Steady rain began falling late Tuesday and was expected to intensify into early Wednesday.
"It's going to be a three-ring circus," said National Weather Service spokesman Bill Hoffer. "There's going to be a six-hour time frame in the early morning when it's really going to be dumping on us."
Officials on Tuesday ordered evacuation of 232 homes in La Canada Flintridge and La Crescenta, foothill suburbs of Los Angeles below steep hillsides that burned in 2009 and where mudslides inundated homes and backyards in February.
Walt Kalepsch said his backyard filled up with mud and debris last winter, but he planned to stay the night with his wife and daughter.
"If it gets really terrible, we'll leave. But we've been evacuated so many times, it's like the city's crying wolf," he said. "During the rest of the year, it's absolutely gorgeous. It was just one big wildfire that changed everything."
As the "Pineapple Express" system swept Pacific Ocean moisture across Nevada, Arizona and Utah, Gov. Arnold Schwarzenegger declared a state of emergency in six counties.
The huge and powerful low pressure system off the West Coast pushed precipitation right into the Great Basin.
"It takes a lot of energy to push that moisture over the mountains," said NWS meteorologist Dave Bruno. "This kind of storm could march right across the country and create a lot of bad weather along the way. It could affect the Southern Plains on Thursday and Friday. If it sticks together it'll hit Florida by Saturday."

description.hltext_display: World's leading innovators to impart practical strategies at the Second Abu Dhabi Innovation Forum
description.content:
Creative and practical tools and strategies needed to thrive in this current economic climate are among the main topics to be highlighted by two of today's leading entrepreneurs and innovators at the Second Abu Dhabi Innovation Forum scheduled to be held at Fairmont Bab Al Bahar on the 24th and 25th of January 2011.
Alexander Blass, Top Innovator of the Year Award Grand Prize Winner, and Matt Kingdon, Chief Executive Officer and Founder of '?WhatIf! Innovation Company', are among the keynote speakers of the forum. Presented by Abu Dhabi University and Khalifa Fund for Enterprise Development, the second edition of the forum will feature new and innovative business concepts and ideas worldwide which can be inspiring and applicable to the region.The event, organised by Aim Events, the events management group of ADU, will gather international experts and leading innovators to discuss the developing landscape of Innovation in the UAE led by Abu Dhabi. The forum is part of Abu Dhabi Innovation Week, which also features the Innovators Fair and the Innovation Awards. "Through seasoned and recognised innovators sharing their thoughts and experiences at the Second Abu Dhabi Innovation Forum up-and-coming innovators from the UAE will be able to draw plans from the speakers' experiences to improve their work environments," said James Graham, General Manager, Aim Events."The forum serves as the venue for discussion of the latest innovative strategies and ensures bringing to Abu Dhabi global insights that will help in the development of the culture of innovation in UAE and the region," he addedBlass, the youngest grand prize winner of the Top Innovator of the Year Award, will reveal how to reinvent to get on the path of innovation. He will share essential characteristics of successful innovators, some of the challenges to overcome as well as learning to generate international buzz for innovations with limited resources. One of today's most acclaimed social entrepreneurs and innovators, Blass has improved and inspired countless lives across the world through RealityCharity, his invention of person-to-person giving technology on the internet. With all the capabilities of social networking sites, RealityCharity is the world's first direct fundraising platform and philanthropy community wherein organisations and individuals around the world may raise money for good causes. Meanwhile, Kingdon will discuss a presentation which will focus on 'How to deliver on the Promise of Innovation'. He will provide practical tools and techniques aimed at business leaders who need innovation to drive growth. Kingdon's ?WhatIf! Innovation Company is helping a wide range of clients in over 40 countries worldwide to innovate and grow by releasing the creative potential of their people, products and brands. ?WhatIf! works with clients to increase their innovation capability by cultivating skills, organisational structures and mechanisms as well as identifying and developing how to lead for successful innovation. In 2002, Kingdon has co-authored 'How to Start a Creative Revolution' and the highly successful 'Sticky Wisdom'. A respected Innovation Practitioner and speaker, Kingdon is also director and advisor to five start-up companies. The Second Abu Dhabi Innovation Week will be held in conjunction with the Abu Dhabi Innovation Week, which will include an Innovators Fair, and the Innovation Awards. The Innovators Fair will showcase new products and innovative solutions and services from local innovators while the Innovations Awards will recognise individuals who have achieved excellence in innovation. Both will be held at Abu Dhabi University Khalifa City Campus on 26th January 2011.

description.hltext_display: 顔のシミを消したい！ - 皮膚科で
description.author: sea
description.content:
35歳主婦です。
顔にいつのまにか大きなシミ（鉛筆の直径くらい）が２つできてしまいました。
夏に日焼け止めを怠った日があったので、それが原因かと思うのですが
気になって気になってしかたがないので消したいのですが、
皮膚科に行けばいいですか？それとも美容整形になるのでしょうか。
とりあえず薬局に売っているしみ・そばかすに・・・といった類の錠剤は服用しています。（少しだけ薄くなったような気がします）
ただ、私は小さいころから頬にそばかすがあり、今でも多少薄くはなったものの、気になります。
大きなシミと幼少からのそばかす両方をなんとかしたいのですが、一番良い
方法は何でしょうか。
おしえてください！
ユーザーID：9435633771
お気に入り登録数：22
古いレス順
レス数：8本
タイトル
投稿者
ふむふむ
2010年12月18日 19:46
美容整形って、健康保険きくのかな・・・？
皮膚科なら保険がききますよね。とりあえず皮膚科で相談してみてはいかがでしょうか？
ユーザーID：2159479782
kaka
2010年12月19日 1:09
５年前にシミで皮膚科に行きました。
ニキビ跡をほったらしの紫外線対策ゼロの肌だったので
突然のシミにびっくりして「皮膚ガンでは？」と。
１ｃｍ弱なシミでしたが、保険適用のルビーレザーで
５０００円でした。
２週間は絆創膏テープで恥ずかしいかもしれませんが、
我慢した後には、つるんとキレイにシミがとれて感動でした。
ただし、施術はちょびっと（？！）痛いです。
バチッと太いゴムを集中的にあてられる感じ。
形成外科でも保険適用で施術してくれる所があると思います。
ソバカスがあるとのこと、色白なんでしょう。うらやましいです。
色黒な肌の私の経験ですが、年明けたらまたシミをレーザーで
やっつけようと思ってたのでレスしました。
ユーザーID：9808126503
相談
2010年12月19日 9:41
まずは皮膚科に行かれては？
レーザーで取るなどと言う事を、本で読んだりしますが。
ユーザーID：8116741417
time
2010年12月19日 20:57
皮膚科では当然ながら「病的」と診断されないレベルでは施術してくれません。
グラファ等、ハイドロキノン配合の軟膏か、もしくはフォトフェイシャルを受けるのが一番です。
レーザーは施術以降のケアが面倒ですし。
詳しくはネットでご自分でお調べください。
ユーザーID：6790663811
pon
2010年12月20日 17:46
私も昔フォトフェイシャルをしました、シミは多少薄くなりましたが施行費が高く継続する事ができず、結局元に戻ってしまいました。
ハイドロキノンをあげている方がおられますが、ハイドロキノンは昔はシミとりクリームの主成分でしたが最近発ガンの危険性を指摘されています。
かわりにこちら（北米）のホワイトニングクリームの流行の成分はビタミンＣとＫｏｊｉｃ Ａｃｉｄ、つまり日本酒を造る時の麹です。そうえいば私が子供の頃、母が日本酒でパックをしていたらシミがうすくなったのを覚えています。
ユーザーID：4449992452
しろちゃん
2010年12月21日 16:23
先日クリニックでしみのレーザー治療をしました。大きさによりますが、ちょっと大きかったので診療費込みで２万円ちょっとでした。
１週間ほどでかさぶたになり、自然とペロンとはがれます。これを体験すると、即効で効果がでる(シミがなくなる）のでホワイトニング美容液とか何年も何年も塗って本当に薄くなってるかわからないことがばかばかしく思えます。 ただ、レーザーは術後のケアが非常に大切なので、面倒くさがり屋さんにはむいていないでしょう。

description.hltext_display: Poweo ne produira plus d'lectricit
description.content:
Le fournisseur alternatif d'énergie Poweo annonce ce mercredi qu'il se désengage de ses activités de production et vend ses actifs pour 120 millions d'euros à son actionnaire historique depuis 2006, l'autrichien Verbund. Cette décision, arrêtée mardi par le Conseil d'administration du groupe, fait suite à l'étude, depuis plusieurs semaines, de différentes options stratégiques après le vote récent de la loi NOME (nouvelle organisation du marché de l'électricité). Les décrets d'application, qui devraient être publiés au cours des prochains mois, détermineront les conditions dans lesquelles l'entreprise pourra envisager la poursuite de ses activités de commercialisation.
Les ressources dégagées par cette cession doivent permettre de dégager les ressources financières nécessaires à la continuité d'exploitation du groupe. Ce dernier bénéficie jusqu'au 30 juin 2013 d'une option de rachat de ses actifs à un prix identique, dans le cas où cela serait justifié par les nouvelles conditions réglementaires ou de marché. En cas de non exercice de cette option, l'accord prévoit un éventuel complément au prix initial sur la base de la juste valeur de marché de Poweo Production à la date considérée.
Les 120 millions d'euros générés par la cession de ces actifs correspondent à la valeur nette comptable des 60 % de Poweo Production que Verbund ne possédait pas encore, et qui recouvrent l'ensemble des actifs de production d'électricité du groupe, des centrales thermiques à cycle combiné au gaz naturel en service ou en construction, ainsi que des actifs de sa branche Energies Renouvelables, ces derniers représentant une capacité de production installée de 105 MW.
La loi NOME prévoit que EDF cède une partie de sa production nucléaire aux autres acteurs du marché à un prix inférieur à celui du marché, et vise à rétablir une libre concurrence parmi les acteurs français de l'énergie. Mais Poweo justifie sa décision par le fait que "la loi NOME ne favorise plus le modèle d'opérateur intégré combinant la production et la commercialisation d'énergie. Le rapport remis en avril par la Commission Champsaur considérait pourtant que les nouveaux entrants qui investissaient dans la production d'électricité devaient se voir octroyer un avantage supplémentaire en termes de conditions d'acquisition d'électricité d'origine nucléaire, indispensable pour la compétitivité de leurs offres commerciales ; ce schéma n'a toutefois pas été retenu dans la loi NOME."

description.hltext_display: 交通塞 雅加達擬取消路邊停車 (中央社)
description.content:
（中央社記者傅一倩雅加達22日專電）印尼雅加達地方議會今天表示，雅加達的交通壅塞問題非常嚴重，解決之道就是實施分階段取消路邊停車，尤其要取締非法的路邊停車。
地方議會議員們同意，立刻取締非法的路邊停車，並計劃解決越來越嚴重的塞車問題，包括興建大量的停車場、增加公路的寬度及改善目前的停車制度。
議員們說，雅加達每年公路增加的長度只有0.01%，可是車輛的增加速度每年達9%。因此增加停車場的數量是取消路邊停車的最佳辦法。為了不損害廣大公路使用者的權益，雅加達地方政府，尤其是交通局，必須制定良好的措施，克服當前和未來的交通擁擠問題。（本文附有照片）991222

description.hltext_display: Cortei Roma, la città in attesa
description.author: redazione@tgcom.it (Redazione TGCOM
description.content:
Protesta studenti contro il ddl Gelmini
Il centro di Roma "attende" i tre cortei di studenti in occasione del voto al Senato del ddl Gelmini. Per ora non sono state disposte chiusure al traffico né blindature speciali di strade e vie di accesso al centro. La circolazione è scorrevole, aiutata, anche dal fatto che alcuni negozianti del centro storico per timore di danneggiamenti hanno scelto oggi di non aprire.Blindati delle forze dell'ordine solo presso i palazzi delle istituzioni.
I tre cortei annunciati dagli studenti partono da Piazzale Aldo Moro, nei pressi dell'Università La Sapienza, da Piazzale Ostiense e da Piazza Trilussa. Itinerario 'a sorpresa' ma sono annunciati flash mob, azioni estemporanee e 'incursioni' creative anche al di là della zona rossa centrale. Dunque, secondo le intenzioni degli studenti, oggi sara' una sorta di protesta ''a macchia di leopardo'' fatta di happening anche decentrati. Non essendoci stata richiesta di preavviso alla Questura da parte dei manifestanti i tre cortei sono di fatto non autorizzati e dunque illegali.

description.hltext_display: MHCC meeting was disrespectful
description.content:
We hear about it almost every week about how people are trying to stop bullying in America.
Well, you could hve seen it at its best last week at the Converse County Memorial Hospital board meeting. With two Douglas Police officers present to make sure we didn’t ask or try to get answers from the board, or should I say Mr. Bob Kayser. Dr. Lyford opened the meeting and quickly turned it over to Mr. Kayser, who was the only board member to speak.
I guess the rest didn’t have anything to say. There was one doctor sitting at the south end of the table that seemed to think the questions being asked form the concerned people were funny and openly laughed at most of them.
This continued even after it was pointed out to Mr. Kayser, and this is the kind of doctor that we are to go to, to trust our children too. With this being acceptable conduct at a board meeting, it makes you wonder what is acceptable conduct in the hospital?

description.hltext_display: Galaxy's Landon Donovan won't go to Europe on loan
description.content:
The forward/midfielder, who played for Everton last season, says he will rest in preparation for the MLS season in March. Galaxy forward/midfielder Landon Donovan said Tuesday that he will not be going on loan to a team in Europe in January but instead will rest and recuperate for the 2011 Major League Soccer season that starts March 15.
At the same time, the Galaxy said that it expects midfielder David Beckham to report to preseason training at the end of January and not to be going on loan, as Beckham had suggested Sunday night that he might try to do.
"We are not aware that David is looking to be loaned to any team and we are fully expecting he reports with the rest of his Galaxy teammates in late January for the upcoming season," the Galaxy said in a statement released Monday.
On Tuesday, the club took the same line with Donovan.
"We think in the best interest of the club and the player that Landon continues his postseason break and begins preparations for what will be a challenging year in 2011 at both the domestic and international levels," said Bruce Arena, the Galaxy's coach and general manager. ? Grahame L. Jones HORSE RACING
The future of the Preakness at Pimlico is in doubt after a vote by Maryland's racing commission.
The board voted to reject a proposal by the owners of Pimlico Race Course and Laurel Park to conduct live racing next year, meaning there won't be horse racing at either track next year unless an agreement is reached.
That would leave the future of the Triple Crown's second leg in doubt at the track where it has been run since 1873.
ETC.
Mississippi State sophomore Renardo Sidney's return to the basketball court has hit a snag.
The 6-foot-10 forward has been suspended for one game for "conduct detrimental to the team," school spokesman Gregg Ellis said.
Sidney, who played at Los Angeles Fairfax High, has played in only one game this season, a loss Saturday to Virginia Tech, because of an NCAA suspension. The NCAA ruled in March that Sidney received preferential treatment and improper benefits because of his ability, and that he also violated ethics rules by providing false or misleading statements.
Sidney was forced to repay $11,800 in improper benefits and to sit out the remainder of the 2009-10 season, plus the first nine games this season.
---
Tiger Woods had a cortisone shot in his right ankle a week and a half ago to relieve lingering soreness. By Tuesday, he was back to work hitting balls and filming a commercial.
Mark Steinberg, his agent at IMG, said Woods had intended all along to have the shot after the Chevron World Challenge, which ended Dec. 5. Woods has nearly two months off before his next tournament at Torrey Pines.
Steinberg spoke in response to Internet chatter that Woods had torn his Achilles' while skiing. He said Woods has not skied in more than three years.
---
Right-hander Rich Harden and the Oakland Athletics finalized a $1.5-million, one-year contract after he passed a physical. Harden went 5-5 with a 5.58 earned-run average for Texas last season. ? The Seattle Mariners traded catcher Rob Johnson to the San Diego Padres for a player to be named or cash considerations. ? The Milwaukee Brewers and infielder Craig Counsell have agreed to a $1.4-million, one-year contract, a person familiar with the negotiations told the Associated Press.
---
According to a source closely involved with the show, ESPN 710 radio's LA Sports Live show hosted by Andrew Siciliano and Lakers radio color commentator Mychal Thompson has been canceled. The radio show runs from 10 a.m. until 2 p.m. Siciliano also hosts DirecTV's NFL Red Zone Sunday show. ? Diane Pucin

description.hltext_display: Four in family die in fire
description.content:
Firemen carrying out investigations inside the shophouse after the fire GEORGE TOWN: Four family members perished in a fire that razed a double-storey shophouse in Perak Road, Jelutong at about 2.40am Wednesday morning.
Shop owner Neoh Hooi Poh, 57, managed to escape in the nick of time but his wife Goeh Siew Keow, 56, daughter Neoh Li Hong, 18, and son Neoh Soo Aik, 16, died in the incident. Hooi Pohs mother Lim Chye Hwa, 73, fainted and died on the way to the Penang Hospital.
A total of 35 firemen in five fire engines and four voluntary fire-fighting teams were summoned to douse the fire.
A Fire and Rescue Department spokesman said they received the distress call at about 2.50am.

description.hltext_display: New Paranormal, Erotic-Romantic Thriller, Valentino's Curse, Published by Outskirts Press
description.author: Outskirts Press, Inc
description.content: --(PR.com)-- Outskirts Press, Inc. has published Valentino's Curse: The Sheik Returns by Larry L. Dreller. The author's most recent book to date is a 5 x 8 paperback in the American drama category and is available worldwide on book retailer websites such as Amazon and Barnes & Noble. The webpage at www.outskirtspress.com/valentinoscurse was launched simultaneously with the book's publication.Valentinos Curse is a paranormal thriller peppered with the elements of the noir, erotic-romance and is rift with metaphysical implications.The principal character, Emma Glass, a wealthy and much desired woman, is abruptly propelled through a seemingly endless nightmare of terror and death which has consumed generations of her family, commencing in the Chicago of 1926 with the sudden death of the young silent film star, Rudolph Valentino.Her involvement with the supernatural world, deadly sances and angry spirits will be a shattering experience for the reader.303 pages in length, Valentino's Curse: The Sheik Returns is being aggressively promoted to appropriate markets with a focus on the American drama category. With U.S. wholesale distribution through Ingram and Baker & Taylor, and pervasive online availability through Amazon, Barnes & Noble and elsewhere, Valentino's Curse meets consumer demand through both retail and library markets with a suggested retail price of $16.95.Additionally, Valentino's Curse can be ordered by retailers or wholesalers for the maximum trade discount price set by the author in quantities of ten or more from the Outskirts Press Direct bookstore at www.outskirtspress.com/bookstore.ISBN: 9781432764258Format: 5 x 8 paperback creamSRP: $16.95For more information or to contact the author, visit www.outskirtspress.com/valentinoscurse.About the author:Larry Dreller has conducted private sance sessions and has led sance study circles. He is also an ordained Spiritual Science Minister who has written two books on Mediumship. He strongly believes in the transitional dimensions we take beyond our earth life.About Outskirts Press, Inc.Outskirts Press, Inc. offers full-service, custom self-publishing and book marketing services for authors seeking a cost-effective, fast, and flexible way to publish and distribute their books worldwide while retaining all their rights and full creative control. Available for authors globally at www.outskirtspress.com and located on the outskirts of Denver, Colorado, Outskirts Press represents the future of book publishing, today.###Outskirts Press, Inc., 10940 S. description.hltext_display: Would-be soldiers can't pass exam
description.content:
MIAMI - Nearly one- fourth of the students who try to join the U.S. Army fail its entrance exam, painting a grim picture of an education system that produces graduates who can't answer basic math, science and reading questions, according to a new study released Tuesday.
The report by The Education Trust bolsters a growing worry among military and education leaders that the pool of young people qualified for military service will grow too small.
"Too many of our high school students are not graduating ready to begin college or a career - and many are not eligible to serve in our armed forces," U.S. Education Secretary Arne Duncan said. "I am deeply troubled by the national security burden created by America's underperforming education system."
The effect of the low eligibility rate might not be noticeable now - the Department of Defense says it is meeting its recruitment goals - but that could change as the economy improves, said retired Navy Rear Admiral Jamie Barnett.
"If you can't get the people that you need, there's a potential for a decline in your readiness," said Barnett, who is part of the group Mission: Readiness, a coalition of retired military leaders working to bring awareness to the high ineligibility rates.
The report by The Education Trust found that 23 percent of recent high school graduates don't get the minimum score needed on the enlistment test to join any branch of the military. Questions are often basic, such as: "If 2 plus x equals 4, what is the value of x?"
The military exam results are also worrisome because the test is given to a limited pool of people: Pentagon data shows that 75 percent of those aged 17 to 24 don't even qualify to take the test because they are physically unfit, have a criminal record or didn't graduate high school.
Educators expressed dismay that so many high school graduates are unable to pass a test of basic skills.
"It's surprising and shocking that we are still having students who are walking across the stage who really don't deserve to be (there) and haven't earned that right," said Tim Callahan with the Professional Association of Georgia Educators, a group that represents more than 80,000 educators.
This is the first time that the U.S. Army has released this test data publicly, said Amy Wilkins of The Education Trust, a Washington, D.C.-based children's advocacy group. The study examined the scores of nearly 350,000 high school graduates, ages 17 to 20, who took the ASVAB exam between 2004 and 2009. About half of the applicants went on to join the Army.
Recruits must score at least a 31 out of 99 on the first stage of the three-hour test to get into the Army. The Marines, Air Force, Navy and Coast Guard recruits need higher scores.
Further tests determine what kind of job the recruit can do with questions on mechanical maintenance, accounting, word comprehension, mathematics and science.
The study shows wide disparities in scores among white and minority students, similar to racial gaps on other standardized tests. Nearly 40 percent of black students and 30 percent of Hispanics don't pass, compared with 16 percent of whites. The average score for blacks is 38 and for Hispanics is 44, compared to whites' average score of 55.
Even those passing muster on the Armed Services Vocational Aptitude Battery, or ASVAB, usually aren't getting scores high enough to snag the best jobs.
"A lot of times, schools have failed to step up and challenge these young people, thinking it didn't really matter - they'll straighten up when they get into the military," said Kati Haycock, president of the Education Trust. "The military doesn't think that way."

description.hltext_display: 中国汽车工业的希望何在？
description.content:
http://www.brandcn.com作者：王永 文章来源：品牌中国网 2010-12-22
今天结束了2010品牌中国年度人物颁奖盛典暨第十一届品牌中国高峰论坛的全部议程，没有经过丝毫的休整，下午便飞来广州参加吉利战略转型成果研讨会。
吉利汽车从2007年5月开始正式转型，我有幸见证了转型的全过程。这几年，我们一直保持着密切的沟通，还和李总有过几次长时间深入的交流。吉利转型的这几年，也正是品牌中国创业的几年，虽然我只是一个小萝卜头，但还是能够深刻的体会他的孤独和艰辛，所有也就和他有一种惺惺相惜的感觉。
2007年4月21日，也正是吉利正式转型的前夕，李书福出席了由品牌中国产业联盟联合中国汽车工程学会、中国汽车工业协会等单位共同举办的中国汽车品牌自主创新高峰论坛，并阐述了吉利的战略是“总体跟随，局部超越，合纵连横，重点突破，招贤纳士，后来居上”，这大概就是后来5月份提出的战略转型的雏形。
2007年8月10日，首届中国品牌节期间，品牌中国产业联盟和吉利集团共同举办了“吉利汽车品牌求证大讲坛”，这应该就是吉利集团对自己战略转型的一次求证。
2008年的8月8日，第四届中国品牌节在青岛举行，我也邀请李书福出席，那时的他正在全力以赴准备沃尔沃的收购，虽然李总最终没能出席品牌节，但我们在电话里的沟通依然非常顺畅。
2009年12月18日，吉利集团成功收购沃尔沃，李书福也因此荣获“2009品牌中国年度人物”称号，李书福在领奖时说，从07年开始吉利已经不是简单的以价格作为竞争的主要手段。在保持性价比领先的前提下，我们要打技术战，品质战，服务战，品牌战，整个战略方向发生了根本性的改变。这是对吉利战略转型一次全面的阐述。
2010年8月7日，第四届中国品牌节在人民大会堂万人大礼堂隆重举行，李书福出席了开幕式并发表演讲。这是他成功收购沃尔沃之后第一次公开露面。并首次以浙江吉利控股集团董事长、沃尔沃轿车公司董事长的身份发表《吉利带头进行自我革命》的主题演讲，他表示，两个不同的品牌不会融到一起，吉利和沃尔沃将是携手合作、互相帮助、共同提高的关系。之所以能够成功收购沃尔沃，也正因为吉利实行战略转型。就像吉利公关总监杨学良今晚介绍的那样，吉利的战略转型是吉利人灵魂深处的一次革命!
吉利从“造老百姓买得起的好车”转向“造最安全、最环保、最节能的好车”，吉利的“战略转型”是近几年来中国汽车企业发生最大变革的转折力量，也是吉利集团突破重围、由弱变强、顺利实现产业升级和可持续性发展的“标志”。
目前，吉利在母品牌下构建了3个整车子品牌：全球鹰、帝豪和英伦，各子品牌彼此并列平等，分别代表不同的品牌特性和风格。这三大品牌分别为其目标消费者做出了如下定位：全球鹰代表了“时尚、激情、梦想”，帝豪代表“豪华、稳健、力量”，英伦则代表“经典、英伦、亲切”。转型后，吉利汽车在短暂的阵痛后实现了量价齐升!
当然，我们还是要看到差距。一般而言，品牌扩张从高到低比较容易，而从低到高则需要付出成倍的代价。吉利的战略转型之所以如此艰辛，这是因为吉利在创业之初粗放的发展策略导致的恶果，吉利要想从丑小鸭蜕变为白天鹅，就必须偿还以前在品牌上的欠账。这条路虽然艰辛，但确是必由之路。此外，我们还要注意发展速度和发展质量之间的关系，要把发展速度控制在安全的范围之内。
今晚研讨会的最后，我还不忘推广了一下顺风车，并建议吉利把战略从“造老百姓买得起的好车”转向“造最安全、最环保、最节能的好车”的基础上，再升级为“造中国人自己的世界名车”!
我还是五年前那句话：“中国汽车的希望在民企，民企的希望在吉利!”五年前我说这句话的时候，大多数人不相信。五年后的今天，我说这句话，大多数人相信了。再过五年，估计没有人会怀疑。但从这一点上讲，和品牌中国产业联盟的发展惊人的相似。五年前我开始搞品牌中国的时候，身边所有的人都反对。五年后的今天，身边所有的人都在支持。再过五年，估计全社会都会来支持我们!
如果要问我为什么五年前都知道答案，我想说的是，谁把自己的事业当成自己的生命，谁就会成功!显然，在中国汽车业，李书福是这样的人，他把吉利当成他全部的生命。

description.hltext_display: Bruce Levy sues forensics company for $5 million
description.content:
Nashville's former chief medical examiner is suing the company he once worked for, saying they reneged on an exit deal worth about $1.6 million when he left the business. In dispute is whether Dr. Bruce Levy resigned or was terminated in March, shortly after he was arrested on a marijuana possession charge in Mississippi, and what, if anything, he's entitled to for his 14 percent stake in the company. Levy is suing his former employer, Forensic Medical, demanding more than $5 million in pay, benefits and damages in Davidson County Chancery Court.
John Voigt, attorney for Forensic Medical, said they had only just received the lawsuit Tuesday and were still reviewing it. Levy's attorney, Kenneth Jones, declined to comment.
The suit stems from Levy's trouble in March, when authorities intercepted a package of marijuana bound for his Madison County, Miss., hotel room. Authorities said they searched his room and found more marijuana, some of it in evidence bags from the Metro Medical Examiner's Office, leading to Levy being charged with official misconduct in Tennessee.Related According to the lawsuit, Levy quickly worked out an exit deal with Forensic Medical's parent company, Associated Pathologists, where he would resign but retain his salary for a month, some benefits and he would receive up to $1.5 million for his 14 percent stake in the company. But shortly after Levy sent in his resignation, Forensic Medical responded that the company's board had already expelled him and that he would receive nothing of the sort, according to court filings.
More accusations lobbed
Letters between Jones and Voigt also indicate that Forensic Medical had accused Levy at one point of receiving "unauthorized compensation and benefits" and allowing other doctors within the company to receive the same. Levy's attorney denied the accusation in a letter to Forensic Medical, pointing out that a $50,000 bonus he received in January was actually part of his 2009 bonus.
The letters do not elaborate on the accusations.
Levy has since gone into a pretrial diversion program in Mississippi and recently pleaded guilty to official misconduct in Tennessee, in connection with the marijuana having been taken from an evidence locker. If he completes his probation, both charges will be removed from public view.
In another court case, Levy indicated that he was courting clients to continue consulting on forensics matters with a new company he has formed.
Forensic Medical maintains its contract in Nashville and Mississippi and recently promoted longtime Deputy Medical Examiner Amy McMaster to the agency's top spot.

event_or_fact.property: he was courting clients to continue consulting on forensics matters with a new company he has formed.
they had only just received the lawsuit Tuesday and were still reviewing it

description.hltext_display: FARTYGSKÖP Viking Lines beställning bekräftad
description.content:
Viking Line beställer ett nytt fartyg från STX Finlands varv i Åbo. Avtalet trädde i kraft i dag.
Båda parterna har kommit överens om villkoren för kontraktet. Intentionsavtalet gjordes redan i oktober.
Ett av villkoren för avtalet är ett miljöstöd på 28 miljoner euro. Kommunikationsministeriet fattade beslut om stödet på tisdagen.
Det nya fartyget kostar kring 240 miljoner euro. Bygget innebär cirka 26 00 årsverken för varvet.
Avtalet innehåller en option för ytterligare ett fartyg.

description.hltext_display: Самозатемняющиеся окна
description.author: oknamedia.ru
description.content:
Компания SmartGlass International выступила разработчиком проекта для телевизионной арт-студии по созданию управляемой солнечной системы остекления SPD SmartGlass, которая способна противостоять негативным эффектам от прямых солнечных лучей, в том числе яркому свету и теплу, сообщает портал ОКНА МЕДИА.
Daybreak («Рассвет») является ежедневной телевизионной утренней программой, выходящей в эфир с 6:00 утра до 8:30 утра для британской торговой сети ITV, возглавляемая Адрианом Чайлсом (AdrianChiles) и Кристин Бликли.(ChristineBleakley)
Студия «Рассвет» расположена в центре Лондона на южном берегу Темзы, а горизонт Лондона является фоном для студии, предлагая непревзойденный вид на город сквозь структурное остекление арт-студии.
SPD SmartGlass является последней инновацией компании SmartGlass International и является идеальным решением для проектов такого типа.
SPD SmartGlass предлагает идеальное решение и устанавливается в около сотни панелей по всей студии. Стеклянный фасад может автоматически менять цвет от серого до прозрачного или темного, в зависимости от интенсивности бликов и солнечного тепла, защищая внутреннее содержание и присутствующих в студии от разрушительного воздействия УФ-излучения.
SPD-SmartGlass можно вручную или автоматически «настроить» на точный контроль количества света, бликов и тепла, проходящего через окно.
Обычное стекло, применяемое для остекления фасадов зданий; не является достаточной защитой от бликов, солнечного тепла и ультрафиолетового облучения, а в некоторых случаях использование стекла может стать проблематичным и нецелесообразным, поэтому возникает необходимость инвестировать в дорогие устройства затенения от солнца.
Стеклянные фасады с использованием запатентованной SPD-технологии контроля света уменьшают необходимость кондиционирования воздуха в летние месяцы и отопления в зимний период.
Способность быстрого переключения стекла в положение максимального дневного света, обеспечивая управляемый солнечный поток, особенно во время пика освещенности, является ценной и уникальной. Эта функция особенно полезна для применения в телевизионной студии, так как позволяет работать в периоды максимального дневного света, без ущерба для качества записи и необходимости контроля комнатной температуры, которая также очень чувствительна к микроклимату помещения.
Daybreak передается на рассвете, поэтому очень важно, чтобы показатель уровня солнечного света в студии варьировался в первой половине дня. Когда солнце только-только встает над Лондоном, прорезая ночную темноту, в этот момент стекло находится в ясном состоянии, допуская максимальное проникновения света. Чем утро становится ярче, тем сильнее срабатывают настройки стекла на контроль бликов от солнца и тепла, проходящего через окна студии.
Все SPDSmartGlass панели изготавливаются на заказ с использованием технологии ламинирования, которая инкапсулирует «взвешенные частицы устройства» («SuspendedParticleDevice») SPD-прослойки между двумя или более листами стекла.
Когда питание включено, движение молекул взвешенных частиц становится упорядоченным, свет проходит через панель и SPD SmartGlass очищается.
Когда питания выключено, движение молекул взвешенных частиц становится хаотичным, таким образом, происходит блокирование света и SPDSmartGlass становится темным, блокирование света может достигать до 99,4%.
SPDSmartGlass защищает от УФ-излучения, как в положении «включено», так и в положении «выключено».
Помимо перечисленных выше, SPDSmartGlass имеет множество дополнительных преимуществ, включая экономию энергии на охлаждение и расходы на освещение, сокращение выбросов углерода зданий и устранение необходимости в дорогих жалюзи на такие окна.
SmartGlass Internationalотдаёт предпочтение работе с современными проектами, где инновации и дизайн находятся на переднем крае.
Обсудить на Форуме на тему: Система остекления фасадов.
Источник: ОКНА МЕДИА

description.hltext_display: El comercio vizcaíno hará huelga mañana, salvo acuerdo de última hora
description.content:
La patronal vizcaína considera "descabellada" la postura de los sindicatos, que anuncian un "apoyo masivo" a la huelga convocada para los días 23 y 24 de diciembre y 7 de enero. Según ELA Zerbitzuak ha adelantado que la huelga convocada por los sindicatos ELA, LAB, CC.OO. y UGT en el sector del comercio vizcaíno para los días 23 y 24 de diciembre y el 7 de enero en contra de la apertura en domingos y festivos tendrá un "amplio apoyo".
En un comunicado, ha informado de que las trabajadoras de comercios como Bershka, Massimo Dutti, H&M, Pull&Bear, Springfield, Women Secret; Zara y Zara Home, Oysho, Sabeco, Lidl y Marionnaud han acordado secundar la huelga.
La Confederación Empresarial de Comercio de Bizkaia (Cecobi) ha tildado de "descabellada" la postura de los sindicatos para reclamar la actualización de su convenio.
A juicio de la patronal, los sindicatos no han tenido en cuenta que la campaña de Navidad "es vital para la continuidad de muchas empresas", ni el "enorme esfuerzo" que hacen los empresarios por "mantener los puestos de trabajo", con un nivel salarial "de los más altos del Estado y una jornada laboral de las más bajas".
Cecobi ha criticado también que la huelga tenga lugar "cuando más afecta al consumidor", por lo que ha considerado que el "daño que se pretende conseguir supera todos los limites de cordura y responsabilidad".
La patronal ha manifestado su "permanente disposición a negociar".

description.hltext_display: Köldrekord i Ronneby
description.content:
Publicerat: kl 09:48, , Kommentera här Under natten har det varit köldrekord i Ronneby. Enligt SMHI:s mätstation var det som lägst 23,3 minusgrader vilket är den kallaste decembertemperaturen man började med mätningarna 1945.
Enligt metrolog Erling Brännström är det en rad faktorer som bidragit till rekordet. Bland annat väldigt kall luft från norr och att snötäcket reflekterar bort mycket av värmen.
NyckelordAlla Ronnebynyheter

description.hltext_display: Israel complains to UN over Gaza rockets
description.content:
Israel has called on the Security Council to issue a "clear and resolute" message against rockets fired into its territory from the Gaza Strip, in a letter to the United Nations body that was made public on Wednesday.
The December 21 letter, made public by Israel's foreign ministry, comes amid rising tensions on Israel's border with the coastal enclave.
On Tuesday, Israel launched a series of airstrikes against what it said were tunnels, training sites and weapons facilities in the Gaza Strip, in response to a salvo of mortar shells on Monday and rocket fire on Tuesday morning. A Kassem rocket landed just metres (yards) away from a kindergarten in a southern Israeli kibbutz, wounding a teenage girl.
"The incidents of the past several days are part of an escalation of terrorist attacks emanating from Gaza that target Israeli civilians, towns, and military personnel," said the letter signed by Meron Reuben, Israel's UN ambassador.
"Israel holds the de facto authority in the Gaza Strip completely responsible for all of these incidents, which are carried out in clear violation of international law. In response to such attacks, Israel has exercised and will continue to exercise its right to self-defence."
The letter is addressed to US ambassador to the UN Susan Rice, the current chair of the Security Council, and UN Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon.
It says three rockets and 18 mortars have been fired into parts of southern Israel from Gaza since December 19 alone.
"The Security Council, the Secretary-General, and the international community must send a clear and resolute message that these attacks are unacceptable," Reuben wrote.
"In addition, the Security Council must give appropriate attention to the smuggling of arms into Gaza, which continues to fuel violence and instability in our region."
On Tuesday, Israeli army chief Lieutenant General Gabi Ashkenazi warned that the relative calm that has prevailed since Israel's devastating Gaza offensive at the end of 2008 could quickly end.
"The situation is tense and fragile and could easily deteriorate, particularly if a rocket lands in a populated area," he told a parliamentary committee.
Between December 2008 and January 2009, Israel launched Operation Cast Lead, in response to hundreds of rockets fired from Gaza into the Jewish state.
The war cost the lives of 1,400 Palestinians, mostly civilians, and 13 Israelis, 10 of them soldiers.
Since then, the number of rocket attacks has dropped considerably, but the army says more than 200 rockets or shells have been fired this year.

event_or_fact.property: The Security Council, the Secretary-General, and the international community must send a clear and resolute message that these attacks are unacceptable; In addition, the Security Council must give appropriate attention to the smuggling of arms into Gaza,

description.hltext_display: Zapatero ha apostado poco y Rajoy espera que el 'Gordo' termine en 6
description.content:
Antes de entrar al último pleno del año en el Congreso, el presidente español ha declarado que este año ha jugado poco. El líder popular ha comprado varios décimos y confía en que el Gordo acabe en 6. El presidente del Gobierno de España, José Luis Rodríguez Zapatero, ha asegurado que ha apostado poco para el sorteo de la Lotería de Navidad de hoy, mientras que el líder del PP, Mariano Rajoy, ha comprado décimos en Galicia y Madrid, y ha confiado en que el "Gordo" termine en 6, el número que lleva.
A la misma hora que comenzaba el sorteo extraordinario de Navidad, los miembros del Gobierno y los diputados comenzaban en el Congreso el último pleno del año. Al entrar al hemiciclo, Zapatero ha dicho que no sabe exactamente cuántos décimos de lotería ha comprado este año, aunque pocos.
Tampoco la ministra de Asuntos Exteriores, Trinidad Jiménez, ha gastado mucho, ya que sólo ha comprado el número del ministerio. Por su parte, Rajoy ha afirmado que tiene décimos comprados en Madrid y en Galicia, y ha apostado por que el "Gordo" termine en 6, antes de desear suerte a los informadores que se encontraban en el pasillo del Congreso.

description.hltext_display: 下半身のムダ毛の処理について教えてください - 今までは…
description.author: yunachiko
description.content:
下半身のムダ毛処理について悩んでいます。
知識もなく、Ｖ・Ｉ・Ｏと書かれていても、よくわかりません。
とっても恥ずかしいのですが、下着をはいて前から見えてしまう所だけは、剃刀で剃っていますが、それ以外のところは何もしていません。
気になりつつも、そんな話が出来る友人も無く、今まで来てしまいました。
自宅で、自分でのお手入れの仕方、どの辺まで？皆さんがしているのか、是非教えてください。
出来るだけ細かく教えてくださると嬉しいです
お願いします。
ユーザーID：7192881396
お気に入り登録数：122
古いレス順
レス数：31本
1 2 すべて トピ主のみ(1)
タイトル
投稿者
へー
2010年12月19日 11:05
最近の若い子は、下の毛も全部きれいに剃ると聞いたのですが、ホントなんでしょうか？
ちなみに私は一度も手入れしてません。みんな、そんなにこまめにやっているものなのでしょうか？
ユーザーID：8026524866
サラ
2010年12月19日 15:04
私もエステの方にお任せしているんですがおそらくＶが足の付け根でＯが性器の部分、Ｉがおしりの肛門ではないかな？私は全身脱毛しています。今は安く出来るのでエステで光脱毛の方が綺麗に仕上げてくれますよ。通うのも一か月半に一度位ですよ。
ユーザーID：6169052669
ソリソリ
2010年12月19日 17:39
私も小町で知ったのですが、Ｖ＝前の部分、Ｉ＝性器の部分、Ｏ＝肛門のあたりだと思います。形が似てるんですよね。
私は手術でそらなくてはいけなかったとき以来、自分でそっています。蒸れないので快適だと知ったという理由で。
でも、若い方の流行はどうだか知りませんが、そるのが普通というわけではないと思いますよ。
私は普通のレディスシェーバーでそっていますが、ああいう形の耐水性の器具が発売されればいいのに、と思っています。
Ｔ字型ではそりにくいし、顔そり用のはそりやすいけど電動耐水性のがないんですよね。それる範囲はぜーんぶ、そっていますよ。
ユーザーID：3610448304
ちこ
2010年12月19日 18:23
脱毛してます。
※部位の説明は他の方のおっしゃるとおりです。
女性の毛の中では比較的濃い部分＆デリケートな部分なのでとにかく痛いです(笑)
私は見える部分は形を整える感じで残して後のI、O部分についてはツルツルにするつもりです。
個人差はあると思いますが私は生理の時の不快感が違うように思います。
間違っても誰かに見せるため、ではないです(笑)
今は妊娠中なのでお休みして授乳期間が終わったら再開しますよ〜。
ユーザーID：2073563034
ねこ
2010年12月19日 19:38
私はＶとＩを20代後半で永久脱毛しました。だから今は特別なお手入れはしてないです。
永久脱毛する前はＶはカミソリで処理してました。
友達もＶは永久脱毛してる人が多いです。施術は恥ずかしいけど…やっといて良かったと思ってます
ユーザーID：2619764404
すず
2010年12月19日 20:52
Vは真っ直ぐ立って見える部分です。パンツの前の部分。小さい下着や水着だとはみ出ますね。
IはVの下から肛門まで。下着の生理用品を貼付ける部分に接触するライン。これも体育座りすると下着や水着からはみ出ます。
Oはまさに肛門周辺。結構生えてますよ。
Oは脱毛した方が衛生的。Iは、何度か脱毛である程度薄くした方がはみ出なくていいかと。完全につるつるにすると、生理の時スッキリだし蒸れないけど、排尿時に尿があらぬ方向に飛ぶ時も…。
Vは、面積や薄さを脱毛で調整したら良いかと。
ただ、脱毛したら元に戻らないからやり過ぎ注意。VやIは彼氏とも相談したら？つるつる好きもいれば、生えてるのが好きな人もいるから。彼が慣れてないと最初驚かれるかも。
特にVは、温泉等で他人に見えるので完全脱毛は勇気いるのでは？毛根から脱毛じゃなく、必要な時ワックスで抜いた方がいいかもね。
だいたいそんなとこです。
私はOとVのはみ出るとこは完全脱毛。Vの残りとIは何度か脱毛で薄くしました。満足。
一度鏡で見ることをお勧めします。

description.hltext_display: LED软灯条方案D7001/D7002可大幅减少芯片使用数量
description.content:
上网时间：2010-12-22 来源：电子元件技术网 LED显示与照明技术交流会
中心议题：
D7001/7002的典型应用
高性能低成本LED软灯条、护栏管解决方案
解决方案：
杨晓鹏：我今天要介绍的是高性能低成本LED软灯条、护栏管解决方案。LED装饰灯的份额逐年扩大，目前已经占据80%的份额。西方的圣诞节会采用大量的装饰灯来装点节日氛围，传统的装饰灯能源消耗很大。而采用LED装饰灯，要比传统照明节能85%，省电性能高，使用寿命长（可达50000小时以上），环保（无汞等有害物质）等优良的特点，确保了LED软灯条在户外，室内装饰照明市场的优异表现。LED装饰灯正成为一种潮流。
D7001、D7002套片是针对LED灯条、护栏管等装饰产品的解决方案，与传统产品相比，该方案具有高性能、高可靠性、设计简洁、低成本等诸多优势，为LED灯条、护栏管等产品升级换代提供了一个更优的解决方案。下面介绍下D7001、D7002的特点：
D7001为具有24路输出的LED驱动芯片，使用32脚5x5mm QFN封装，在软灯条上，这个面积已经很小了；
D7002为总线驱动芯片，使用8脚SOP封装。
应用本方案驱动24路单色LED或者8组RGB全彩LED仅需一颗D7001和一颗D7002。
下图是套片典型应用线路图。D7001可按照恒流及PWM的方式驱动24路。D7002用于接收主控发送的控制数据，并把控制数据传递到下一级D7002，从而实现灯条或护栏管的多级级联。
该方案的特点是有丰富的显示效果：
D7001/7002应用了全新的控制方式并固化了多种预置显示模式，并且可根据需求定制。
D7001/7002芯片可以实现并超越任何现有灯条及护栏管产品的显示效果。
流水灯、渐变、跳变、正反向移位、淡入、淡出、呼吸、七彩平滑过渡等各种显示效果。
更高的可靠性：
D7001/7002每组芯片有24路输出，可以驱动8组RGB全彩LED，大幅度降低了芯片的级联级数，提高了系统可靠性。
D7001/7002总线仅需要两条数据线，而且每级D7002都对总线数据进行了整形和再生和容错处理，总线传输的可靠性就得以大幅度提高。
D7001/7002最大限度的避免了控制信号中断、显示效果混乱以及长距离传输出错等故障。

description.hltext_display: Doctor-patient relationship will be difficult to replace
description.content:
and Community of Douglas:
It is with great personal sadness and distress that I read and learn more of the dismissal of my family’s physician. As the patient/doctor relationship is more then half the battle of treating children with learning disabilities, my kids’ relationship with Dr. Kinbrook was a godsend and will not easily be replaced.
The further for-knowledge of the barely ethical business practices of the administration and hospital board’s non-compete agreements means to see Dr. Kinbrook again will force my family to drive well over 120 miles from Douglas to see her. I can’t help but think that if these agreements were challenged in court, no judge in Wyoming would honor them given the distance from here to Casper or Wheatland, as is the hospital here is already competing with them anyway due to its lack of filling the needs here in Douglas.
If proof is needed that the management of our COUNTY-OWNED hospital knows they are wrong – ask why they feel they need to secure their board meetings with police? Does it seem they are afraid of the consequences of their own actions? Be wary of the excuse you’ll likely get instead of a substantive provable answer.
I call on the county commissioners to act on this. It is time for a new board for our hospitals sake, before our hospital is run into the ground and must be sold to the health care industry as we the people of Converse County will grow tired of subsidizing ever decreasing quality of care and will be forced to turn it over to more ethical management – and if you know your way around private hospital care you also know how dubious the ethics of such companies really are. It throws a harsh light on the subject doesn’t it?
If the care of our local hospital is so good why would they feel they have to drive all competing doctors from the county and all neighboring counties any way? Doesn’t the hospital have all the diagnostic and lab services that no private physician’s clinic could afford? Wouldn’t the act of having private offices mean the core services of our hospital would get more business in the form of lab tests and such?
At the very least, release Doctors Kinbrook and Blanchard from their non-compete clauses and let them take their best shot at being independent – the hospital and the citizens will not lose anything by it – and if the doctors are all the bad that our hospital wants to try and force us to believe I am sure the “market” will decide who is right and who is wrong- Won’t WE?

description.hltext_display: Japan's export growth sees boost in November
description.content:
Japan's export growth accelerated for the first time in nine months in November, data showed Wednesday, but the reading came in short of expectations amid fears of a looming economic slowdown.
Exports in November rose 9.1 percent to 5.44 trillion yen on year, the 12th straight monthly increase, with strong overseas demand, particularly for Japanese steel and metal working machinery, the ministry said. The growth rate rose for the first time since February, when exports grew 45.3 percent. The rate had dropped to 7.8 percent in October.
However, the November figure missed expectations for a 10.8 percent rise in a poll of economists by Dow Jones Newswires.
Analysts said the Japanese economy remains locked in a trend of shrinking exports due to a stronger yen, which makes Japanese products more expensive in overseas markets, and expectations that overseas demand will weaken.
"Japan's exports are slowing, a trend that remains the same," said Taro Saito, senior economist at NLI Research Institute.
"The economy continues to be pressured by the higher yen, although the strength of the currency is becoming moderate," he said.
The unit has been relatively stable in recent weeks after hitting a 15-year high of 80.21 against the dollar in November, giving some respite to the export sector and easing pressure on the economy.
But it has stayed at a relatively high level, at 83.82 to the dollar in Wednesday trade.
On Tuesday the Bank of Japan held its key rate at between zero and 0.1 percent after a two-day meeting, warning that a fragile recovery from deep recession was "pausing".
Economic growth in the July-September quarter was earlier this month revised up to an annualised 4.5 percent thanks to a rush to beat expiring government incentives, but expectations are for a contraction in the fourth quarter.
Japan last month passed an extra budget worth 58 billion dollars to cover a new stimulus package aimed at averting the threat of a "double-dip" recession.
Prime Minister Naoto Kan's second stimulus package since he came to power is designed to ease concerns over deflation and a strong yen, and includes job programmes, welfare spending and assistance for small businesses.
Kan took office in June promising to slash spending and work towards cutting the country's massive public debt, accounting for nearly 200 percent of gross domestic product.
But the state of Japan's economy has complicated his ambitions.
In November, Japan's exports to China jumped 18.3 percent while those to the United States rose 1.2 percent.
Exports to Europe expanded 10.1 percent, the first rise in two months, data showed.
Japan's imports in November also jumped 14.2 percent to 5.28 trillion yen, the 11th consecutive rise, driven higher by demand for iron ore as well as audio and visual devices.
The larger imports almost halved the country's trade surplus in the month from a year earlier, marking the first decline in three months, the finance ministry said.
The overall surplus stood at 162.8 billion yen (1.94 billion dollars), 55.4 percent smaller than a year earlier, the ministry said, much lower than the market forecast of 446 billion yen.

event_or_fact.property: The economy continues to be pressured by the higher yen, although the strength of the currency is becoming moderate
Japan's exports are slowing, a trend that remains the same

description.hltext_display: 同城网：网络营销商战新焦点
description.content:
http://www.brandcn.com作者：李国林 文章来源：品牌中国网 2010-12-22
尽管身上没有现金，但是张颖欣(化名)并不用在寒冷的冬雨中来到楼下ATM前排上五到十分钟队来为今天的午餐取钱。坐在电脑前，轻点几下鼠标，一份由墨西哥鸡肉卷和葡式蛋挞组成的简朴午膳便会在十分钟后送到办公室门口。和纽约与东京的同龄人一样，上海的年轻白领们如今也不愿在外卖上多费唇舌。
“半年前我也是听同事说，(买)外卖同样可以上网，并且只用从银行转账。”谈起午餐的新变化，张小姐显得司空见惯。现在她每天中午要做的，就是在搜索引擎或者同城网上寻找公司附近特色餐厅的外卖品种。而她不知道的是，这种行为已在同城的餐厅之间引发了一场激烈的网络商战。
网罗：当生存也囊括其中
作为“网龄”超过10年的“骨灰级”网友--曾宇鹏永远也忘不了1999年的“72小时网络生存测试”。那时，这个13亿人口的泱泱大国，才有不到400万“在线居民”。
据曾宇鹏回忆，该活动内容其实十分简单：志愿者在仅有基本沐浴、起居设备的酒店房间里通过互联网获得生存三天所必须的饮食。事实上，曾宇鹏他们恰恰是在“生存”环节“演砸”了：除了登陆某个事先已经大肆炒作对该活动进行赞助的食品厂网站拨打“订餐”电话外，便是志愿者们的亲友团在指定时间将食品、饮料送去工作人员手中。
至于主办方留下的信用卡几乎无人用到，要知道，内存的1500元相当于当年一个普通人的月薪。原因在于，那时仅有极少数网站可以在线收付，而在中国，全国性的银行间网络平台才刚刚建立。
然而，仅仅十年过去，一切都不同了：大到飞机小到发夹，都可以通过网络购买。事实上，中国在很多方面已经走到了发达国家的前列，最令人印象深刻的，还是令人惊异的规模：据SEO信息传播网保守估计，2010年第三季度中国网购订单量已达3.8亿份。分析师一致认为，在接下来的消费旺季里，这一数字还将冲上4亿大关，也就是说，用不了多久，中国每位网友都将在一个季度里确认一张以上的网络订单。
另一方面，同城服务也方兴未艾：除了张小姐的外卖，网友们还在门户网站、论坛附带的微博上对呼朋唤友参与团购活动，并对各个百货商店、咖啡厅在虚拟的空间上予以点评。此外，“本领交换”、“二手货处理”都已成为同城网站上的热点所在。在生存都被网络包办的今天，越来越多商务活动移植上网自然将成为下一场激烈商战的导火索。
同城：暂缺开发的商务蓝海
和很多从事网络推广的商家一样，李国林也曾经把注意力放在遥远的省际市场，“那时我做葡萄酒推广，主要手段是将网站做好，将葡萄酒的效果写成文章，吸引网友来读，再将读者吸引到我的网站就ok了，没想到我仔细一统计，签单客户中很大一部分还是来自同一座城市的。这就引起了我的思考：也许同城的地理优势同样是吸引网络买家的重要因素。”
实际上，在目前的中国网络营销业界，大部分从业者仍然集中在IM推广和网站建设两大领域，将宣传文本粘贴在qq群里、论坛上仍然是目前的主流营销手段。而将同城资源和地理信息整合，建立营销优势还是很多商家始料未及的。
当然，也有极少数人意识到了这一点，现在已任SEO信息传播网负责人的李国林就是一例，“随着58同城、点评网、百度身边的兴起，以服务业为基础的同城网络商务将进入新的阶段，传统的‘酒香不怕巷子深’恐怕也必须改成‘酒香还怕无人知’了，而上海的餐厅们争相上网并且在搜索引擎上巧妙占据和‘上海’有关的长尾关键词就是这一趋势的体现。因此，同城还是一块亟待开发的网络商务蓝海。”李国林说道。
免责声明：本文仅代表作者个人观点，与品牌中国网无关。其原创性以及文中陈述文字和内容未经本站证实，对本文以及其中全部或者部分内容、文字的真实性、完整性、及时性本站不作任何保证或承诺，请读者仅作参考，并请自行核实相关内容。

description.hltext_display: Tonnenweise Gold: IWF macht sich flüssig
description.content: Gold-Reserven runter, Geld-Reserven rauf: Bei einem Preis von derzeit mehr als 1300 Dollar je Feinunze ein gutes Geschäft. Mehr als 400 Tonnen des Edelmetalls wechseln den Besitzer.

（中央社記者林惠君台北2010年12月22日電）行政院主計處今天公布11月失業率數據，隨著景氣好轉、就業機會增加，11月失業率為4.73%，較10月降0.19個百分點，較去年11月下降1.13個百分點。
主計處表示，11月就業人數為1060.5萬人，較10月續增4.5萬人，較去年11月增加23.6萬人。失業人數為52.7萬人，較10月減少1.9萬人，與去年11月比較，減少11.8萬人。
此外，經季節調整後，11月失業率為4.79%，較10月下降0.17個百分點，已連續15個月下降。

description.hltext_display: ‘How I saw the meeting’
description.content:
On Dec. 15, several of us local folks attended the hospital board meeting. I have received several calls the last two days asking about my take on this meeting. I will try to describe the events. I do not intend to cast any suspicion or insult anyone. I will only try to tell it as I saw it.
First of all, many of us were unaware who the board members are. I can now tell you they are Dr. Chuck Lyford (chairman, I think), Bob Kayser (former chairman and smoke screen specialist), Arlene Ernst, Gay Bolln and an unidentified lady (from Glenrock, I believe).
Shortly after we entered the room, Dr. Lyford addressed our group and then turned the duty over to the smoke screen specialist. We were told immediately that we would leave there “frustrated” because we would not be told anything regarding the resignation of the numerous doctors. It was said, however, “It’s not the board’s fault.”
The question was asked regarding the county and tax payers owning the hospital. We were told the county contributed a very small amount. In fact, the hospital subsidizes the county $1 million per year. That being said, it seems we do not own the hospital, they actually own the patients, who can be stolen, traded and/or sold to another facility.
That is the reason for the “60 miles” competitive clause in the doctor contracts (just telling what I heard, I’m confused too).
Oh yes, I almost forgot, the board had their attorney and two Douglas policemen present. Wow, we were assured the doctors that have resigned were “determined” to do so even when the board asked them to stay.
We were told that the hospital is a business trying to make a profit. Those of us that thought we should be able to keep a doctor and go to a break-even facility are living in the past. All or most of the changes for the “better” have happened over the last 14 years, the same time as Mr. Kayser has served on this board.
Again, wow.
From what I heard, this board answers to no one. They are, however, chosen by the county commissioners who then apparently look the other way. Maybe because of that $1 million subsidy?
We were excused after about an hour as the board had a lot of business to conduct. I think that is true. I’m sure they will have to choose the next determined to resign staff member.
Mr. Kayser did suggest that some of us approach Lucile Taylor and ask to serve on this board. Perhaps that would be a good idea. Why don’t all you “common” folks come up with some names. Will the county commissioners pick anyone else? That could be another story.
Jess Rodgers, Douglas

description.hltext_display: Katich eyes fifth Test
description.content: Injured Australia opener Simon Katich has revealed he is set to make a shock return in time for the fifth Ashes Test, increasing the pressure on Phillip Hughes to find form in the Boxing Day meeting in Melbourne. Katich damaged his Achilles tendon during the second Test defeat to England in Adelaide and was initially expected to miss the rest of the summer."I'm doing all the rehab and pulling up well from the strength work so the physio's pretty happy with where I'm at and actually thinks I'm ahead of schedule," Katich said.The veteran left-hander has revealed that his comeback plans are ahead of schedule and he may be fit for the Sydney Test, starting January 3.Hughes replaced Katich for the third Test in Perth but failed twice as Australia pulled off a series-saving win over England.Knowing Katich is looking over his shoulder will place further heat on the out-of-form Hughes in the biggest Test of the summer."Normally it takes a couple of months to settle down but it's settling down pretty quickly," he added."I've been having treatment on it every day for the last few weeks and it's all going really well."Asked if he'd be fit in time for Sydney, Katich replied: "I'm a long shot but you never know."You can't really put a date on it because with tendon injuries you never know until you fully test them, but if I test it next week and pull up well then who knows."Copyright PA Sport 2010, All Rights Reserved

event_or_fact.property: I'm doing all the rehab and pulling up well from the strength work so the physio's pretty happy with where I'm at and actually thinks I'm ahead of schedule; The veteran left-hander has revealed that his comeback plans are ahead of schedule and he may be f
I'm a long shot but you never know.
Normally it takes a couple of months to settle down but it's settling down pretty quickly

description.hltext_display: Mobil und multimedial: die changeX App für mobile Lesegeräte
description.author: changeX - das Online-Journal, das
description.content: changeX - Ideen für morgenRechtzeitig zu Weihnachten startet changeX seine Ausgabe für das mobile Internet. Seit heute ist die App edition changeX im iTunes-Store verfügbar. Damit bietet das Online-Journal für Zukunftsideen, neue Wirtschaft und Innovation ausgewählte Inhalte speziell für mobile Lesegeräte an. „Wir setzen auf die Verbindung von Text und audiovisuellen Medien – also Beiträge zum Lesen, Hören und Schauen“, sagt Winfried Kretschmer, Chefredakteur und Geschäftsführer des Magazins. So können Essays als Text gelesen oder als Audio angehört werden. Interviews werden als Text und Video aufbereitet. Neben diesen kleineren Formaten, die sich zum Lesen für „Zwischendurch“ eignen, gibt es umfangreiche Dossiers zu Zukunftsthemen. Die App „edition changeX“ steht im AppStore von iTunes kostenlos zum Download bereit. Sie bietet einen Überblick über neu erschienene Beiträge, die im Einzelabruf erworben werden können. changeX kooperiert dabei mit dem Berliner Start-up textunes, dem Marktführer für mobile E-Books. Die Inhalte in der App werden fortlaufend aktualisiert. Einführungstexte und Schlüsselzitate aller Beiträge können kostenlos gelesen werden. Auch werden kostenlose Schnupper-Beiträge zum Probelesen angeboten. „Wir eröffnen damit einen neuen Vertriebskanal, der mobilen und selektiven Nutzergewohnheiten entgegen kommt, bieten jedoch weiterhin ein Online-Journal im Abonnement auf unserer Website an“, sagt Winfried Kretschmer. Das neue Angebot ermöglicht es somit neuen Lesern die journalistische Arbeit von changeX kennenzulernen.Diese Pressemitteilung wurde auf openPR veröffentlicht.changeX Gmbh Postfach 1645 85426 Erding Winfried Kretschmer Telefon: 0700 24264392 E-Mail: Internet: www.changex.deDas Online-Journal changeX bietet seit fast zehn Jahren auf www.changex.de Beiträge zu Zukunftsthemen und dem Wandel in Wirtschaft und Gesellschaft an. Am 11. Januar feiert das Zukunftsmagazin seinen zehnten Geburtstag.

description.hltext_display: 視力をよくしたい。 - 10年前に受けましたよ
description.content:
2010年11月21日 0:28
小学３年生の時から、ずっと目が悪くてメガネをしています。
大学の時にコンタクトレンズを入れてみたのですが、目の調子が悪くて
使用できませんでした。
今もドライアイとか異物感があってコンタクトは、できません。
そこで、レーシックをやってみたいと思うのですが、いかがでしょうか？
友人や知り合いの方でレーシックをやった人は、いますか？
こわくてなかなか説明会にも行けずに終わっているのですが、
レーシックあこがれています。
ご意見宜しくお願いします。
ユーザーID：4657839758
お気に入り登録数：13
古いレス順
レス数：5本
タイトル
投稿者
りこ
2010年11月21日 11:29
こんにちは。
レーシックは、角膜をレーザーで削って視力を調節するので、
本人の角膜の厚さによって、受けられる人と受けられない人がいます。
なので、まず、受けられるかどうか調べてもらうのがいいと思いますよ
説明会は怖くないですよ
ユーザーID：8179760772
プリホ
2010年11月21日 11:46
私の周りでも３０歳前半ですが、レーシックを受けた人が何人かいます。
コンタクトレンズで乾く、装着やケアが面倒、メガネがずらわしい、といった理由です。
今はレーシック技術も向上したみたいで、術当日も楽なようです。
でも、私はしません。
以前働いていた眼科医の見解では、
視力を例えば2.0にできたとしても、一般的に老眼が始まると言われている４０歳過ぎに、
きちんと老眼が始まり、細かい字を見るのにメガネが必要になる。
つまり３０歳を過ぎて手術すれば、その効果が１０年もつかどうかです。
又、将来的に白内障の手術を受ける際、レーシックの影響で眼内レンズ設定が難しく、
白内障の手術自体を受けられないかもしれない→白内障が進めば、最後は見えなくなる。
この点が解決しないので、まだまだデータ不足だと私は思います。
ユーザーID：2678231397
あひる
2010年12月21日 19:19
去年レーシック手術しました。
以前はコンタクトを使用していましたが、ドライアイとゴミが入ることが多く、元々眼が弱いらしく困っていました。
裸眼０．０４→１．５になりました。
凄く快適です。もっと早くやれば良かったと思ったくらいです。
私は将来的な心配より今の目が見える幸せに満足です
ユーザーID：6062618462
眼科医の妻
2010年12月22日 8:39
レーシックは、上手くいった場合は非常に快適になりますが、
１００パーセント安全なわけではありません。
後遺症に苦しむ患者さんが結構主人の病院で治療を受けていますが、
話を聞くと悲惨です。
私もド近眼で両眼とも視力が０．０１ですので
できれば裸眼で風に吹かれて外を歩きたい！と思います。
でも、主人が「止めなさい」と言います。
矯正して見えるようになるなら、
手術なんか受けない方がよい、というのが主人の意見です。
あと数年で老眼になったら、
老眼鏡は要らないから、眼鏡の数は人と同じになるよと。
老眼は例外なく、誰もが必ずなるみたいです。
でも、説明を聞きに行くくらいはいいのでは？
ただ、病院は選んだ方が良いですよ。
ユーザーID：4460197118
千秋
2010年12月22日 15:41
私は今、46歳ですけれど、
レーシックの本を何冊も出している、
都内の有名な先生のところで受けました。
0.03→1.2になって、今でも眼鏡なしで生活できます。
それはそれは快適になりました。
ただ最近、老眼ではなく緑内障になってしまいました。
これはレーシックとは直接関係なくて、
もともとド近眼だったので、
なりやすい素地があったようです。
結論をいいますと、
レーシックは最高の技術を持った先生から
手術を受けるのなら、
別に怖くないし、お勧めします。

description.hltext_display: Anelka agent eyes US switch
description.content: Nicolas Anelka's brother and agent has claimed the striker could move to the United States when his Chelsea contract expires. The 31-year-old's deal at Stamford Bridge runs until 2012, by which time he will have spent 11 seasons in English football. And he could be tempted to follow former France team-mate Thierry Henry to the States in search of a fresh challenge.Claude Anelka said, in comments reported by the Daily Star: "Nicolas told me he is interested in playing in the United States. We could see him crossing the Atlantic, and I'm serious when I say this."He added: "He asked himself what he will do once his current contract runs out."The US is quite something, and a dream destination. He says he will give it a try, even though he would earn less money than in somewhere like Qatar."Copyright PA Sport 2010, All Rights Reserved

description.hltext_display: Russian president heads to India's financial capital
description.content:
Russian President Dmitry Medvedev headed for Mumbai on Wednesday, after squeezing in a tour of the Taj Mahal on the second leg of an India visit focused on strengthening defence and trade ties.
In Mumbai, where security has been stepped up over a reported intelligence warning of a possible militant attack targeting foreigners, Medvedev was scheduled to speak to students at a technology institute before flying home. On Tuesday Medvedev held talks with Indian Prime Minister Manmohan Singh in New Delhi and witnessed the signing of a raft of defence and nuclear deals potentially worth billions of dollars.
The two sides also agreed to double bilateral trade to 20 billion dollars by 2015.
"I believe that trade between us does not nearly reflect our privileged partnership," Medvedev told reporters at a joint press briefing.
One standout deal was a contract on the joint design and development of fifth-generation fighter aircraft with stealth capabilities.
Although no figures were mentioned, experts say the final fighter deal could be worth close to 30 billion dollars, with India planning to induct up to 300 of the aircraft into its air force.
Medvedev's visit concluded a flurry of top-level diplomatic activity that has seen the leaders of all five permanent members of the UN Security Council beat a trade-focused path to India's door over the past six months.
British Prime Minister David Cameron was in the country in July, and US President Barack Obama, French President Nicolas Sarkozy and Chinese Premier Wen Jiabao have passed through over the last six weeks.
Each visitor brought large-scale business delegations and used the visit to trumpet new deals with the world's second-fastest-growing major economy.
Medvedev was especially keen to fend off growing international competition for a slice of India's increasingly lucrative market for military hardware -- once monopolised by Moscow.
Traditionally India's default defence supplier, Russia now has to compete with top manufacturers from Europe and the United States as India diversifies its sources of military hardware and becomes more demanding over pricing and quality.
As well as bilateral issues, Medvedev and Singh discussed regional security and agreed to deepen counter-terrorism cooperation.
"Those who hide terrorists hide criminals. No modern civilised state can hide terrorists," Medvedev said.
He made no specific mention of India's arch-rival Pakistan, which Delhi accuses of harbouring militant groups like Lashkar-e-Taiba (LeT) -- blamed for the November 2008 attacks on Mumbai.
The Press Trust of India, quoting unidentified official sources, said suspected LeT infiltration was behind the alert sounded in Mumbai on Tuesday ahead of the Christmas and New Year holidays.
"There are conscious efforts by terror organisations to target foreigners during these two festivals here," said Mumbai Police Commissioner Sanjeev Dayal.

event_or_fact.property: There are conscious efforts by terror organisations to target foreigners during these two festivals here
Those who hide terrorists hide criminals.; No modern civilised state can hide terrorists
I believe that trade between us does not nearly reflect our privileged partnership

description.hltext_display: 不会和不懂招商的化妆品企业必须觉醒了！
description.content:
http://www.brandcn.com作者：于斐 文章来源：品牌中国网 2010-12-22
最近一直接到一些化妆品企业的电话咨询，一些知名的化妆品杂志也采访我关于化妆品招商的问题，看来，面对招商，不仅是企业本身有了不可避免的问题，也引起了相关媒体的关注。
对于化妆品企业的招商，许多企业都有这样一个感觉：想说爱你不容易!
中国的化妆品企业过剩，产品同质化日趋严重，这是不争的事实，虽然经过相关标准验收，会让大批的企业被兼并、消失，但是由于地域差别、地方保护、职能管理部门关系等等，中国的化妆品市场在一段时间内仍将是群雄割据的混战场面。
企业要求生存求发展，招商，做为一种快速、低成本拓展产品通路的方式，无疑仍是众多企业的制胜法宝。然而，许多化妆品企业的招商却都是不成功的!
许多化妆品企业都有这样一个误区，各个地方一有招商会便冲了过去，而实际上呢，企业进行招商时又没有充分的准备，在展会上要么只是派发企业招商宣传资料，要么就是立几块广告牌子，室内的也好，户外的也罢，仅此而已，对那些潜在的经销商来说也只能起到“惊鸿一瞥”的作用，从长远利益上来讲，几乎无任何可操作性可言的实效手段，使招商无法落实到实际，也往往会造成95%以上的厂家是乘兴而来、败兴而归。
试想想，化妆品企业看似忙活的一场又一场的参加招商会、美博会，可实际上呢，就是盲目的凑热闹，浪费了大把的人力、物力、财力，毫无针对性和实效性，好钢没使在刀刃上，这样的无聊行为，不如趁早停止的好。
而我们蓝哥智洋机构在服务化妆品企业的时候，面对他们这种想法和做法也都是及时给予制止的。什么样的企业，运用什么样的手段去招商，去吸引经销商的眼球都是有讲究的，而不是随大流的跟风去做就能成功的。我们一般都会充分利用手上的资源，让招商客户可以正式参会，同时面对面的向潜在经销商推荐产品，以差异化的卖点直接吸引经销商眼球，这种方式与简单的派发资料相比，能使招商企业起到事半功倍的作用。这使得蓝哥智洋机构得到了招商客户的充分认可，达到了双赢的目的。
在生命的演变过程中，一些生命机体为了生存资源和适应环境的变化，他们的身体结构也在不断发生变化，这就是物种的进化性;一些物种在进化的过程中被同类所替代，无数物种消失的同时又产生新的物种，这就是物种的多样性。
纵观中国的市场发展过程，其实与物种的进化性、多样性，有着异曲同工之处，尤其以中国的化妆品市场为最。可以说，中国的化妆品市场发展之迅速，竞争之惨烈，堪称中国市场经济发展的一个缩影。君不见，在一年又一年烽火四起的市场洗礼下，多少熟悉的品牌倒下了，又有多少陌生品牌不断的涌现。同样也说明，能否适应竞争环境，是企业能否生存的根本。
中国的化妆品企业过剩，产品同质化日趋严重，这是不争的事实，虽然经过相关标准验收，会让大批的企业被兼并、消失，但是由于地域差别、地方保护、职能管理部门关系等等，中国的化妆品市场在一段时间内仍将是群雄割的混战场面。
[1] [2] [3] [4] 下一页

description.hltext_display: Angry Samba seeks Rovers exit
description.content: Captain Christopher Samba is intent on leaving Blackburn after being angered by the decision of new owners Venky's to sack manager Sam Allardyce. The Indian food group axed Allardyce within a month of completing their takeover of the club, with Steve Kean currently in temporary charge as a long-term replacement is sought."If this is the way the club's going to be run from now on, I don't want to be part of it and I want to leave," said the 26-year-old in remarks reported by the Sun."As captain it's very difficult to say this but I've thought long and hard about it. Nobody in football understands the decision to sack Sam."We could have been relegated last year and Sam saved the club, so how can he be treated like this now?"Samba exempted chairman John Williams from blame, though, before pleading for a swift decision over Allardyce's replacement."I'm sure Mr Williams would not have made this decision. He's a football man and respects what a great job Sam has done," he said.He added: "The players and fans need answers about the club's future. Unless we commit to who the manager is, how can we attract big players in January?"Copyright PA Sport 2010, All Rights Reserved

event_or_fact.property: The players and fans need answers about the club's future.; Unless we commit to who the manager is, how can we attract big players in January?

description.hltext_display: Kestaneli hindi dolması
description.content:
11 okunma 0 yorum Yemek Yazdır Hindi eti ile yapılabilecek nefis bir yemek...
Malzemeler : (6 kişi iin) 2 Kg'lık bir adet Hindi 8 su bardağı Su yemek kaşığı Tuz Salası İin 80 gr sadeyağ (4 yemek kaşığı) 2 adet orta byklkte Kuru Soğan 1 kahve fincanı domates salası yada 2 adet irice Domates Kaynakwh webhatti.com: 2 su bardağı Hindi Suyu Kestaneli İ Pilav 375 gr Pirin (1,5 su bardağı) 250 gr Kestane 1 adet orta boy Kuru Soğan 60 gr sadeyağ (3 yemek kaşığı) 1 yemek kaşığı am Fıstığı 2 yemek kaşığı Kuş zm Tuz, Karabiber, Yeni Bahar, Tarın Hazırlanışı :Temizlenmiş hindi 8 bardak su ile tencereye konur ve etleri yumuşayıncaya kadar kaynatılır. Bu arada suyun ısınmasıyla oluşan kpkler delikli bir kepe ile alınır. Sonra yağın iine soğanlar entilerek pembeleşinceye kadar tutulur. Domates kullanılacaksa, stne domateslerde konur. Domatesler kavrulduktan sonra hindi suyu ilave edilir. (eğer sala kullanılıyorsa, bu safhada sulandırılmış sala ilave olunur). Sonra, Hindi bir tepsiye konur. zerine bu sala dklerek fırına konur. Kaynakwh webhatti.com: Diğer yanda, İ Pilav hazırlanır. 2 silme yemek kaşığı yağ iine 1 adet soğan entilir. am fıstıkları da atılarak kavrulur. Daha sonra pirin ilave olunur ve 10 dakika kadar kavrulur.
Bu arada Kestaneler hafife yumuşayacak ama dağılmayacak şekilde haşlanır. Sonra pirinlere silme 1 ay kaşığı karabiber, tarın, bahar, Kuş zm tuz, 1 tatlı kaşığı toz şeker ve Kestaneler ilave edilir. zerine 1,5 bardak su ilave edilir. 20 dakika kadar kaynatılır. Fırından ıkarılan Hindinin iine pilav doldurulur. 10 dakika daha fırına atılır.
Servise getirilirken hindinin ayakları alminyum folyo ile sslenebilir. Fotoğraflar: Tualim Forum- kyocuğu Uye Misafir Bunları da beğenebilirsiniz... Refika?nın mutfağı Sosyal Ağlarda Paylaş Rasgele Tarifler Arnavut Ciğeri

description.hltext_display: Việt Nam - điểm đến lớn thứ 4 của vốn H� n Quốc
description.content:
Việt Nam là thị trường đầu tư nước ngoài lớn thứ 4 của Hàn Quốc sau Mỹ, Hồng Kông và Trung Quốc với 2.600 dự án có tổng trị giá 22,5 tỷ USD tính đến cuối tháng 11/2010.
Thông tin trên được ông Sun Seogki, Giám đốc Phòng Thương mại Đại sứ quán Hàn Quốc (KOTRA) tại Hà Nội cho biết trong Hội thảo Môi trường và Cơ hội Đầu tư tại Việt Nam, diễn ra ngày 21/12.
Với những con số này, Hàn Quốc là nhà đầu tư trực tiếp nước ngoài lớn thứ 2 tại Việt Nam, chỉ sau Đài Loan. Các dự án của Hàn Quốc chủ yếu tập trung vào các lĩnh vực công nghiệp nhẹ (dệt, may, giày dép) xây dựng hạ tầng khu công nghiệp, bất động sản...
Tuy nhiên, ông Sun Seogki cũng nói thêm thủ tục hành chính còn rườm rà, cơ sở hạ tầng còn yếu kém, thị trường phân phối chưa phát triển là những rào cản lớn cho các nhà đầu tư nước ngoài tại Việt Nam, trong đó có doanh nghiệp Hàn Quốc.
Phát biểu tại hội thảo, ông Đặng Huy Đông, Thứ trưởng Bộ Kế hoạch và Đầu tư cho biết, trong Hội nghị tư vấn các nhà tài trợ được tổ chức đầu tháng 12 vừa qua tại Hà Nội, Hàn Quốc đã cam kết tài trợ 411,8 triệu USD cho Việt Nam năm 2011, tăng 39% so với năm 2010.
Theo Bộ Công thương Việt Nam, Hàn Quốc hiện là 4 trong 10 đối tác thương mại quan trọng nhất của Việt Nam, sau Trung Quốc, Nhật Bản và Mỹ. Hàn Quốc là thị trường xuất khẩu lớn thứ 5 và là thị trường nhập khẩu lớn thứ 2 của Việt Nam.
Theo Nam Hằng

description.hltext_display: UGT advierte de que los Presupuestos de 2011 obstaculizarán la recuperación
description.content: UGT ha advertido de que los Presupuestos Generales del Estado (PGE) de 2011, aprobados en el Congreso, consolidarán el retroceso social y obstaculizarán la recuperación económica y del empleo en España.

description.hltext_display: هبوط الفائض التجاري لليابان
description.author: admin
description.content: قالت الحكومة اليابانية إن فائضها التجاري هبط بنسبة 55.4% في نوفمبر/ تشرين الثاني الماضي بالمقارنة مع نفس الشهر من العام الماضي بأول انخفاض في ثلاثة أشهر. � وقالت وزارة المالية إن الفائض وصل إلى 162.8 مليار ين (1.94 مليار دولار) أي أقل بكثير من توقعات السوق بوصوله إلى 446 مليار ين. وارتفعت الصادرات الشهر الماضي بنسبة 9.1% إلى 5.44 تريليونات ين للشهر الثاني عشر على التوالي مع زيادة الطلب الخارجي على الصلب والآلات اليابانية. � كما زادت الواردات بنسبة 14.2% إلى 5.28 تريليونات ين مسجلة ارتفاعا للشهر الحادي عشر على التوالي مع زيادة الطلب المحلي على خام الحديد وعلى الأدوات السمعية والبصرية. � وزادت صادرات اليابان إلى الصين، أكبر شريك تجاري لها، بنسبة 18.3% في نوفمبر/ تشرين الثاني بالمقارنة بنفس الشهر من العام الماضي، كما ارتفعت الصادرات إلى الاتحاد الأوروبي بنسبة 10.1% وإلى الولايات المتحدة بنسبة 1.2%.

description.hltext_display: 《通信網路》訊舟砸3.3億元拿下康全43%股權，跨足電通市場
description.content:
【時報記者何美如台北報導】為加深電信市場布局，訊舟科技 (3047) 今(22)日宣布與康全電訊 (8089) 策略聯盟，以每股12.23元共砸現金1.3億元拿下康全17.46%股權；並增資發行近一千萬股，以1股普通股換康全普通股1.64股，受讓26.2%股權，以訊舟目前一股約20元來計算，成本約2億元。本次股權交換及股權買賣基準日暫定為100年2月25日，訊舟拿下康全43.66%股權，成本約3.3億元，康全的原經營團隊將全數留任。
訊舟表示，康全主攻電信市場，訊舟則以零售市場見長，雙方在通路可產生互補作用，在行銷生產、共同採購及研發資源也可充分合作，預期將帶動訊舟跨足電信通訊市場，創造規模經濟效益，提升整體營運績效。
康全主要產品為CPE(用戶端)之寬頻網路產品，歐洲營收佔比約7成，以承接國際電信，或ISP業者釋出的代工訂單為主，亦透過台灣、北美、南美、歐洲和中國分公司，行銷自有品牌COMTREND產品。今年1-11月營收達37.8億元，稅後盈餘1816萬元，EPS為0.29元，全年營收可望達40億元，惟在業外影響下，全年可能虧損，訊舟希望明年可開始獲利。
訊舟第四季旺季不旺，業績與上季相當，12月營收可望優於上月，全年代工：品牌營收佔比約65:35，對明年營運看法樂觀。訊舟表示，康全目前無自製產能，未來擬由訊舟代工，訊舟東莞廠正進行產能擴充計畫，預期預計明年第一季完成，產能擴大一倍，投入金額約新台幣2億元。
截至9月底止，康全的每股淨值為11.33元，訊舟將增資發行普通股9,989,130股(佔訊舟已發行股份約7.5%)，受讓康全公司股東張怡慶等股東所持有之康全公司普通股16,382,174股，換股比例為康全公司普通股1.64股換發本公司普通股1股。另，訊舟將以每股現金新台幣12.23元購買張怡慶等股東所持有之康全公司普通股10,921,449股，現金支出約1.3億元。本次交易，訊舟成本約3.3億元，將拿下康全普通股27,303,623股，佔康全公司已發行股份總數之43.66%。

description.hltext_display: ○○県には○○が多い - 広島県民です
description.author: nama
description.content:
よく小町でも福岡は美人が多いとの意見が多く嬉しいです。
実際同じ女性から見ても振り返るような美人がごろごろいて、石を投げれば美人に当たるような福岡の美人率に驚いています。
余談ですがそんな私も美人と言っていただいています。
ところで先日奈良県へ行って驚きました。
温泉に入ると、年配の方から若い子までみんな豊乳なんです。貧乳の私は福岡ではそんなに気になりませんでしたが、あきらかに小学生の女の子に負けていました。
へんな話土偶でおっぱいが大きい女性の有名な像がありますよね。
まさにみんなそんな感じで本当に驚きました。
みなさんも実は密かに思っている○○県には○○が多い、教えてください。

description.hltext_display: Tax concessions for Vietnam shipbuilder Vinashin
description.content:
Vietnam has granted tax concessions to nearly-bankrupt shipbuilder Vinashin, a newspaper reported Wednesday, after speculation authorities would find a way to help the firm meet a debt deadline.
Among the concessions, the state-owned firm will get a grace period until December 31, 2011 for paying its taxes, Tuoi Tre reported, citing the Ministry of Finance.
State-linked Tuoi Tre did not give the amount of tax involved or the period it was due for. The one-year delay coincides with a 12-month deferral Vinashin had reportedly sought for repayment of its international debts.
Vinashin (Vietnam Shipbuilding Industry Group) was due to pay on December 20 the initial 60 million dollar instalment on a 600 million dollar loan arranged by Credit Suisse in 2007.
Company chairman Nguyen Ngoc Su was quoted in official media on Monday as saying the firm had no way to immediately make the payment and was "still waiting for the final answer" on its deferral request.
Vinashin officials and creditors have refused comment to AFP.
The government has said Vinashin must settle its own debts -- which total at least 86 trillion dong (4.4 billion dollars).
Despite those comments, speculation has grown that the government would step in to help Vinashin.
One foreign analyst said Wednesday that he thought the tax concessions were the government's way of indirectly bailing out the firm.
"I don't see any other explanation other than helping Vinashin," said the analyst, declining to be named.
With the tax concessions, "the money flows (that) you have in the meantime you can use for other things," he said.
The Tuoi Tre report listed four separate tax concession measures, including a deferral of taxes on imported equipment, and the general one-year grace period.
Vinashin expects to secure capital to repay creditors through a restructuring of the group but this takes times, Su was quoted as saying in Monday's official media report.
Global ratings agency Moody's last week downgraded Vietnam's government bond rating to B1 -- an undesirable investment -- from Ba3 because of Vinashin's debts as well as other economic factors.

event_or_fact.property: the money flows (that) you have in the meantime you can use for other things
Vinashin expects to secure capital to repay creditors through a restructuring of the group but this takes times
the firm had no way to immediately make the payment and was "still waiting for the final answer" on its deferral request

description.hltext_display: Met 'faces toughest period yet'
description.content:
The Metropolitan Police is facing its most challenging period since Commissioner Sir Paul Stephenson took over, he has said.
Sir Paul, who was deputy commissioner five years ago and took the top post last year, said a combination of violent disorder on the streets, budget cuts, and the forthcoming Olympics were stretching his force.
And he acknowledged the student tuition fees protests were being driven by "a real passion about a cause". Sir Paul, interviewed on BBC Radio 4's Today programme, was asked how far the protests, cuts, and other events, were stretching his force. He replied: "When you put all the various challenges that face me and my colleagues in the Metropolitan Police service together, this is as challenging a period as we have ever faced." He stressed he did not doubt the operational capability of the force. But he said: "I think the challenges we are facing, that stretch we are facing, is not as we have known for a long, long time. "We can make significant economy savings, but how far we can stretch those savings is a real issue. I am concerned about our current budgetary situation." On the student protests, Sir Paul said: "There's clearly a sense of anger out there that's led to a level of violence." He said some protesters were determined to breach police lines and had come prepared, and added: "I think we have got a sense of a real passion about a cause out there. Within that, there are various levels of passion that lead to extremism."

event_or_fact.property: he did not doubt the operational capability of the force
a combination of violent disorder on the streets, budget cuts, and the forthcoming Olympics were stretching his force
the student tuition fees protests were being driven by "a real passion about a cause"
