description.hltext_display: Côte d'Ivoire: Ce qui est négociable et ce qui ne l'est pas, selon Laurent Gbagbo
description.content:
Pour la première fois depuis sa cérémonie d'investiture, Laurent Gbagbo s'est adressé à ses concitoyens hier mardi 21 décembre, lors d'une allocution télévisée sur la Radio Télévision Ivoirienne. « Je suis le président de la Côte d'Ivoire », a martelé Laurent Gbagbo. Toutefois, il s'est dit « disposé à accueillir un comité d'évaluation sur la crise post-électorale ».Ce comité aurait pour mission « d'analyser objectivement les faits et le processus électoral pour un règlement pacifique de la crise ».
Laurent Gbagbo entend laisser la porte ouverte pour des discussions, mais à une seule condition : que son adversaire, Alassane Ouattara, reconnaisse qu'il a perdu la présidentielle et qu'il respecte les lois ivoiriennes.
Même si par le passé, le pensionnaire du palais présidentiel a bien voulu faire quelques aménagements à loi fondamentale du pays pour permettre à ses opposants de concourir à l'élection suprême, aujourd'hui Laurent Gbagbo ne semble en aucun cas prêt à faire la moindre concession sur une légalité institutionnelle qui vient de lui offrir un deuxième mandat à la tête de l'Etat.
Même s'il déclare que la communauté internationale a déclaré la guerre aux ivoiriens et que cela ne peut être accepté, Laurent Gbagbo est tout de même conscient de son niveau d'isolement à l'extérieur des frontières. Pour sortir de cette situation, il se dit prêt à accueillir un comité international d'évaluation de la crise post électorale dirigé par l'Union africaine.
Une idée qui fait au mieux sourire dans l'entourage d'Alassane Ouattara. Hier soir mardi 21 décembre, un très proche de Guillaume Soro estimait que les propositions de dialogue de Laurent Gbagbo n'ont pour seul but que de « gagner du temps » et que ses manÅ"uvres de diversion pour tenter de diviser la communauté internationale n'ont aucune chance d'aboutir.
Le camp Ouattara accuse le président sortant d'organiser, via ses services, des représailles contre les opposants et rejette fermement son offre de dialogue. Comme geste d'apaisement, le camp Gbagbo annonce la levée du couvre feu nocturne.Mais pour Anne Ouloto, porte parole d'Alassane Ouattara, il n'y a pas de dialogue possible.
Avant ce discours, le gouvernement Ouattara dirigé par Guillaume Soro avait montré sa détermination à ne pas céder, en appelant les Ivoiriens à la désobéissance face au gouvernement Gbagbo.
C'est hier mardi 21 décembre 2010 également que Washington a annoncé avoir pris des sanctions contre Laurent Gbagbo et un certain nombre de ses proches, sa famille et des membres de son gouvernement. Une trentaine de personnes sont concernées pour l'instant par ces sanctions qui leur interdisent l'entrée sur le sol américain. La décision américaine fait suite à celle de l'Union européenne qui a décrété une interdiction de visa pour Laurent Gbagbo et dix-huit de ses proches.
Les Etats-Unis ont mis en garde contre une nouvelle batterie de sanctions, pécuniaires celles-là. Des sanctions pourraient être prises également par les Etats membres de la communauté des Etats d'Afrique de l'ouest. La Cédéao va en tous cas tenir un sommet d'urgence vendredi à Abuja pour discuter de la crise ivoirienne. Lors d'une précédente réunion, la Cédéao a déjà suspendu la Côte d'Ivoire de son organisation et appelé Laurent Gbagbo a quitter le pouvoir.

description.hltext_display: Fresh New Look at Age Old Mystery, Dreams, Published by Outskirts Press
description.author: Outskirts Press, Inc
description.content: --(PR.com)-- Outskirts Press, Inc. has published Dreams: An Incomprehensible Aspect of Communication by Evenson Dufour. The author's most recent book to date is a 6 x 9 paperback in the body, mind, spirit and dreams category and is available worldwide on book retailer websites such as Amazon and Barnes & Noble. The webpage at www.outskirtspress.com/dreamsiac was launched simultaneously with the book's publication.Bright, young, and ambitious, Evenson Dufour desperately wants to be a model of a free thinker. If you haven't read Dreams: An Incomprehensible Aspect of Communication yet, you should rush to get this book.- Marc-kendy MichelEvenson Dufour wants you to free yourself of dogmas and of negative attitudes that block you to ask important questions about dreams, a common phenomenon that we all experienced in the past and continue to experience today.- Thaismude M D.Vancol107 pages in length, Dreams: An Incomprehensible Aspect of Communication is being aggressively promoted to appropriate markets with a focus on the body, mind, spirit and dreams category. With U.S. wholesale distribution through Ingram and Baker & Taylor, and pervasive online availability through Amazon, Barnes & Noble and elsewhere, Dreams meets consumer demand through both retail and library markets with a suggested retail price of $17.95.Additionally, Dreams can be ordered by retailers or wholesalers for the maximum trade discount price set by the author in quantities of ten or more from the Outskirts Press Direct bookstore at www.outskirtspress.com/bookstore.ISBN: 9781432761639Format: 6 x 9 paperback creamSRP: $17.95For more information or to contact the author, visit www.outskirtspress.com/dreamsiac.About the author:Evenson Dufour is currently studying political science. In 2008-2009 he was placed on the Dean's List and on the President's Academic Honor List for excellent academic achievement at the end of spring term at Palm Beach State College. He studied social sciences at State University of Haiti. He has a certificate of proficiency in accounting and business mathematics from cole de Commerce Julien Craan, Port-au-Prince, Haiti. He graduated in English as a second language program and the electrician program from Professional Career Development Institute, Georgia Atlanta, U.S.A. He also has had a license in Real Estate since 2005.He is the author of the books: The Words of a New Literature, Compilation Samples of Essays and Paragraphs for College Students and President Obama and His Three Main Conservative Opponents Who's right? Who's wrong?In 2009 he worked as a supplemental instructor at Palm Beach Community College. In 1995 he started his career as a fiscal taxes inspector in the city of Delmas, Haiti. In 1998, he worked as a dean and a teacher for 11th and 12th grades high school in cole Freres Gilot, Carrefour, Haiti. In 2005 one of his poems, Sunshine in the World, was published in the Great Poems of the Western World Anthology Excellence in Poetry series.About Outskirts Press, Inc.Outskirts Press, Inc. offers full-service, custom self-publishing and book marketing services for authors seeking a cost-effective, fast, and flexible way to publish and distribute their books worldwide while retaining all their rights and full creative control. Available for authors globally at www.outskirtspress.com and located on the outskirts of Denver, Colorado, Outskirts Press represents the future of book publishing, today.###Outskirts Press, Inc., 10940 S. Parker Rd - 515, Parker, Colorado 80134http://outskirtspress.com 1-888-OP-BOOKS

description.hltext_display: Nemecko: Letisko vo Frankfurte sa vracia k normálnej prevádzke
description.content:
dnes 09:39 – FRANFURT NAD MOHANOM
Po chaose spôsobenom rozmarmi počasia sa dnes situácia na najväčšom nemeckom letisku vo Frankfurte nad Mohanom mierne zlepšila. Všetky štartovacie a pristávacie dráhy sú v prevádzke, uviedol hovorca prevádzkovateľa letiska, spoločnosti Fraport. Napriek tomu zrušili 60 letov, čo súvisí s pretrvávajúcimi problémami na iných európskych letiskách. Zodpovedné orgány sa pousilujú v priebehu dňa prepraviť do cieľových destinácií popri riadnych pasažieroch aj okolo 3500 cestujúcich, ktorí v dôsledku problémov uviazli vo Frankfurte. Uplynulú noc strávilo na tamojšom letisku v improvizovaných podmienkach približne 600 cestujúcich, veľká väčšina uviaznutých nocovala však v hoteloch vo vzdialenosti až 70 kilometrov od mesta. Predpoveď počasia prevádzkovateľov letiska potešila, aj tak však netušia, či sa vzhľadom na očakávaný nárast cestujúcich v súvislosti s dnešným začiatkom vianočných prázdnin v deviatich spolkových krajinách podarí leteckú dopravu znormalizovať v plnom rozsahu ešte do sviatkov. Snehové zrážky predpovedajú nemeckí meteorológovia na dnešok výlučne pre sever krajiny, v centrálnej časti spolkovej republiky sa môže tvoriť poľadovica po pretrvávajúcom daždi. Mierny fén však avizuje v mnohých oblastiach odmäk.

description.hltext_display: Dnews.de verschenkt zu Weihnachten kostenlose Nachrichten-App für das iPad
description.author: PR-Gateway
description.content:
Die twitterschnelle Nachrichtenseite Dnews.de gibt es nun auch als kostenlose iPad-App. Ab sofort lässt sich die Dnews.de-Anwendung vom App Store herunterladen. Wie auch die Website zeichnet sich die iPad-App durch das typische schlichte und übersichtliche Dnews.de-Layout aus.
Die Startseite der Dnews.de-App ist frei personalisierbar. Hier finden die Leser kompakt aufbereitet alles zum aktuellen Tagesgeschehen. Profitierend von der intuitiven Benutzerführung können die Leser geschmeidig durch die App navigieren. Alle vertrauten Rubriken wie zum Beispiel Wetter und Fernsehen und die beliebten Cartoons von Nicht Lustig und Fokke & Sokke sind in die App integriert. Auch die regionalen Nachrichten aus den unterschiedlichen Bundesländern haben ihren Platz gefunden. Durch die großzügige Verwendung von Fotos, entsteht eine besondere Newserfahrung.
Chefredakteurin Antje Winter: "Unsere schnelle und übersichtliche Präsentation von Nachrichten eignet sich hervorragend für mobile Apps. Auf der iPad-App kommt das Dnews.de-Konzept besonders gut zur Geltung. Wir bieten News auf einen Blick rund um die Uhr, wo auch immer sich der Leser befindet. Dazu gehört auch, dass man Dnews.de über die diversen mobilen Geräte abrufen kann und dafür nicht bezahlen muss. Als echter Onlinetitel ohne Printausgabe lädt unsere App zum Surfen und nicht zum Blättern ein. Das ideale Weihnachtsgeschenk für alle, die noch auf der Suche nach einer ansprechenden kostenlosen Nachrichten-App sind."
Weitere Information
Dnews.de (http://www.dnews.de/) gibt es seit März 2009. Die Seite ist nach dem Erfolgskonzept der größten niederländischen Internetseite NU.nl gestaltet. Dnews.de zählte im November 4,2 Millionen Besuche. Herausgeber von Dnews.de und NU.nl ist Sanoma Digital, der größte niederländische Internetverlag, Teil des Multimediaverlags Sanoma: http://www.sanoma-uitgevers.nl/nl-header-English.php. Dnews.de gibt es auch als iPhone und Android-App.
Dnews.de ist seit März 2009 online. Die noch junge Seite ist nach dem Erfolgskonzept der populären niederländischen Internetseite NU.nl. Herausgeber von Dnews.de und NU.nl ist Sanoma Digital, der größte niederländische Internetverlag, Teil des Multimediaverlags Sanoma.

description.hltext_display: Extremadura registra una temperatura media de 17,4ºC en otoño
description.author: Laura González Andrade
description.content: 2010 ha sido uno de los tres años más cálidos de la historia, desde que comenzaron los registros instrumentales en 1850. La temperatura mundial media del año fue 0,6 ºC, suoerior a la medioa anual del periodo 1961-90. La temperatura mundial media del decenio 2001-10 ha sido 0,5ºC superior a la media anual del periodo 1961-90. En Extremadura, la temperatura máxima media de otoño ha sido 23,9ºC, lo que supone un 0,9ºC por debajo de la media histórica, que es de 24,8 ºC.

description.hltext_display: Víctor Díaz no olvida que las Aguilas lo botaron
description.content:
Motivación. Dejar en el camino a las Aguilas, es una panacea para Fermín y Díaz
Escrito por: HANSEL D. MATTHEWS (h.matthews@hoy.com.do)
Félix Fermín y Víctor Díaz, dos ex aguiluchos de pura cepa, ahora luchan para dejar en el camino a las Aguilas Cibaeñas o cualquier otro conjunto que se meta en su camino.
“Nuestro rol es ganar, independientemente de quien se quede”, explicó el dirigente de los Gigantes del Cibaeo, Félix Fermín.
Sin embargo, el jardinero y primera base Víctor Díaz fue más categórico, al señalar que dejar fuera de la clasificación a las Aguilas tiene un gran “sabor”.
“Tiene un gran sabor para mí, que pasemos (Gigantes) y las Aguilas se queden”, manifestó Díaz, mientras completada su ronda de bateo, previo al encuentro de ayer contra los Tigres.
Gran labor. El refuerzo Justin Turner no se duerme con el bate, situación que lo mantiene en la alineación.
Turner batea para .307, gracias a 23 inatrapables en 75 oportunidades.
El dirigente Ken Oberfeld ha tenido que mantenerlo en la tercera base, pese a que cuenta con Diory Hernández, Wilkin Castillo y Fernando Tatis, que pueden jugar la antesala.
Justin, que pertenece a los Mets de Nueva York, irá a los campos de entrenamientos a buscar la posición de intermedista, el cual es su posición original.
Por pertenecer a los Mets, igual que el dirigente Oberfeld, se espera que continúe con los Leones hasta que sea necesario, a menos que el jugador no tenga interés.
Motivación. El antesalista Edwin Encarnación manifestó ayer que los jugadores de las Aguilas están motivados, con miras a la clasificación.
“Los muchachos están motivados y sabemos ganar los partidos claves, por lo que hay que contar con nosotros”, dijo Encarnación, quien firmó recientemente con Toronto.
La organización de las mayores le sugirió que practicará en la primera base, además de la tercera para que tenga más chances en la próxima temporada.
“Jugaré donde me necesiten, sea en la tercera o primera, el fin es estar en el terreno de juego”, explicó el jugador de 27 años, oriundo de La Romana.
Bono. De llegar en primer lugar en el torneo, las Estrellas ganarían un millón de pesos.
A pesar de eso, Michael Martínez, Pablo Ozuna y Eugenio Vélez no estuvieron anoche en la alineación.
Parece que el premio no tenía ningún interés para el club oriental, que con un triunfo ayer se llevaban ese dinerito.
Cero sorteo. El versátil y veloz Emilio Bonifacio se niega a participar en el sorteo de nativos, modalidad que se inicia esta temporada.
“Bonifacio no asistirá”, señaló Francisco Busto, subgerente del Licey, previo al encuentro contra los Gigantes.
Y qué más. El dirigente Dean Treanor tiene tres campañas con los Toros, y en igual número de ocasiones ha clasificado.
Sin embargo, nunca ha podido llegar hasta la final del evento.

description.hltext_display: UK & World News: Man and boy killed in house blaze
description.content:
A man and a young boy have died after a house fire caused by a chip pan left unattended on a cooker, emergency services said.
West Midlands Ambulance Service said both victims were confirmed dead shortly after their arrival at hospital following the blaze in the Lower Stoke area of Coventry.
An ambulance service spokesman said three ambulances and a paramedic officer were sent to the property in Hollis Road after several 999 calls.

description.hltext_display: South Korea Christmas tree lit, guarded against possible attack from North Korea (Photo)
description.author: Angel Cuala
description.content:
After seven years, South Korea lit up again a giant Christmas tree on top of a hill near the border of North Korea on Tuesday, but is currently being guarded against possible attack by North Korea .
As described at Yonhap News in Korea , the 30-meter (100 feet) giant Christmas tree was formed at the Aegibong peak steel tower with about 100,000 colorful light bulbs, and can be seen from North Korea since it was near the border of the two nations.
According to the report, the lighting ceremony was organized by a Christian group from Yoido Full Gospel Church in Seoul and was attended by around 400 people, while church choir sang Gospel songs as shown here in the photo.
The tradition of Christmas tree lighting in South Korea was last done in 2003 after a reconciliation agreement with North Korea to end border propaganda activity, which means the recent lighting is being noted to start another tension.
Nevertheless, South Korea Defense Minister Kim Kwan apparently ensured local lawmakers that the Christmas tree tower will be strictly guarded against possible attack from North Korea .
“Marines are maintaining a readiness to respond at any time in case of enemy provocations and ensure the safety of those attending the lighting ceremony.” Kim revealed during a National Assembly defense committee on Tuesday.
“We’ll retaliate decisively to take out the source of any shelling,” the Defense minister added.

description.hltext_display: Timberman becomes first 3-time Chase Hawks champ
description.content:
PAUL RUHTER/Gazette Staff Cody Buller of Glendive gets thrown from Full Force during the Chase Hawks Memorial Rodeo inside the Expo Center at MetraPark on Saturday.
Related Galleries
(9) Photos
Chase Hawks Memorial Rodeo
at MetraPark Expo Center
Bareback -- Kelly Timberman, 84.5, $4,640; Kaycee Feild, 83.5, 3,520; Kyle Bowers, 82.5, 2,560; Chris Timberman, 82, 1,600; Matt Lait, 79.5, 1,280; Joe Gunderson, 79, 960; Reid Rowan, 78, 720; Jared Smith, 78, 720. Others: Josi Young, 77.5; Tim Shirley, 77.5; Caleb Bennett, 77; Chase Erickson, 77; Scott Montague, 76.5; Micky Downare, 75.5; Brian Bain, 75.5; Cody DeMers, 75; Troy Solomon, 70.5; Jessy Davis, 70.5; Justin Miller, 70; Ty Breuer, 66.
Saddle bronc -- Cody Wright, 86, $4,640; Jesse Bail, 84.5, 3,040; J.J. Elshere, 84.5, 3,040; Dustin Flundra, 84, 1,600; Isaac Diaz, 83.5, 1,280; Tyrell Smith, 83, 960; Alex Wright, 82.5, 800; Rusty Allen, 80.5, 640. Others: Jeff Willert, 78.5; Cody Martin, 78; Josh Reynolds, 78; Scott Miller, 75; Todd Herzog, 69.5; Jesse Kruse, 69. No score: Shane Moran, Jake Costello, Sam Kelts, Cort Scheer, Jim Berry, Dusty Hausauser.
Bull riding -- Will Farrell, 87, 4,640; Tanner Girletz, 83, 3,520; Tyler Willis, 82.5, 2,560; Seth Glause, 80.5, 1,600; Scott Schiffner, 78, 1,280; Sonny Murphy, 71, 960. No score: Kyle Joslin, Ty Tescher, Jason Finkbeiner, Steven Turner, Tyler Thompson, Cody Hancock, Cody Buller, Marcus Michaelis, Zack Elliott, Chris Roundy, Jason McClain, Dave Samsel, James Warfield, Jesse Torkelson.
Team (top 4) -- Electrical Consultants, Inc., 246.5 (Downare, Flundra, Farrell); Star Service, 232 (Davis, Diaz, Schiffner); Cinch Jeans, 221.5 (Miller, Kruse, Willis); Old Chicago, 165.5 (Lait, C. Wright, Joslin).
Kelly Timberman had to work a little harder than most for his money, but he didn't mind if it means that history will repeat itself.
Timberman, of Mills, Wyo., became the first three-time champion of the Chase Hawks Memorial Roughstock Rodeo, winning the bareback title at the MetraPark Expo Center Saturday night. He also became the first competitor to win an event two years in a row.
"Every time I've won here, I've gone on to have my best season,'' said Timberman.
Timberman won the Chase Hawks in 2003 and less than 12 months later, won the 2004 world bareback title. After winning the event again in Billings last year, he finished third in the 2010 world bareback standings. Timberman won $100,505 at this year's NFR.
"This means a lot,'' Timberman said of his third Chase Hawks victory. "It's a great benefit rodeo and I really believe in the cause."
Timberman was one of two world champions to win at the invitation-only event. Cody Wright, who won his second PRCA world saddle bronc title a week ago, won his second Chase Hawks championship. Wright, of Milford, Utah, also won in 2007.
Will Farrell, of Thermopolis, Wyo., won the bull riding.
Timberman had to ride not one, not two, but three horses to earn a third Chase Hawks buckle.
And the third horse, Thunder Monkey of Sankey Rodeo, made him work for every one of his 86 points.
"He was good. He's an electric horse,'' said Timberman of Thunder Monkey, which was at the NFR in Las Vegas last week. "I really had to hustle. I wanted this horse at the Finals. He's as good as he looks, trust me."
And three bareback rides didn't faze the Wyoming cowboy.
"Not too much,'' Timberman said. "We practice like this (at Casper College) all the time ... we get on four, five horses in the practice pen. It's not that much tougher, it just makes you sweat a little more. What makes it fun is my brother was also in the money."
Timberman pocketed $4,640 for the win. Kaycee Feild, the 2008 Chase Hawks winner, was second with an 83.5-point ride for $3,520. Kyle Bowers was third, while Chris Timberman placed fourth.
Farrell is hoping for the same magic in 2011 as Timberman.
The former NFR qualifier was a stellar 87 points aboard Pocket Aces. The bull, owned by the Brookman Rodeo Company of Wolf Point, was only ridden once during the regular season in 2010, for 91 points in Red Lodge.
"I saw him in Red Lodge and was glad I drew him,'' Farrell said. "I've been coming here since 2003 but haven't done that well. I've placed a few times, but nothing big."
Farrell plans to parlay his $4,640 money won into rodeos for 2011.
"I plan to go hard next year,'' he said. "It's a good paycheck and this rodeo is for a good cause. I think this is a good confidence boost. You have the best guys on some of the best stock and that cash will help for those winter rodeos.
"It's all positive when you can win at the end of the year."
Former Canadian champion Tanner Girletz was second with 83 points, while Tyler Willis was third with 82.5 points. Willis, of Wheatland, Wyo., was the 2009 PRCA rookie of the year for bull riding.
A week after winning a PRCA-record $148,287 at the NFR, Wright continued his winning ways.
Wright was 86 points - a half-point shy of the event record - on Majestic Rocket owned by the Calgary Stampede. Wright was the first saddle bronc rider out Saturday night. Jesse Bail and J.J. Elshere tied for second with 84.5 points rides.
The event, which features 20 competitors in bareback, saddle bronc and bull riding, drew cowboys from 11 different states and Canada.

description.hltext_display: Waco woman killed in house fire, despite neighbors' attempts to help
description.content:
Waco fire and police officials are investigating a Tuesday morning blaze that claimed the life of a 48-year-old woman and sent neighbors running to help after hearing what they described as an explosion.
Officials identified Kim Johnson, a resident of the home in the 1300 block of North 34th Street, as the woman killed in the fire. Her body has been sent to Dallas for autopsy.
Fire authorities declined to comment on reports that an explosion preceded the fire that overtook the one-story, ranch-style home, but neighbors and other witnesses said they heard a loud “boom” immediately before seeing the flames and smoke emerging from the rooftop.
It was loud enough to wake one woman who was asleep on her couch, while another resident described it sounding “like a plane crash.”
Waco fire and police department personnel work the scene of a fire Tuesday morning on 34th Street.
Rod Aydelotte / Tribune-Herald
The blast drew neighbors outside and then running toward the flames and smoke at the home, they said.
One neighbor, 26-year-old Freddie Caufield, said he, along with several other men, went straight for the door to check on Johnson, who he said used an oxygen tank. The men were able to kick in the door but were met with flames, he said.
“Three or four other guys around here tried to see if she was in there,” Caufield said. “But the smoke was rushing out. We tried to get in there by getting low, but it wasn’t happening. . . . It’s sad to see.”
Sixteen-year-old Chris Davis, 15-year-old Dakota Davis and 15-year-old Harley Allen were at a coin laundromat around the corner when they heard the a blast. They, too, came running when they saw smoke, and Chris Davis called 9-1-1.
The boys were able to free a dog that fled from the house, the teen said, but had to retreat because of the heavy smoke.
Six Waco Fire Department units responded to a call reporting the blaze about 10:16 a.m., Waco Fire Department Training Chief Gary Davis said.
On arrival, officials found the house completely engulfed in flames.
Firefighters managed to get into the house through the back, but they had to be pulled out when the roof started to collapse, Davis said.
The fire was under control by 10:40 a.m., although the area remained choked with thick smoke billowing from the rooftop and rolling down through the streets, where dozens of neighbors watched and waited to see if Johnson survived.
Many didn’t know the woman well, or even her name, but remembered seeing her around the neighborhood. They also remembered her three dogs.
Neighbors watch as police and firefighters work the blaze Tuesday morning.
Duane A. Laverty / Tribune-Herald
By 11:30 a.m. Tuesday, officials began wrapping yellow crime scene unit around the perimeter of the yard as the firefighters gathered their gear, loading their trucks. A few neighbors appeared to brush away tears.
About half the roof of the 1,600-square-foot home was gone.
Members of Johnson’s family who arrived on the scene did not want to comment, said a crime victims services representative.
Late Tuesday, officials said the cause and the origin of the fire had not been determined.
kcrow@wacotrib.com
757-5748
MORE IN WACO NEWS »

description.hltext_display: ACS bekommt kaum Hochtief-Aktien angedient
description.author: feed_ddp
description.content:
Madrid (dapd). Dem spanischen Baukonzern ACS sind vor dem Hintergrund des freiwilligen Übernahmeagebots für Hochtief bis zum 21. Dezember lediglich weitere 5.825 Aktien angedient worden. Damit liege der Anteil des spanischen Baukonzerns nun bei 27,26 Prozent am deutschen Konkurrenten, teilte Actividades de Construcción y Servicios (ACS) am Mittwoch mit.
ACS hatte vergangene Woche das Angebot überraschend erhöht und bietet nun neun statt acht eigene Aktien für fünf Hochtief-Papiere. Vorstand und Aufsichtsrat von Hochtief haben die Offerte unter anderem als finanziell unzureichend zurückgewiesen.
Von der angestrebten Schwelle von mehr als 30 Prozent ist ACS damit weiterhin noch ein Stück entfernt. Jedoch hat Hochtief-Großaktionär Southeastern Asset Management nach der Nachbesserung durch ACS angekündigt, im Kundenauftrag für zwei Millionen Hochtief-Aktien das Angebot annehmen zu wollen.
dapd

description.hltext_display: ՊԱՏԵՐԱԶՄԻ ԴԵՊՔՈՒՄ ԱԴՐԲԵՋԱՆԸ ԵՒ ԹՈՒՐՔԻԱՆ ԿՕԳՆԵՆ ՄԻՄՅԱՆՑ
description.content:
Ադրբեջանական խորհրդարանը ձայների 93 կողմ, 1 դեմ հարաբերակցությամբ երեքշաբթի երեկոյան վավերացրեց Թուրքիայի եւ Ադրբեջանի միջեւ ամռանը կնքված Ռազմավարական գործընկերության եւ փոխօգնության մասին պայմանագիրը: Ադրբեջանի եւ Թուրքիայի նախագահները այս համաձայնագրի տակ իրենց ստորագրությունները դրեցին Բաքվում` օգոստոսի 16-ին: Մոտ չորս ամիս, սակայն, երկկողմ այս համաձայնագրի դրույթները գաղտնի էին պահվում: Պայմանագրի որոշ կետերի մասին առաջին կցկտուր տեղեկություններն ի հայտ եկան անցած շաբաթ, երեքշաբթի օրը արդեն 5 գլխից եւ 23 հոդվածից կազմված այս փաստաթղթի տեքստը գաղտնազերծվեց ամբողջությամբ:
Ներկայացված տեքստին անգամ հպանցիկ ծանոթությունից պարզ է դառնում, որ փաստաթղթի հիմնական նպատակը հայ - ռուսական ռազմական համագործակցության մասին Երեւանում այս տարվա օգոստոսին կնքված պայմանագրի հավասարակշռումն է:
Այսպես, Իլհամ Ալիեւի եւ Աբդուլա Գյուլի ստորագրած պայմանագրի երկրորդ կետում ասված է. - Եթե պայմանագիրը ստորագրած կողմերից մեկը զինված հարձակման կամ ագրեսիայի ենթարկվի այլ պետության կամ պետությունների խմբի կողմից, ապա մյուսը պարտավորվում է փոխադարձ օգնություն տրամադրել` առկա բոլոր հնարավորությունների կիրառմամբ: Թուրք - ադրբեջանական պայմանագրի եւս մի կետի համաձայն` կողմերը սերտացնելու են գործակցությունը ռազմական եւ ռազմարդյունաբերական ոլորտներում:
Բացի այդ, պայմանագրում նշված է. - Ստորագրող կողմերը պարտավորվում են թույլ չտալ, որպեսզի իրենց տարածքը օգտագործվի մյուս կողմի դեմ ագրեսիվ կամ բռնի գործողությունների իրականացման նպատակով: Պաշտոնական Բաքուն ու Անկարան նաեւ պարտավորվում են համակարգել երկու պետությունների զինված ուժերի գործողությունները: Համաձայնագրում այս առթիվ նշված է. - Պաշտպանական եւ փոխադարձ օգնության ծրագրի շրջանակներում նախատեսված համատեղ ռազմական գործողությունների իրականացման նպատակով կողմերը կարդիականացնեն ռազմական ենթակառույցները, համատեղ զորավարժություններ կանցկացնեն, ինչպես նաեւ քայլեր կձեռնարկեն երկու պետությունների Զինված ուժերի համակողմանի մարտական պատրաստությունն ապահովելու նպատակով:

description.hltext_display: Sénégal: Arrivée du président Wade au stade Demba Diop
description.content:
Dakar Le président de la République, Abdoulaye Wade, est arrivé à 22 h 15 au stade Demba Diop, où il doit présider le gala de lutte organisé dans le cadre du 3-ème Festival mondial des arts nègres à Dakar.
Sont aussi annoncés à la manifestation ses homologues du Nigéria, du Togo et du Tchad.
Le gala se déroule en présence du Premier ministre, Souleymane Ndéné Ndiaye, du ministre des Sports, Faustin Diatta, et de celui de la Culture, Mamadou Bousso Lèye. Il y a aussi le ministre Serigne Mbacké Ndiaye, porte-parole du président sénégalais.
Le maire de Dakar, Khalifa Ababacar Sall, a aussi fait le déplacement pour assister à l'évènement qui est marqué par la prestation du lead vocal du Super Etoile, Youssou Ndour, et de l'Ensemble lyrique traditionnel du Sénégal.
Le programme prévoit également un tournoi de lutte libre qui mettra aux prises 40 lutteurs dans un système d'élimination directe.
Il sera suivi d'un autre tournoi de lutte avec frappe dont le sommet sera le combat qui opposera Santang Gning à Coly Faye.
Les premiers résultats ont consacré les victoires de Malal Ndiaye et de Yawwu Dial sur leur vis-à-vis.

description.hltext_display: UE: AL VIA L'ISTITUZIONE DI SERVIZI PUBBLICI ONLINE CHE PERMETTANO RISPARMI AD IMPRESE E CITTADINI
description.content:
p { margin-bottom: 0.21cm; }a:link { } L'evoluzione di internet e la diffusione dei mezzi di accesso alla rete a cittadini e imprese, offre alle amministrazioni pubbliche una possibilità in più di migliorare i propri servizi e i livelli di efficienza, risparmiando sui costi. E' importante che però le amministrazioni pubbliche sappiano usufruire di queste opportunità tecnologiche, restando al passo con i tempi, visto anche che la diffusione dei social network ha elevato le pretese dei consumatori nella fruizione dei servizi online. Per questa ragione la Commissione Europea ha lanciato un piano quinquennale per promuovere i servizi pubblici online, aiutare i cittadini e le imprese a risparmiare tempo e denaro, accrescendo al tempo stesso la competitività dell'Unione Europea. Il piano denominato eGovernment mira ad accrescere il numero di operazioni amministrative e burocratiche eseguibili online, visto che attualmente non tutte le amministrazioni pubbliche sfruttano al meglio le...
Inserito da giobluff il giorno 22/12/2010 alle 9.50 - Voti: 1 - Commenti: 0

description.hltext_display: Valdez tuvo problemas para olvidar caro error
description.content:
Costoso. Error abrió las puertas para que Leones ganaran el cetro
Escrito por: HANSEL D. MATTHEWS (h.matthews@hoy.com.do)
El torpedero Wilson Valdez reconoció anoche que le fue difícil olvidar el error que cometió en la serie final de la temporada pasada, el cual le abrió la brecha al Escogido para que se coronara campeón.
“Al principio, me costó bastante, pero con el tiempo lo fui olvidando”, explicó Valdez, previo al encuentro contra los Tigres del Licey.
El torpedero de 32 años, nativo de Nizao, aclaró que los errores son parte del juego, además de reconocer que es un excelente jugador en el campo corto.
La pifia de Valdez ocurrió en un rodado de rutina que, de atraparla, le brindaba a los Gigantes del Cibao su primer título de campeones en el torneo otoño-invernal. “Son cosas que pasan en el béisbol”, aseguró.

description.hltext_display: Timed event cowboy dies in car crash
description.content:
Alfred J. (A.J.) Franzen, a PRCA timed-event competitor for seven seasons who won the Wyoming State Fair & Rodeo steer wrestling title in 2008, died Dec. 18 in a car accident near his Carpenter, Wyo., home. He was 26.
A memorial service is scheduled at 10 a.m. Wednesday at the Archer Complex in Laramie, Wyo., with the funeral service to be held at 1 p.m. Dec. 23 at the Event Center at Richland County Fairgrounds in Sidney, Mont. Interment will be in the Sidney Cemetery.
Franzen rose through the junior ranks to compete at Dawson Community College and at the University of Wyoming -- where he won the Central Rocky Mountain Region steer wrestling championship -- before turning pro in April 2004, just after his 20th birthday.
He competed primarily in the Mountain States Circuit of the PRCA while working full time for Laramie County as a foreman in the public works department. Apart from the win at the Wyoming State Fair in Douglas, he shared a title at the Steamboat Springs (Colo.) rodeo in that 2008 season and had $18,951 in career earnings.
He frequently competed in team roping events with his brother Tim, including an annual pilgrimage to Cheyenne (Wyo.) Frontier Days.
Franzen was part of a large extended family with deep roots in rodeo, including his uncle Hank who operates the Powder River Rodeo stock contracting firm, cousin Jalea, who is a PRCA rodeo secretary and timer; and cousins John and Beau Franzen, who are both accomplished bulldoggers. Beau qualified for the Wrangler National Finals Rodeo in 2005 and 2008.
Franzen, along with brother Tim and cousins John and Beau competed at the Oct. 14 performance of the NILE PRCA Rodeo in Billings.
A.J. Franzen was born March 24, 1984 to Al and Lois Franzen of Sidney, Mont., and was raised on the family ranch, where he and Tim learned their love of horses, roping and rodeo.
He is survived by his wife, Barbara; son, Jace and an unborn child (due in May), of Carpenter, Wyo.; parents, Al and Lois Franzen, Sidney, Mont.; brother, Tim, Dickinson, N.D.; grandmothers Shirley Short, Durango, Colo., and Patricia Franzen, Billings; and many other family and friends.

description.hltext_display: Soldados se retiram das ruas de Bancoc após fim do estado de exceção
description.content: O Exército da Tailândia retirou nesta quarta-feira os postos de segurança e as patrulhas de soldados das ruas de Bangcoc após a decisão do governo de suspender o estado exceção e substituir essa medida por outra mais amena. O estado de exceção --que permite ao governo levar o Exército às ruas e proibir as assembleias públicas-- havia sido decretado em resposta aos protestos urbanos de manifestantes antigovernamentais, que ficaram conhecidos como "camisas vermelhas", seguidores do grupo Frente Unida para a Democracia e contra a Ditadura. O sinal mais visível da derrogação da medida foi a ausência de soldados armados nas estações do metrô elevado em Bancoc. Leia mais (22/12/2010 - 06h35)

description.hltext_display: Кин возглавит Блэкберн
description.content:
Исполняющий обязанности главного тренера английского Блэкберна Стив Кин будет назначен новым главным тренером клуба, сообщает Sky Sports.
Кин станет главным тренером Блэкберна / АР
Кин возглавлял команду после отставки Эллардайса. Экс-тренер Фулхэма, Реала Сосьедад и Ковентри вылетел в Индию для переговоров с владельцами клуба.
Если обсуждение пройдет нормально, то на 99% можно считать Кина новым наставником Блэкберна.
Ранее сообщалось, что главный тренер Блекберна Сэм Эллардайс уволен со своего поста.

description.hltext_display: El Observatorio extremeño de la Igualdad y Empleabilidad destaca la escasa presencia de mujeres jóvenes en las zonas rurales
description.author: Alicia Mendo
description.content: No se ha cumplido aún el año desde la creación del Observatorio extremeño de la Igualdad y Empleabilidad, pero el proyecto, al finalizar 2010, concluye y presenta algunos de los datos más representativos. Datos como por ejemplo, la escasa presencia de mujeres jóvenes en las zonas rurales de la región. Así lo ha destacado la coordinadora del observatorio, Ana Moreno, que ha presentado el resumen de estos meses en los que el observatorio se ha puesto en funcionamiento.

description.hltext_display: At The Movies: True Grit
description.content:
Gary M. Kramer is a Philadelphia-based film critic who thinks Sandra Bullock mambos. He likes eating ethnic food and watching ethnic movies—though not necessarily both at the same time or from the same country.
PICK OF THE WEEK
True Grit
Significantly better than the last remake by the Coen Brothers—that would be the 2004 misfire, The Ladykillers—this gorgeous, burnished western, (exquisitely shot by cinematographer Roger Deakins) is full of wondrous moments and memorable characters. Tough and unsentimental, like its heroine Mattie Ross (Hailee Steinfeld), this True Grit is also lean and economical, with a razor sharp screenplay that still contains moments of wit and western myth. Mattie is a headstrong 14 year-old girl who hires the grizzled Rooster Cogburn (Jeff Bridges in all his “Dude”-like grizzled-ness) to avenge her father’s senseless death by Tom Chaney (Josh Brolin). She believes Rooster has true grit, and can be of greater help to her than LaBouef (Matt Damon) the Texas Ranger also after Chaney. As the pursuit commences, the film is consistently absorbingas the characters develops during odd encounters, and show their mettle in scenes of violence. One of the film’s highlights has the one-eyed, drunken Cogburn trying to prove he’s a better shot than LaBouef. One of the strangest sequences has Mattie and Rooster meeting a bear riding a horse. There are also tense scenes, such as a shootout that leaves one character with a hole through his chest. Steinfeld deftly handles the Coen’s fast-talking 1870s period dialogue, and a scene where she negotiates for money owed is fantastic. Likewise, her efforts to hire Cogburn, a man who has more interest in liquor than helping Mattie out, is charming. Thankfully, Bridges saddles up to the John Wayne role comfortably, never overplaying his Rooster, or turning this character into a caricature. Before its final coda, True Grit culminates in a scene that has a real fabulist quality, and it is one that perfectly and effectively captures the true grit of the characters. Opens December 22
ALSO OPENING
Gulliver’s Travels
Jack Black gets captured by Lilliputians in this 3-D update of the classic Jonathan Swift tale. Opens December 25
Little Fockers
Robert DeNiro and Ben Stiller are back, this time with children, in the third installment of this comedy juggernaut. Opens December 22
Made in Dagenham
Sally Hawkins (Happy Go Lucky) stars in this inspirational true story about British women at a car factory striking for fair treatment. Opens December 25
Rabbit Hole
Nicole Kidman and Aaron Eckhart play parents grieving over the death of their son in John Cameron Mitchell’s screen version of David Lindsay-Abaire’s award-winning play. Opens December 25
Rare Exports: A Christmas Tale
A bizarre Finnish holiday horror film, Rare Exports is not quite suitable for children—it’s subtitled, and features both gore and copious male nudity—but it’s also not especially scary for adults. Pietari (Onni Tommila) is the only kid in the village who seems to understand that an evil Santa Claus has been unearthed, and is going to ruin Christmas. He tries to convince his father and others who are mystified that all the reindeer have been slaughtered, and all the children and radiators have been stolen. Pieter soon puts a plan into action to save Christmas from the old, hairy, naked elves that are wrecking havoc. Then Rare Exports becomes a holiday heartwarmer. Really. If this slight, one-joke/one-scare film isn’t quite as lousy as a stocking full of coal, it should have been more fun—nastier, and with a dark sense of humor. It’sBad Santa of an entirely different kind. Opens December 22

description.hltext_display: Season to Give: Martha O'Bryan Center adds flood aid to its services
description.content:
SEASON TO GIVE | Part of a continuing series
Dianne Clayton had come to the realization that whatever FEMA money she would be eligible for to help rebuild her flood-damaged home wouldn't be nearly enough. "A total roller coaster,'' is how Clayton remembers the months after the flood, trying to get her Inglewood home restored. "I was at my wit's end because I knew I couldn't afford what needed to be done at my house.''
That predicament is similar to many impacted by the flood who were without, or did not have enough, flood insurance.
But one of the many phone calls Clayton made in the months after the flood got her to the Martha O'Bryan Center an East Nashville-based integrated human services nonprofit that serves more than 4,000 clients each year through early learning education, kindergarten through college youth development, WorkReady job placement and as a family resource center. The O'Bryan Center operates a new Assistance and Outreach to Flood Survivors program that networks volunteer help and other resources to assist flood victims in Davidson County.Related 'Now I have hope'Clayton, forced to rent since the flood, called the center and spoke with case manager Miranda Masters in October. She had an appointment the following week and initial work began quickly thereafter through the flood survivors program.
Church organizations with active volunteer disaster relief teams who work on homes and other nonprofits that do home reconstruction, such as Rebuilding Together, are the kind of partners the O'Bryan Center program affiliates with. The volunteer organization, Westminster Presbyterian Disaster Assistance, has worked on Clayton's home.
More extensive rebuilding projects such as Clayton's are done when proper help and resources are available, Masters said.
But the program also directs flood victims to other forms of help such as replacing furniture, clothing, food and other needs. The Community Resource Center has been a source for furniture and mattresses, Masters said.
"What's interesting is that for the first time people who have never had to ask for help are doing it,'' Masters said. "We have homeowners who are hungry now.'' (2 of 2)Clayton hopes to be back in her home any day. "Now I have hope; I had all but given up hope,'' Clayton said, adding project teams have addressed extras such as increased efficiency to keep hot and cold air inside her home and plans later for a group to add dirt on the property to help with future water runoff.
Renters need help, too
Masters estimates she's worked with about 70 flood survivors through the program. To be eligible for the O'Bryan Center program, a person must reside in Davidson County and be impacted by the flood.
Renters make up about half the clients Masters has worked with, often an overlooked demographic impacted by the flood.Related "Renters often are living paycheck to paycheck anyway, and with the flood, many had to find a place quickly and ended up in a place they couldn't afford,'' Masters said. "Many have gotten behind on rent and utilities. They often don't have money to replace items like furniture.''
LaTonya Rucker, 35, rented a West Nashville home that the flood forced her out of and found herself scrambling to find shelter for herself and five children three of her own and two she cares for.
First, Rucker went back and forth at a hotel and a sister's home before she got in an apartment she couldn't afford. Rucker had applied for Section 8 housing assistance, and after that was referred to Masters by another agency. Rucker's household receives disability benefits.
Program uses grants
Masters was able to expedite the process for Rucker to qualify for Section 8 housing because she was a flood victim. Now Rucker lives in an apartment complex in Madison.
"I was doing it on my own and I didn't know how I was going to do it,'' Rucker said. "I didn't get information everyone else got. When you have someone talk for you, it moves faster. Now she's helping me find furniture and clothes for kids and Christmas (gifts).''
A grant through the Frist Foundation, and a smaller one from the Community Foundation, allowed the O'Bryan Center to start its flood relief program. It was launched in July, with Masters added to the staff in August.
Masters believes the needs should allow the program to continue for at least two more years.
"It's a natural outgrowth of what we do,'' O'Bryan Center Chief Executive Officer Marsha Edwards said. "We're helping people navigate the very complex terrain of rebuilding their lives both physically and emotionally.''

event_or_fact.property: I was doing it on my own and I didn't know how I was going to do it; I didn't get information everyone else got. When you have someone talk for you, it moves faster. Now she's helping me find furniture and clothes for kids and Christmas (gifts).
It's a natural outgrowth of what we do

description.hltext_display: ԴԵԿՏԵՄԲԵՐԻ 22-Ի ՄԱՄՈՒԼ
description.content: Անդրադառնալով Լեզվի մասին օրենքի շուրջ խորհրդարանական քննարկումներին` դաշնակցական պատգամավոր Արտաշես Շահբազյանը Հայոց աշխարհ-ին ասել է. - Օրինագիծը մեր մտահոգությունն է առաջացնում, քանի որ սողանցքեր է բացում: Միշտ էլ կարող է որեւէ գերտերության ներկայացուցիչ առաջարկել, որ այս սողանցքը մեծացվի ու իրենք էլ մեր երկրում այլընտրանքային դպրոցներ ունենան: Փոխարենը, մենք առաջարկում ենք քննարկել մեր հանրակրթական դպրոցում հայոց լեզվի դասավանդման, ուսուցման խնդիրը: Իմ երեխաները տարրական դասարաններում են սովորում ու առարկայորեն գիտեմ, որ դասագրքերը լցված են աղբով: Ժամանակ-ը գրում է. - Գազպրոմ-ի Մերձավոր արտերկրների հետ աշխատանքի վարչության պետ ու ՀայՌուսգազարդ-ի վարչության նախագահի տեղակալ Անատոլի Պոդմիշալսկին երեկ Երեւանում հայտարարել է, որ 2011 թվականի ապրիլի 1-ից Հայաստանը պետք է անցնի Ռուսաստանից գազի գնման շուկայական գնի: Այսօր Սանկտ Պետերբուրգ է մեկնում վարչապետ Տիգրան Սարգսյանը, ով այնտեղ հանդիպելու է ՌԴ վարչապետ Վլադիմիր Պուտինին: Մի քանի օր առաջ էլ Սարգսյանը Պուտինի հետ հեռախոսազրույց էր ունեցել: Կասկած չկա, որ Սարգսյան - Պուտին հանդիպման օրակարգում կլինի գազի խնդիրը: Իսկ պրակտիկան ցույց է տալիս, որ այն լուծելու, այսինքն` Ռուսաստանից հնարավորինս էժան գին ստանալու համար Հայաստանը պարբերաբար գնում է ինչ-որ զիջումների` կամ տնտեսության, կամ քաղաքականության բնագավառում: Բայց լուծումը, այդ ամենով հանդերձ, լինում է ժամանակավոր, քանի որ Ռուսաստանը ամեն տարի սահմանում է գազի նոր գին, եւ Հայաստանը ստիպված է լինում մտածել նոր զիջումների մասին:

description.hltext_display: 興毅ビックリ!?ムニョス前職は役場勤め
description.content:
亀田興のポスターを背に練習を行うムニョス（撮影・松本俊） [ 拡大 ]
-PR-
亀田興毅（２４＝亀田）の３階級制覇に立ちはだかる元世界王者は今年は役所勤めもしていた。興毅とのＷＢＡ世界バンタム級王座決定戦（２６日、さいたまスーパーアリーナ）に臨む同級５位アレクサンデル・ムニョス（３１＝ベネズエラ）が２１日、都内で練習を公開した。２月に引退していたとの話があるが、ムニョスは「試合のチャンスがなかっただけ」と説明。練習を続けながらベネズエラの地方役所職員としてスポーツコーディネーターを３カ月務めていたと明かした。その後、１０月の復帰戦で勝利。１０日に次戦予定だったところに世界戦が回ってきた。
ブランクはあっても、元世界王者だけに早くも“王者の風格”を漂わせた。公開練習には開始予定の３０分後に到着し、約２時間、納得いくまで練習した。マイペースを貫くムニョスは「約束します。彼は僕には勝てません」と言い切った。

description.hltext_display: Ungersk mediekontroll fördöms
description.author: Tidningarnas Telegrambyr
description.content: Sedan det ungerska parlamentet natten till tisdagen ändrade författningen och införde en lag om statlig kontroll av press, radio, tv och internet möter den ungerska regeringen, som nästa vecka övertar EU-ordförandeskapet, mycket hård kritik från utlandet. Luxemburgs utrikesminister kräver att EU-kommissionen omedelbart agerar mot planerna och han ifrågasätter om Ungern är värdigt att leda EU.

description.hltext_display: DGAP-Adhoc: Softing AG: Neuer Großauftrag von Premium-Automobilkonzern
description.author: feed_dgap_corporate
description.content:
Softing AG / Schlagwort(e): Umsatzentwicklung/Prognose
22.12.2010 09:47
Veröffentlichung einer Ad-hoc-Mitteilung nach § 15 WpHG, übermittelt durch die DGAP – ein Unternehmen der EquityStory AG. Für den Inhalt der Mitteilung ist der Emittent verantwortlich.
————————————————————————— Die Softing Automotive Electronics GmbH, eine 100%-Tochter der Softing AG, hat zusätzlich zu den bereits ad hoc gemeldeten Neugeschäften einen weiteren Großauftrag eines namhaften deutschen Pkw-Herstellers erhalten. Damit ist Softing innerhalb kurzer Zeit der Zugang zu einem weiteren Hersteller der Premium-Klasse gelungen. Der langfristige Auftrag zur Weiterentwicklung und Lieferung von Diagnose- und Messtechnik wird sich ab dem Geschäftsjahr 2011 in den Umsatz- und Gewinnzahlen des Softing-Konzerns niederschlagen. Das hieraus resultierende Auftragsvolumen wird in den nächsten Jahren durch Projektleistungen und Produktlieferungen einige Mio. EUR betragen.
Über Softing: Softing ist eine weltweit agierende Management Holding. Die Gesellschaften erstellen und vertreiben Hard- und Software für die Industrielle Automatisierung sowie für die Fahrzeugelektronik. In enger Kundenbeziehung werden technologisch hochwertige Standardprodukte sowie individuelle Lösungen realisiert. Die Softing Automotive Electronics GmbH ist ein Spezialist für die Kommunikation mit Steuergeräten bei der Fahrzeugentwicklung, der Fahrzeugproduktion sowie in der Fahrzeugdiagnose. Die Hauptkunden der Softing Automotive Electronics sind die großen Fahrzeughersteller und deren Zulieferer.
22.12.2010 Die DGAP Distributionsservices umfassen gesetzliche Meldepflichten, Corporate News/Finanznachrichten und Pressemitteilungen. DGAP-Medienarchive unter www.dgap-medientreff.de und www.dgap.de
————————————————————————— Sprache: Deutsch Unternehmen: Softing AG Richard-Reitzner-Allee 6 85540 Haar Deutschland Telefon: +49 (0)89 456 56-333 Fax: +49 (0)89 456 56-399 E-Mail: InvestorRelations@softing.com Internet: www.softing.com ISIN: DE0005178008 WKN: 517800 Börsen: Regulierter Markt in Frankfurt (Prime Standard); Freiverkehr in Berlin, Düsseldorf, Hamburg, München, Stuttgart
Ende der Mitteilung DGAP News-Service

description.hltext_display: Educación concede casi 318.000 euros en ayudas a docentes para 159 proyectos de innovación educativa
description.content: La Consejería de Educación ha resuelto la concesión de ayudas para la realización de 159 proyectos de innovación educativa en centros docentes de enseñanzas no universitarias de la Comunidad Autónoma de Extremadura, por importe total de 317.634,80 euros, según publica hoy el Diario Oficial de Extremadura. Cada uno de los 159 proyectos, en los que han participado un total de 1.190 docentes de forma individual o en grupo, ha recibido una ayuda de 266,92 euros.

description.hltext_display: 終於有家了 (中央社)
После свадьбы жена выяснила, что «муж» – женщина
description.content:
Молодая женщина из Индии на протяжении года встречалась с мужчиной, но, только выйдя за него, замуж выяснила, что он женщина. 26-летняя Минати Хатуа вышла замуж за 28-летнего Ситаканта � утри по всем индийским обычаям. Ситакант получил приданное - украшения, автомобиль марки Indica и $700 наличными, передает MIGnews.com. После свадьбы, однако, Ситикант всячески увиливал от исполнения супружеского долга, уверяя, что он выполняет некий особый религиозный обет. В конце концов, Минати не выдержала, и силой вломилась в туалет, где Ситикант справлял естественную нужду.
Страшная правда открылась Ситикант оказался женщиной. Полиция ведет расследование данного мошенничества.

description.hltext_display: Gigantes vencen al Licey y siguen con chance de avanzar a playoffs
description.content:
Ventaja. Se conservan en el cuarto lugar, con medio juego sobre las Aguilas
Escrito por: PRIMITIVO CADETE (p.cadete@hoy.com.do)
Alexi Casilla anotó por passed ball la carrera que le permitió a los Gigantes del Cibao vencer anoche por 5-4 a los Tigres del Licey y mantener la posibilidad de avanzar a la semi final del torneo de béisbol invernal dominicano.
Los dirigidos por Félix Fermin deberán ahora esperar el desenlace de un partido que protagonizarán hoy las Aguilas y los Leones en el Quisqueya, el cual había sido cancelado por la Liga de Béisbol y que solo se realizaría en caso de ser necesario.
De ganar los Leones, los Gigantes avanzarían al Todos contra Todos, pero si el triunfo es de las Aguilas empatarían con los Gigantes, lo que obligaría a un partido de desempate.
Los Gigantes tienen ahora 25-24 y se mantienen en el cuarto lugar, con medio juego de ventaja sobre las Aguilas, que ayer vencieron a las Estrellas en el estadio Cibao. Los mameyes poseen foja de 24-24.
De acuerdo con el calenario del torneo, la vuelta regular finalizó ayer, pero hasta entonces los claficados para la semi final son los Toros del Este, Estrellas Orientales y Leones del Escogido.
El abridor Esteban Yan se apuntó la victoria. Trabajó pocos más de cinco innings, aceptó ocho hits y cuatro carreras, abanicó a cuatro rivales y otorgó una base por bolas. Joel Peralta se adjudicó el salvado. Por los Gigantes también lanzaron Francisco Cruceta y Juan Pérez. La derrota fue para Jordany Ramírez.
Jhonatan Solano bateó de 4-3 y remolcó una carrera, para junto a Enmanuel Burris, Lucas Montero, Erick Almonte y Wilson Valdez, con dos hits cada uno, protagonizar el ataque de once indiscutibles de los Gigantes. Los Tigres tomaron temprana ventaja, al producir una carrera en la misma primera entrada, remolcada por incogible de Ronny Paulino.
Los Gigantes empataron en el segundo.
Las claves
1. Ofensiva
Jhonatan Solano bateó de 4-3 y remolcó una; Enmanuel Burris, de 4-2 con dos empujadas; Erick Almonte, Wilson Valdez y Lucas Montero, dos incogibles cada uno, mientras que Casilla pegó un sencillo y anotó la del triunfo.
2. El pitcheo
Estaban Yan obtuvo el triunfo. También, lanzador Francisco Cruceta, Juan Pérez y Joel Peralta, quien salvó.

description.hltext_display: 人來了 (中央社)
Trabzonspor, 29 Aralık'ta Antalya'da Toplanacak
description.content: Spor Toto Süper Lig'de ilk yarıyı lider kapatan Trabzonspor'un, Antalya kampı 29 Aralık Çarşamba günü başlayacak. Geçen hafta izin verilen yabancı Oyunculardan sonra dün Gaziantep Büyükşehir Belediyespor ile Ziraat Türkiye Kupası'nda yapılan ve 2-2 sona eren karşılaşmanın ardından da diğer Oyuncular 1 haftalık izne çıktılar. Bordo-mavili takım, 29 Aralık'ta Antalya Belek'te toplanarak, devre arasının ilk çalışmasını gerçekleştirecek. Bordo-mavililer, 5 Ocak'ta Werder Bremen ve 7 Ocak'ta da Schalke 04 ile hazırlık maçları oynayacak. Trabzonspor, Ziraat Türkiye Kupası'nda Konya Torku Şekerspor ile 11 Ocak'ta yapacağı maç için bir gün önce Konya'ya gidecek ve maçı oynadıktan sonra Trabzon'a dönecek. (SE-ZAF-GKH) - TRABZON (Anadolu Ajansı) 10 dakika önce.. [2430136]

description.hltext_display: Skellefteälvens Vattenregleringsföretag får ny vd
description.content:
Den 1 januari tar Peter Lindström över som vd på Skellefteälvens Vattenregleringsföretag. Peter har sedan tidigare 25 års erfarenhet inom företaget, där han varit både driftingenjör och senast verksamhetschef.
– Vi har en utmaning i att ständigt skapa förbättrade förutsättningar för våra delägare inom vattenkraftindustrin. I och med avregleringen av elmarknaden, har konkurrensläget blivit skarpare i konturerna i flera avseenden och miljö- och dammsäkerhetsfrågor blir allt viktigare. Implementeringen av EU:s vattendirektiv i svensk lagstiftning är ytterligare en aktuell utmaning, säger Peter Lindström.
Skellefteälvens Vattenregleringsföretag är nog för många en ganska okänd verksamhet, trots deras viktiga roll för vattenkraften. I kärnverksamheten ingår att vid varje givet tillfälle kunna leverera de vattenmängder som kraftbolagen efterfrågar för sin produktion. Längs Skellefteälven finns tre intressenter: Skellefteå Kraft, Vattenfall, och Statkraft Sverige. Dessa företag är också delägare i Skellefteälvens Vattenregleringsföretag.
– Vi är kanske lite mer synliga när det gäller höga vattenflöden. Där är det vår uppgift att överblicka hela älven bland annat vad gäller hydrologi och det meterologiska läget. Det gäller naturligtvis mot våra intressenter men även mot samhället i övrigt. För att kunna producera och driva affärer måste våra ägare hela tiden få kunskap om hur mycket vatten som finns tillgängligt, säger Peter Lindström.
Skellefteälvens Vattenregleringsföretag har ett ansvar vad gäller säkerheten runt vattenmagasin och dammar. Just nu driver företaget ett stort projekt kallat Samordnad Beredskapsplanering.
– I projektet analyserar vi bland annat vilka konsekvenser som uppstår om en damm brister på ett visst ställe i älven. Det är oerhört komplext och förutom kommunerna längs älven är flera myndigheter inblandade. Olyckor med dammar som brister förekommer inte ofta, men för att minimera skadliga följder ifall olyckan är framme är det viktigt att alla parter är ordentligt förberedda och samspelta, säger Peter Lindström.
Taggar kan liknas vid nyckelord och gör det lätt att hitta innehåll som hör samman. Klicka så får du se.

description.hltext_display: Katich eyes fifth Test
description.content: Injured Australia opener Simon Katich has revealed he is set to make a shock return in time for the fifth Ashes Test, increasing the pressure on Phillip Hughes to find form in the Boxing Day meeting in Melbourne. Katich damaged his Achilles tendon during the second Test defeat to England in Adelaide and was initially expected to miss the rest of the summer."I'm doing all the rehab and pulling up well from the strength work so the physio's pretty happy with where I'm at and actually thinks I'm ahead of schedule," Katich said.The veteran left-hander has revealed that his comeback plans are ahead of schedule and he may be fit for the Sydney Test, starting January 3.Hughes replaced Katich for the third Test in Perth but failed twice as Australia pulled off a series-saving win over England.Knowing Katich is looking over his shoulder will place further heat on the out-of-form Hughes in the biggest Test of the summer."Normally it takes a couple of months to settle down but it's settling down pretty quickly," he added."I've been having treatment on it every day for the last few weeks and it's all going really well."Asked if he'd be fit in time for Sydney, Katich replied: "I'm a long shot but you never know."You can't really put a date on it because with tendon injuries you never know until you fully test them, but if I test it next week and pull up well then who knows."Copyright PA Sport 2010, All Rights Reserved

description.hltext_display: Сенат США, как ожидается, ратифицирует новый договор с � оссией по СНВ
description.content:
Сенат США, как ожидается, 22 декабря ратифицирует новый Договор с � оссией об ограничении стратегических наступательных вооружений (СНВ).
Документ был подписан 8 апреля в Праге президентами США и � оссии - Бараком Обамой и Дмитрием Медведевым. Договор предусматривает сокращение количества стоящих на вооружении у � оссии и США ядерных боеголовок на 30 % (то есть 1550 у обеих стран).
Как передает Первый канал, дебаты уже завершены. Отклонены все поправки, которые предлагала республиканская партия. Некоторые её члены решили примкнуть к демократам и поддерживать документ, что, как ожидается, станет залогом его принятия большинством голосов. Прежде чем приступить к финальному голосованию по СНВ, конгрессмены обсудят резолюцию к договору. Она содержит политические комментарии и никоим образом не влияет на суть самого соглашения. Как переддает � БК, президент США неоднократно поднимал этот вопрос, который является одним из ключевых в его программе. Так, глава американского государства в еженедельном субботнем телеобращении к нации 18 декабря призвал ратифицировать документ без промедления.

description.hltext_display: Inlooppunt tweede kerstdag open
description.content: ETTEN-LEUR - Het Inlooppunt Etten-Leur, gevestigd in wijkcentrum De Vogelaar aan de Koolmees 2, is zondag gewoon open, ondanks het feit dat het dan tweede kerstdag is. Kerstmis, oud en nieuw en de week ertussen is voor een aantal mensen een moeilijke tijd.

description.hltext_display: FSC-CCOO y CSI-F sentencian que con la Ley Postal se debilita a lo público para favorecer a lo privado
description.author: Gloria Pajuelo
description.content:
Piden un acuerdo o convenio como única vía para blindar el impacto que la Ley pueda causar
(0 votos)
Gloria Pajuelo
El secretario de CCOO de Correos en Badajoz, Reinaldo Blanco Ramírez; y el secretario de CSI-F de Correos en Badajoz, Marco González María del Valle, en un aimagen de archivo EaD
Los sindicatos FSC-CCOO y CSI-F sentenciaron que con la futura Ley Postal, que será aprobada hoy por el Congreso de los Diputados, el Gobierno de España ha debilitado a lo público para favorecer a lo privado. "Nos han aplicado un castigo gordo", lamentaron.
La nueva Ley Postal hará de Correos "algo inviable", aseveró esta mañana en rueda de prensa el secretario provincial de CSI-F, Marco Antonio González.
En este sentido, González explicó que Correos, con esta Norma, pierde su espacio reservado de mil millones de euros a favor de los operadores privados, que podrán acceder a la parte rentable del mercado con un mínimo coste de entrada, pudiendo la mayoría de éstos utilizar las infraestructuras de Correos a bajo coste, e incluso de forma gratuita, y sin tener que hacer ninguna inversión.
Y es que el área de negocio que hasta ahora tenía reservada Correos, que constituye su principal fuente de ingresos, la de envíos interurbanos e internacionales de cartas de menos de 50 gramos de peso, quedará abierta.
González estuvo acompañado en la rueda de prensa por el secretario provincial de FSC-CCOO, Pedro Sánchez, y por el responsable zonal de este mismo sindicato, Reinaldo Blanco. Ambos criticaron que esa Ley, que se aprobará definitivamente hoy, ha carecido de diálogo social y de consenso político, donde han jugado un papel primordial los "intereses partidistas", ya que tan sólo saldrá con el apoyo de las fuerzas políticas de ámbito nacionalista, y ninguna estatal.
PRINCIPALES CONSECUENCIAS
La nueva Ley Postal, según los sindicatos protestantes, hace pensar que el Gobierno "premia a los mercados privados y renuncia al servicio postal público prestado por Correos, la mayor empresa pública de España, ya que, según Reinaldo Blanco, "esta Ley liberaliza Correos en lugar de protegerlo".
Así, la primera consecuencia de la Ley es el recorte ´de la financiación del Servicio Postal Público prestado a los ciudadanos hasta en un 52 por ciento, lo que implica que el Estado se "quita de en medio en la financiación, teniendo el operador que autofinanciarse prácticamente".
Además, el Servicio Postal Público se verá reducido en su extensión, es decir, menos productos, y en sus condiciones, dando lugar a buzones concentrados, zonas geográficas sin reparto domiciliario, disminución de los horarios de atención al público, supresión de días de reparto, cierre de oficinas y, por consiguiente, reducción drástica en el número de empleados.
Esto repercutirá inevitablemente en los ciudadanos, ya que todo esto supondrá la creación de "discriminaciones" entre los propios ciudadanos, perjudicando especialmente a los que residen en zonas rurales.
"Correos se va a quedar como una empresa pública, pero de servicio público residual y deficitario, creando ciudadanos de segunda, tercera y hasta de cuarta categoría", auguró Marco Antonio González.
Finalmente, estos sindicatos manifestaron qué la aprobación de esta Ley no cierra el conflicto postal, ya que el proceso de movilización proseguirá con el fin de garantizar un Servicio Postal Público de calidad, y un desarrollo de la Ley lo menos lesivo posible, algo que pasa, según manifestaron, por un acuerdo o convenio para los trabajadores que asegure compromisos y que mejore sus derechos, salario y empleo, y los blinde frente a las consecuencias de la nueva Ley Postal.

description.hltext_display: APPOINTMENT OF DENIS TURCOTTE AS CANADIAN BASED DIRECTOR
description.content:
PERTH , Western Australia , Dec. 22 /CNW/ - Coalspur Mines Limited ("Coalspur" or "Company") (ASX: CPL, TSX: CPT) is pleased to announce the appointment of Mr. Denis Turcotte as an independent non-executive Director of the Company, effective immediately. Mr. Turcotte is a highly regarded Canadian based corporate executive, and in 2006 was recognised as Canadian Business Magazine's Top CEO.
Mr. Turcotte is a Professional Engineer with over 25 years experience and was previously the President and CEO of Algoma Steel Inc. ("Algoma") an integrated steel producer based in Sault Ste. Marie, Ontario. Mr Turcotte oversaw the successful recapitalisation and rapid growth of Algoma which was subsequently acquired for C$1.85 billion in cash by Essar Global Limited ("Essar") in 2007. Mr. Turcotte is currently President and CEO of a private business consulting and investing firm. He is also a director of Domtar Corp. and a member of the Advisory Board of the Brookfield Special Situations Funds.
Mr. Turcotte is highly regarded by the North American investment community and brings to the Board his extensive experience as a senior executive of TSX listed and commodity based companies. Mr. Turcotte will immediately join the Company's Audit Committee.
The Board is delighted to welcome Mr. Turcotte to the Board and believe that his appointment is an important step for the Company as it strives to develop a major new thermal export coal mine to meet growing energy demands worldwide. Coalspur has recently completed a Pre-Feasibility Study ("PFS") on its Vista Coal Project ("Project") in Alberta, Canada .
Mr. Turcotte will receive an annual retainer of C$40,000 and will be entitled to participate (up to the extent of 100,000 share rights or equivalent) in any future equity incentive plans established by the Company, subject to the necessary regulatory and shareholder approvals. The share rights will not have an exercise price and will be subject to various key project development milestones for the Project.
Forward Looking Statements
This news release contains 'forward-looking information' that is based on the Company's expectations, estimates and projections as of the date on which the statements were made. This forward-looking information includes, among other things, statements with respect to the Company's business strategy, plans, development, objectives, performance, outlook, growth, cash flow, projections, targets and expectations, mineral reserves and resources, scoping, pre-feasibility and other studies, results of exploration and related expenses. Generally, this forward-looking information can be identified by the use of forward-looking terminology such as 'expect', 'potential', 'outlook', 'anticipate', 'project', 'target', 'likely', 'believe', 'estimate', 'intend', 'may', 'would', 'could', 'should', 'scheduled', 'will', 'plan', 'forecast', "evolve" and similar expressions. Persons reading this news release are cautioned that such statements are only predictions, and that the Company's actual future results or performance may be materially different.
Forward-looking information is subject to known and unknown risks, uncertainties and other factors that may cause the Company's actual results, level of activity, performance or achievements to be materially different from those expressed or implied by such forward-looking information. Forward-looking information is developed based on assumptions about such risks, uncertainties and other factors set out herein, including but not limited to the risk factors set out in the Company's Annual Information Form. This list is not exhaustive of the factors that may affect our forward-looking information. These and other factors should be considered carefully and readers should not place undue reliance on such forward-looking information.
The Company disclaims any intent or obligation to update or revise any forward-looking statements whether as a result of new information, estimates or options, future events or results or otherwise, unless required to do so by law.

description.hltext_display: Anelka agent eyes US switch
description.content: Nicolas Anelka's brother and agent has claimed the striker could move to the United States when his Chelsea contract expires. The 31-year-old's deal at Stamford Bridge runs until 2012, by which time he will have spent 11 seasons in English football. And he could be tempted to follow former France team-mate Thierry Henry to the States in search of a fresh challenge.Claude Anelka said, in comments reported by the Daily Star: "Nicolas told me he is interested in playing in the United States. We could see him crossing the Atlantic, and I'm serious when I say this."He added: "He asked himself what he will do once his current contract runs out."The US is quite something, and a dream destination. He says he will give it a try, even though he would earn less money than in somewhere like Qatar."Copyright PA Sport 2010, All Rights Reserved

description.hltext_display: ’Cats keep Mavunga in check, hold him to 2-of-8 shooting
description.author: Pete Conrad
description.content:
OXFORD The Cincinnati Bearcats snapped an impressive streak by Miami Universitys Julian Mavunga, a streak of five straight games in which the 6-foot-8 junior led the RedHawks in scoring with no fewer than 16 points.
Against UC, Mavunga was limited to seven points on 2-of-8 shooting. He grabbed a team-high eight rebounds but also committed a team-high five turnovers. We just made sure we didnt give him any open shots, said Ibrahima Thomas, Cincinnatis 6-11 senior forward from Dakar, Senegal.
No contest on boards
Cincinnati had an overpowering advantage on the glass Tuesday night, especially on the offensive boards.
The Bearcats had 16 offensive rebounds. The RedHawks had five. Not surprisingly, UC outscored Miami in second-chance points 15-5. They had 16 rebounds, and at the other end its tougher for you to score, Miami coach Charlie Coles said, because theyve got a set defense, theyve just scored. Our offensive rebounding was a big difference, no question about that, Cincinnati coach Mick Cronin said. They can negate a bad shooting night because you get so many more shots than your opponent. UC did shoot poorly, knocking down just 38.9 percent of its shots. The Bearcats had 10 more field-goal attempts than Miami, which also struggled from the field, shooting just 36.4 percent.
Pay for two or none
Fans expecting to walk up to the Millett Hall ticket window on Tuesday and purchase single-game tickets for the Miami-UC game received an unpleasant surprise.
The only tickets available for walk-up purchase were for a two-game package.
Dwindling crowds
Miami drew only 3,297 fans for a matchup which, decades ago, would have filled nearly all of Millett Hall when the capacity was 9,200 (without the drawn curtains).

description.hltext_display: ヨットの４２０級世界選手権に横須賀学院高の角田きあらと渕野辺高の古屋綾乃ペアが初出場へ/神奈川
description.content:
-PR-今月27日から10日間、アルゼンチン・ブエノスアイレスで行われるヨットの４２０級世界選手?に、横須賀学院高１年・角田き?ら、渕野辺高１年・古屋綾乃ペアが初出場する。
小学校時代に現所属の葉山町ヨットスクールで出会った２人には、五輪出場という夢が?る。初めての世界大会は、はるかなる頂への第一歩。大きな希望を抱き、いざ大海へこぎ出る。「何ていうか、親戚、姉妹みたいなものですかね」。角田は古屋をチラリと見やり、互いの間柄を表現した。陸に上がれば今どきの女子高校生。それぞれの学校の出来事や、家族の話題などを笑いながら話し合う。しかし、ひとたび「戦場」の海に出れば、目つきが一変する。初の世界選手?出場を決定付けた９月の国際４２０級全日本選手?。初日は強風に?おられ、体力を消耗して出遅れた。２日目には「船底のガスケットが外れてスピードが落ちた」（古屋）と、思わぬトラブルで失速して順位を下げた。だが、それでも最終日に盛り返して総合８位。女子の部では１位の健闘で、世界への切符をつかみ取った。
ヨットの日本発祥地・葉山で、２人は海風を肌で感じながら育った。角田は、自分の父と親交が?った甲斐幸さん（57）の勧めで小学４年時に葉山町ヨットスクールに入門。「彼女たちの世界選手?出場は、自分のことのようにうれしい」という甲斐さんは、１９７９年にオランダで行われた４７０級世界選手?で日本人として初優勝した先駆者だ。古屋は一足先の小学３年時に同スクールに入った。父はサーフィンをこよなく愛し、幼少からやはり、マリンスポーツになじみが深かった。それまで、１人乗りのジュニア用ＯＰ級の艇に乗っていた２人は、中学２年時にダブルハンドの４２０級でペアを組んだ。同年代の気心知れた女子同士ということで、自然な成り行きだった。スキッパーとクルーのそれぞれの役割は「ジャンケンで決めた」と２人は振り返る。ただそれ以降、スキッパー角田、クルー古屋の配置は変わらない。相性はピッタリだった。４２０級女子代表の鈴木誠監督（44）は「長い間、一緒にやってきたコンビネーションが大きい」と、将来へも期待を寄せる。全国的にまれだという葉山町ヨットスクールの特徴は、育成の最終目標を五輪出場に設定しており、早い時期から五輪入門艇の４２０級に生徒たちを乗せること。コンビを組んで３年目になる息の合った２人の技術と経験は、国内の同年代の中ではずぬけている。かじ取りを任される、勝ち気な角田は「思っていることをズバズバ言ってしまう性格」と自認しており、一方の古屋は「何でも言ってもらった方がいい」と、聞き役に回ることが多い。ヨット界では「我」と「我」が衝突して、やむなくペア解消になる例も少なくないが、２人は性格的にも名コンビだ。これまで、学校は違うが、週に１度は葉山の海で一緒に技を磨いてきた。練習のない平日は「肩幅が広くなるけど、気にしない」（角田）とダンベルを挙げ、強風に負けないようにと腕力を付けてきた。五輪への険しい道は、このアルゼンチンから延びていく。角田が「五輪？ 小さいころから意識していました」と強気に言えば、古屋は「まだなかなか実感が湧きません。とにかく、何かを得て帰ってきたい」と控えめ。それぞれの決意に満ちた帆を張って、世界を股に掛ける「航海」が始まる。

EUROPA PRESS El número 75.869, que ha resultado agraciado con uno de los quintos premios del Sorteo Extraordinario de Lotería de Navidad y dotado con 50.000 euros a la serie, ha sido vendido en la administración de Lotería de Íscar (Valladolid) de la calle Mayor. El número 75.869, que ha resultado agraciado con uno de los quintos premios del Sorteo Extraordinario de Lotería de Navidad y dotado con 50.000 euros a la serie, ha sido vendido en la administración de Lotería de Íscar (Valladolid) de la calle Mayor.
